title: Pills On Time - Medication Reminder & Pill Tracker
description:
Worried about taking your medicine on time? Well, "pills on time" is for you to remind you everytime it's time to take your dose.

Now stay healthy and never forget to take your medicine, pill, vitamin, or supplement on time.



‚òÖ Key features :
‚Ä¢ Simple and clean UI.
‚Ä¢ Save all your prescriptions, medication and medical courses.
‚Ä¢ Duration can be infinite or in days/weeks.
‚Ä¢ Select repeat pattern: daily, weekly or specific number of days.
‚Ä¢ End and restart medication at any time.
‚Ä¢ Medication tracker which tracks taken and missed medicine, pill, and supplement.
‚Ä¢ Custom medication alert, medication alarm to remind you of dose: choose ringtone, edit vibration and silent modes.
‚Ä¢ Select desired snooze length for the medication reminder, pill reminder.
‚Ä¢ See upcoming, missed and taken medicine, pill, and supplement in a day.
‚Ä¢ Reschedule your upcoming and current medicine.
‚Ä¢ No in-app purchases and no ads.



It is a free medication reminder app that cares for all your medication needs: Pill reminder(e.g. insulin reminder, for birth control pill, support of dosage-tablets, capsules or pills). This is not only a medication reminder app but also a pill tracker so you can maintain your medicine log.

Pills on time is a simple and reliable app that would help you to organise and manage your medication schedule. It is a simple medication reminder and medication alarm app. This medication tracker is a daily pill schedule reminder and a pill tracker. It also works as a supplement tracker app. Having the best medication alarm, it helps you with pill reminders. Moreover it also works as a medication tracker app. The pill alarm notification in the medication reminder and medication alarm system is customisable.

Use it as an antibiotic dosage tracker, insulin reminder, medication adherence or medisafe pill reminder app. It is the best pill reminder alarm free app along with supplement and vitamin tracker, and remedy app.

About Medication Prescription:
Keep track of your ongoing as well as past medication, insulin reminder or supplement track with this app. Medication and prescription/course with any number or length of medicine can be saved. Medication schedule and pill schedule can be set. Certain notes associated with each medication, for example, "Severe cold" etc.

About Medication Alarm
Set customized medication reminder and medication alarm for each medicine so you always get the medication alert. The pill alarm or medication alarm can be snoozed as well as rescheduled individually for each medicine, pill or supplement. This makes it the best medication alert, medication reminder and pill tracker with alarm system in the market.

About Medication Alert:
The medication reminder and medication alarm system is a simple to use medication alert that works by popping medication reminders, pill reminders everytime it's medicine time. It generates medicine alarms, pill alarm that pop up every time for individual medicine, birth control pill and supplement. Take it, snooze it or skip the medicine alert by sliding away the medicine notification.

About Medicine log :
Medicine log or supplement log shows you your taken and missed medicines of each day. You can check and analyze supplement log to see how you've been doing with your medicine intake daily. This medicine tracker and medicine reminder keeps the medicine log for all medication.

Free medication reminder app with alarms
Use of attractive graphics so you always come back to check your medicine, pill and supplement. This is free medicine reminder app with alarm which keeps medicine track and medicine log. With this pill reminder alarm app, be assured to take your medicine on time.

This is a free medicine reminder and medication alarm. The medicine scheduler keeps medicine tracks and supplement log and medicine schedule to generate a medicine alert everytime.

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Fixed 12:00 AM alarm issue many were facing.

The Alarm issue many users were facing regarding the midnight alarm is now fixed. Sorry for the delayed update!
comments: Upgraded from 2 to 5 stars. The problem with the mysterious 12am alarm (which this app was setting) has been fixed, so it no longer interferes with 'Do not disturb'. I think the app looks nice, is easy to use (used for a single daily reminder) and no ads.

This app is nice, compact, app, with no advertising - a critical feature for any app dealing with medical anything. It's good for what it does, although I can see that any users needing more than "4 times a day" would find that to be a shortcoming. It's ok when it is running - alarms show in your notification for the next due date/time for a medication. However, once I was not using it, I had to uninstall it. When there is nothing scheduled in the app, it still schedules a midnight alarm every day. It also does not admit this - and Android shows this midnight item as 'next alarm', but you have no idea where it is coming from.If you have a 7AM alarm set with the clock, it will not show as 'next alarm' until after midnight. I only sorted this out by deleting my apps, one at a time, until the special alarm went away. Without this problem, this would be a four-star review. But - an app cannot be permitted to interfere with the operation of other key features on the phone/tablet, even accidentally. I will watch for a fix, but until this is resolved, this gets one star. EDIT: After dev response: I look forward to the update. To be clear, the interference with understanding of regular alarms when your app has no actual events planned is not unique to your app, many reminder apps are encountering the same thing. Perhaps you could switch to only scheduling the "exact" reminder when there is actually medication due in the future.

Data management is good. The main purpose to download this App. is to remind to take medicines as per the prescribed tmings with the help of an alarm ring. This is missing. Not happy & satisfied with this "no-alarm ring" facility to maintain the timings. I will wait for two more days and the App. would be unstalled soon if not improved its performance.

Easy to use, with a logical set-up. This app does exactly what I want from a pill reminder and I have not missed a single pill since starting the app. A couple of small improvements would be welcome: A pill taken after midnight counts as missed. Pills for the same prescription taken at the same time have to be individually logged.

Gets the job done if you only have 1or 2 prescriptions but for people who take multiple medications at a time it is annoying to have multiple alerts simultaneously. It would also be nice to just tap "taken" instead of having to log each and every one. An "as needed" feature would be helpful.

title: Lady Pill Reminder  ¬Æ
description:
"Lady Pill Reminder" is the perfect app to keep track of taking your birth control pills. It is very simple to set up and use. You just have to indicate the type of birth control pill you take (number of pills in the packet) and the time you usually take your pill, and "Lady Pill Reminder" will notify you when you'll have to take your pill. In addition, you can check the status of the current pill packet.

Lady Pill Reminder is the application you need to keep track of taking your birth control pills: easy, effective, and free!.

Features:

- Daily reminder, you won't forget to take the pill anymore.
- Reminder is automatically disabled for days you don't have to take the pill.
- Reminder is done through notifications (no more annoying alarms).
- You can choose the notification sound.
- You can enable/disable notification vibration.
- Notification led flashes with notifications (only if your device has a notification led).
- This app also reminds you that you have to buy pills when you have to start a new packet.
- Number of pills per packet customizable (so is compatible with all birth control pill types)
- The application displays the status of your pill packet.
- You can use the widgets "Lady Pill Widgets": It's a pack of 2 widgets for your home screen: one shows your pill calendar (so you can see future months predictions), and the other shows your current cycle day, and also shows you if you have to take pill today or not ("Lady Pill Widgets" is sold separately).

Some configurations, or third-party apps, may prevent Lady Pill Reminder notifications from working properly. You must use Lady Pill Reminder as a support, not as an exclusive reminder. We are not responsible for possible missed pills.

With this app, I get a constant reminder to take my pill, and I have not missed a day since I began using it. I'm not sure if there is a way to make the reminder have a sound instead of just vibration, but if not that would be my only critique.

Works well for making sure that i take my tablets on time and i like the fact that it can keep notifing you every e.g. 15mins incase you delete the notification or forget. I also think its good how you can choose the notification icon, as it makes it less awkward when it appears on your phone. The actual app isnt the best inside, not much you can do. It would be good if you could track certain things but otherwise its fine

Works perfectly for what I need it for. I also paid to have the widget and the different icons, which are unnecessary for the app to work, but I think theyre cute and I wanted to support the developers.

I'm a very forgetful person when it comes to taking my pill so had to go onto implant and once it was due out I didnt want to have it again and someone suggested using this app to help me remember and so far I have been on the pill 16 days and havent forgotten it once the app is fab.
I have used this app for the 1st month now and it has been more reliable than all the apps I've tried. The notifications show up everyday to help remind me. Thank you!

title: Bell Pill Reminder : Medication tracker üíä‚è∞
description:
Whether it‚Äôs once per day or more often, remembering to take your medications as intended is not always easy. Medications will only be useful if you use them as per your doctor's instructions and on time. Do you often forget to take your medicines? Or do you want to help your loved ones to remember their medication? Here is an easy pill reminder application for you. Bell Pill Reminder app has been planned based on reviews of many other programs, as well as reviews of people using medicines, and is ready to help people of all ages. It's free. You can use it as medication tracker for your chronic disease medications, diabetes medications, vitamins or birth control medications.

With Bell Pill Reminder, you will be able to take your medicine on time and regain your health by taking your medicine as recommended by your doctor / pharmacist. Remembering your medicines will not be a problem for you in diseases that require long-term medication such as heart, diabetes and cancer. With Bell Pill Reminder, you will no longer forget any of your medicines. Bell Pill Reminder is Ranked by pharmacists and doctors as the easiest and best medication tracker.

Bell Pill Reminder will be your daily assistant and will remind you of your medication on time. Make your life easier with Bell Pill Reminder, which is used daily by people who use drugs for chronic or acute diseases and also those who use contraceptives and any other medicines. Bell Pill Reminder is the easiest medication tracker. Keep yourself and loved ones safe and never forget to take your medicine again with Bell Medication Reminder.

Features of your pill reminder
- Adding Medication

descriptionHTML:
Whether it‚Äôs once per day or more often, remembering to take your medications as intended is not always easy. Medications will only be useful if you use them as per your doctor's instructions and on time. Do you often forget to take your medicines? Or do you want to help your loved ones to remember their medication? Here is an easy pill reminder application for you. Bell Pill Reminder app has been planned based on reviews of many other programs, as well as reviews of people using medicines, and is ready to help people of all ages. It's free. You can use it as medication tracker for your chronic disease medications, diabetes medications, vitamins or birth control medications.

With Bell Pill Reminder, you will be able to take your medicine on time and regain your health by taking your medicine as recommended by your doctor / pharmacist. Remembering your medicines will not be a problem for you in diseases that require long-term medication such as heart, diabetes and cancer. With Bell Pill Reminder, you will no longer forget any of your medicines. Bell Pill Reminder is Ranked by pharmacists and doctors as the easiest and best medication tracker.

Bell Pill Reminder will be your daily assistant and will remind you of your medication on time. Make your life easier with Bell Pill Reminder, which is used daily by people who use drugs for chronic or acute diseases and also those who use contraceptives and any other medicines. Bell Pill Reminder is the easiest medication tracker. Keep yourself and loved ones safe and never forget to take your medicine again with Bell Medication Reminder.

Features of your pill reminder
- Adding Medication
- Adding the frequency of use (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, etc)
- Adding the usage dosage
- Adding the use hours
- Tracking medication use performance
- Your very personal medication use history
- Closing the alarm at the times, when you don't want to use your medication

When you start using the Bell Medication Reminder app, you should definitely show your doctor or pharmacist the drug installation details in the app.

Please don't hesitate to contact us: help@bell.care

Thanks
Bell.Care Team
summary: Easy pill reminder for all ages
recentChanges: Added Portuguese language
comments: An amazing app! I love the simple and pretty UI. The only thing I'd like would be to have notifications that include the name of the medicine (because it only tells me "don't forget to take your medicine") or maybe even customizable notifications (this would make the app perfect!).

First couple of weeks I used it I would give it a five. Easy to use and kept me on track for my meds. Then sometime last week it stopped ringing for my morning pills. Then a couple days later my bedtime ones stopped. And now the last few days it has stopped ringing for all of them. I don't know if it needs an update (my phone says it is updated) but something has to give before I delete and find something else.

It doesn't show any pop up or ring any alarm at given remind. Limit to 5 intake per day, I need 8. No possibility to set more than one day reminds per week e.g. 3days On 4days Off. At present on my S10 Android10 it is useless. Sorry
It has no limit of days. It set the reminders forever.
Pretty to look at... but no notifications üôÑ

title: Pill reminder and medication tracker from Medfox
description:
Get a free pill reminder and medication management app that also integrates into the official e-prescription system. Medfox also offers a map showing pharmacies near your location. As such, this allows patients to seamlessly manage their prescription drugs from the moment they receive their prescription to taking their medication on time and correctly. Medfox does this in an intuitive, easy-to-use and fun way, guiding patients to be more informed, better organized and in sync with their medication directions.

‚≠êÔ∏èKey features

‚Ä¢ Pill reminder for a chosen time
‚Ä¢ Control the correct use of your medicine
‚Ä¢ Easily manage your ePrescriptions in one place
‚Ä¢ Add your medications by name or simply scan a barcode
‚Ä¢ Add your ePrescriptions by scanning a QR code or barcode
‚Ä¢ Track your confirmed and skipped dosage through a built-in calendar 
‚Ä¢ Support for complex dosing schedules
‚Ä¢ Manage all your medications in one place 
‚Ä¢ Map of available pharmacies near you

‚ù§Ô∏è Made just for you 

According to recent studies, 50-60% * of all patients forget to take their medications, which makes their treatment less effective. Don't let this happen to you and give your meds to Medfox.

Medfox is a digital application that will assist you daily with the treatment of both you and your loved ones. Medfox is designed to help you regulate the correct use of medicines and manage your ePrescriptions. In the application, you will find ePrescriptions, medicines and their dosages not only for yourself but also for your whole family, and all in one place. In the application, you can choose any prescription drug by simply scanning the barcode or QR code and then adjusting any dosage using the online calendar. The application creates detailed records so you can always check to ensure you have taken your medicine. In addition, you will find a clear map of all available pharmacies in your area.

Take care of your health and download the app today!

üîí Privacy

Medfox is available free of charge. In the area of privacy, we work in accordance with strict legislation and don't allow third parties to access our users' personal data. We adhere to strict privacy laws.

üìù Reference / Feedback

Your feedback is crucial to us because we are constantly trying to improve the Medfox app and customize to your needs. If you have recommendations, ideas, or feedback, please feel free to contact us either through the app or via email:
info@medfox.digital

title: Med Helper Pill Reminder
description:
Now with Cloud Backup/Restore Med Helper keeps track of your prescriptions - Alarms remind you when medication needs to be taken, when Doctors appointments are scheduled and when meds are running low or are about to expire. 

Med Helper also tracks your vital signs and PRN / take-as-needed medication. You can log and export  or print detailed reports for your Doctor, Nurse or Caregiver 

Multiple profiles let you manage others in your care. 

Whether you‚Äôre self managing or taking care of your loved ones, Med Helper‚Äôs features will help you deal with anything from simple short term situations to prolonged complex chronic conditions by making it easy to maintain prescription and medical regime compliance / adherence. 

It‚Äôs like having your very own Mobile Healthcare Assistant.

Med Helper is consistently ranked as one of the top applications of its kind in the Medical app field.

For information, suggestions or help contact us at:  info@medhelperapp.com
Friend us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/MedHelper?ref=hl

Med Helper Free Features include: 

Phone  /  Tablet compatible 

Prescriptions, Schedule, Take as Needed (Amount/time taken, last 10 doses), Inventory, Doctor/Pharmacy Contact Info, Vitals Tracking, Med Log and Exportable and Printable Reports


People use Med Helper as a:  Medication pill reminder, Vitals tracker, appointment manager, Doctors list and Pharmacy organizer as well as a way to share information with their caregivers.

How ever you choose to use Med Helper we hope it helps make your life a little bit easier. 

Med Helper is being designed by people just like you. Over the past years we've received thousands of emails with suggestions, comments and reviews. People let us know what they like - what they want and sometimes what they don't like. We listen and design accordingly. 

Our belief is that Better Healthcare Needs Better Tools... and better tools are best designed by those who use them. Meaning YOU. 

For any information, suggestions or help of any kind please contact us at:  info@medhelperapp.com 
See our website at:  www.medhelperapp.com

We're at your service....

Note: No network connection is required for Med Helper to operate.

All the best - From the Med Helper Team

recentChanges: Bug fix
comments: I've been using this app for years. Dare not think what might have happened to me if I hadn't. Totally reliable. It has lots of other features I don't use but I am sure they would be useful for others. I tried lots of alternatives in the beginning but this app has been brilliant from the start. Highly recommended.

Loved this app until the last update. It has been working flawlessly for several years. Now I get random notices to take my medication on days that I'm not suppose to. These are meds that are not safe to take whenever... Not a problem right now but as the memory starts to fail... Update... Still the same, I get an alert about 14 hours before it is time to take my meds. They still haven't fixed this problem, yet they asked for my review... 8/2/20 update Notifications random at best, not reliable

Comprehensive but complicated. If you take meds regularly this app will definitely help. For folks who only get a prescription for a run of antibiotics once a year, the complexity of setting up reminders in this app is annoying.

I like the reminder for medication ability. I also recently changed from a Galaxy S8 to an S10. I was glad I found instructions for transferring all of my info (pharmacies, doctors, schedules) from the old to the new phone on website because I was initially peeved when that info did not transfer.

Generally very good, and nice prompt reply when required -- I hope. Currently experiencing problems with "post-dating" entry, where two medications have been taken, but at different times -- it's allowing me to correct one, but not the other. -- No "note" field to add details of what's occurred either. If they'll help me fix this, I'll give it 5* -- I've used it for years, but with "degenerative disorders", life gets complicated.

title: Pill Reminder - Medication Tracker
description:
This medication reminder allows you to manage all of the medications and pills you take on a regular basis, so that you don't forget to take them ever again.  

Pill tracker's main features:
- Customize the pillbox: customize all of the medications you take, selecting the name of the medication, the quantity, the frequency, start date, etc.  
- Pill reminder alarm: the pill reminder app will send you a notification based on the time entered for the medication alarm.  You'll be able to add a medicine reminder for each medication or pill individually each with their respective alarm. 
- Medicine tracker: using a convenient calendar you'll be able to see the pills you need to take and when you need to take them. 
- Compatible with all types of medications: whether you want to track your birth control pills or medications you need to take continuously, this medicine reminder app allows you to customize settings for any type of pill.

comments: loved this app until I was upgraded to Android 10. now this app no longer works. Optima Statera needs to revise this app.
No alarm, it is as not installed.

And that is a good thing. Well it was until it started ignoring alarms and had to be uninstalled and reinstalled, losing all entries in the process, which is no fun when you take as many as I do. What is it with all the crap pill reminder apps that are either just ad  servers or with badly designed UI or riddled with bugs, even ones getting high ratings. Weird.

Easy to use, intuitive (I don't have to read a crazy manual to use it.) I do however wish there was the ability to set specific sounds to specific medications. I have the ability to make my own sounds and I'd rather have the chance to have one time say "take your medication," and another "test your blood sugar," for instance. In addition in an upgrade could the typo of "take in" instead of "taken," when the alarm comes up be fixed? Also it'd be nice if we could set the snooze time in the settings.

title: TOM: Pill Reminder and Tablet & Medication Tracker
description:
TOM is an ad-free medication reminder and medicine tracker which helps you take your tablets, pills and other medicine when it is time. It features a medication countdown, a virtual medicine cabinet and a pill alarm.

With the new TOM tablet reminder and pill tracker you can enter a new medication in your virtual medicine cabinet within a few seconds. Your digital helper TOM will do the rest for you. Simple, free of charge, ad-free and can be used without registration!

Extremely user-friendly, free of charge and absolutely anonymous: the integrated pill reminder and medication tracker reminds you to take all your pills and tablets in good time, thereby simplifying your everyday life

Developed by affected people for affected people
The free TOM medicine reminder and tablet tracker with an integrated pill reminder is so practical and user-friendly because its developers know from their own experience what requirements a digital tablet reminder has to meet. The ad-free TOM pill tracker and medication reminder is therefore ideally suited for simple, efficient medicine management for a wide variety of diseases, such as diabetes, high blood pressure, asthma, Crohn's disease, stroke, epilepsy, cardiovascular diseases, multiple sclerosis or any other diseases.

The most important functions at a glance
‚Ä¢ Extremely easy to use thanks to the dialogue function: TOM asks, you answer - without having to enter any forms or tedious searches in the menu
‚Ä¢ Easy and quick acquisition of new medicine
‚Ä¢ Management of all kinds of therapies: medications taken day, at intervals of several days or hours, or only once
‚Ä¢ Suitable for the treatment of various ailments and diseases (cardiovascular, diabetes, high blood pressure, multiple sclerosis, stroke, asthma, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Modern medication countdown for taking your tablets and pills when it is time
‚Ä¢ Pill alarm for overdue medication
‚Ä¢ Virtual medicine cabinet for a complete overview of your medication
‚Ä¢ Maximum data security thanks to anonymous use of the TOM app and bidirectional encryption

Practical and easy to use
The user interface of the TOM medication tracker and medicine reminder is reduced to the essentials, making it incredibly easy to use. The free app communicates with you in simple dialogs - no need to enter complicated details. Thanks to the integrated pill reminder including a countdown, you can also directly see how much time remains until the next medication is immediately visible. Once the countdown is over, a pill alarm reminds you that it is time to take your medicine.

Privacy and data protection have top priority
The use of the TOM tablet reminder and pill tracker is completely anonymous: No registration with personal data such as email, name, address or telephone is necessary. Your entries are only linked to a randomly generated ID number. Even TOM cannot access this number because it is also cryptographically protected. All communication of the TOM app is also encrypted bidirectionally.

Download the TOM medication reminder and medicine tracker now free of charge, give yourself more freedom in everyday life thanks to simple medication management and never forget to take your tablets again thanks to the integrated medicine reminder and tablet tracker for all kinds of pills, tablets and other medicine when it is pill time again. Suitable for various diseases, such as high blood pressure, asthma, stroke, diabetes, etc.

HELP MAKE TOM BETTER WITH YOUR FEEDBACK
Thank you for using the TOM medication tracker and medicine reminder. Your feedback helps us to further develop the TOM medication reminder and pill tracker with the greatest benefit for you. We are therefore always happy to receive your comments, ideas and suggestions at support@innovation6.ch.
descriptionHTML:
TOM is an ad-free medication reminder and medicine tracker which helps you take your tablets, pills and other medicine when it is time. It features a medication countdown, a virtual medicine cabinet and a pill alarm.

With the new TOM tablet reminder and pill tracker you can enter a new medication in your virtual medicine cabinet within a few seconds. Your digital helper TOM will do the rest for you. Simple, free of charge, ad-free and can be used without registration!

Extremely user-friendly, free of charge and absolutely anonymous: the integrated pill reminder and medication tracker reminds you to take all your pills and tablets in good time, thereby simplifying your everyday life

Developed by affected people for affected people
The free TOM medicine reminder and tablet tracker with an integrated pill reminder is so practical and user-friendly because its developers know from their own experience what requirements a digital tablet reminder has to meet. The ad-free TOM pill tracker and medication reminder is therefore ideally suited for simple, efficient medicine management for a wide variety of diseases, such as diabetes, high blood pressure, asthma, Crohn's disease, stroke, epilepsy, cardiovascular diseases, multiple sclerosis or any other diseases.

The most important functions at a glance
‚Ä¢ Extremely easy to use thanks to the dialogue function: TOM asks, you answer - without having to enter any forms or tedious searches in the menu
‚Ä¢ Easy and quick acquisition of new medicine
‚Ä¢ Management of all kinds of therapies: medications taken day, at intervals of several days or hours, or only once
‚Ä¢ Suitable for the treatment of various ailments and diseases (cardiovascular, diabetes, high blood pressure, multiple sclerosis, stroke, asthma, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Modern medication countdown for taking your tablets and pills when it is time
‚Ä¢ Pill alarm for overdue medication
‚Ä¢ Virtual medicine cabinet for a complete overview of your medication
‚Ä¢ Maximum data security thanks to anonymous use of the TOM app and bidirectional encryption

Practical and easy to use
The user interface of the TOM medication tracker and medicine reminder is reduced to the essentials, making it incredibly easy to use. The free app communicates with you in simple dialogs - no need to enter complicated details. Thanks to the integrated pill reminder including a countdown, you can also directly see how much time remains until the next medication is immediately visible. Once the countdown is over, a pill alarm reminds you that it is time to take your medicine.

Privacy and data protection have top priority
The use of the TOM tablet reminder and pill tracker is completely anonymous: No registration with personal data such as email, name, address or telephone is necessary. Your entries are only linked to a randomly generated ID number. Even TOM cannot access this number because it is also cryptographically protected. All communication of the TOM app is also encrypted bidirectionally.

Download the TOM medication reminder and medicine tracker now free of charge, give yourself more freedom in everyday life thanks to simple medication management and never forget to take your tablets again thanks to the integrated medicine reminder and tablet tracker for all kinds of pills, tablets and other medicine when it is pill time again. Suitable for various diseases, such as high blood pressure, asthma, stroke, diabetes, etc.

HELP MAKE TOM BETTER WITH YOUR FEEDBACK
Thank you for using the TOM medication tracker and medicine reminder. Your feedback helps us to further develop the TOM medication reminder and pill tracker with the greatest benefit for you. We are therefore always happy to receive your comments, ideas and suggestions at support@innovation6.ch.
summary: Tablet Reminder & Medication Tracker for your medicine, pills & tablets by TOM
recentChanges:
New: additional reminders for your stock, reminders for the expiry date of a medication and the recovery option after losing your mobile phone.
Thank you for using TOM. If you have any suggestions, ideas for improvement, praise or even criticism, we are always happy to receive your email to: support@innovation6.ch.
Every positive and also constructive evaluation helps us and TOM to become better for all of you. Many thanks!
comments: Unable to read pharmcode barcode or 2d code on 4 different items.
Great app! Very easy to use and very helpful. Practical features with a clear visuals and navigation. Will keep using!
Very useful and usable, thanks!
It's a good app
Very useful app

title: Pill Tracker - Medication Reminder
description:
Pill Tracker is app that allows you to add and manage unlimited number of meds & pills.


Do you always forget to take the medicine regularly? Taking daily medicines is a challenge for the majority of people. We make it easy with our unique pill reminder, so you won‚Äôt miss taking your medicines and vitamins anymore.

Pill Reminder is easy, beautiful, and reliable... what every patient just needs. Forget about your old system! It's useful for chronic patients as well as normal forgetful people with occasional common cold. 


 Pill Tracker is a very simple and free app that allows you to add and manage unlimited number of meds simultaneously and absolutely for free. Add medicine details like the time to take medicines, daily schedule, dosage, with or without food, doctor details, and medicine shapes. 


‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications
‚Ä¢ Pill tracker with logbook for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢ Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications.
‚Ä¢ Completely offline and free to download.
‚Ä¢ Simple to set up and use.
‚Ä¢ Very friendly and beautiful interface.
‚Ä¢ Do not disturb mode
‚Ä¢ Enable/Disable notification vibration.
‚Ä¢ Reminds you the right dosage of medicine.
‚Ä¢ Family info sharing.
‚Ä¢ Pet medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Choose the notification sound.



- Every days, weeks, or months schedule to take your medicine at fixed times (to 12 times) every defined frequency of days, weeks, or months.
- Track your medicine: view medicine log and track your taken, skipped doses medicines for the past days, weeks and months.
- Delete a medicine or deactivate it to keep it for reference.
- Every hour interval schedule to take your medicine an interval after your last time of taking the dose. You set the interval (number of hours) and starting date & time.


Medicine reminder that reminders users to take medicines on regular basis which contains alarm which can preset for certain times of the day to set of the alarm where they are suppose to take medication that will be reminded.


Sometimes, even though you and your family have active, healthy lifestyles, you get sick. Doctors can prescribe medications but sometimes it‚Äôs hard to remember how and when to take them.

title: Pet Medication Reminder
description:
A Simple reminder app for your pet's medication. 

This app allows you to set the alarm to remind you to feed medication to your pets.

The app allows you to provides additional details like medication type, doctor's notes, dosage, etc, 

Easily set multiple alerts for different times of the day for each medication type. 

features include: -
‚Ä¢ multiple medications per prescription. 
‚Ä¢ multiple alert timings for each medication. 
‚Ä¢ individual medication notes (to store application methods, extra descriptions, etc).

Note: if setting multiple alarms within minutes of each other, remember to turn off "Battery Optimization". Android may ignore some alarms while it is battery optimization mode is turned on.

recentChanges: A reminder app for your pet's medication.
comments: This is almost exactly what I needed. It allows you to keep track of multiple medications per day, including different times each was given. There is also the ability to wrote notes and comments, so each medication can have a detailed explanation effectiveness, use, etc. My only wish is that it consistently put meds in order by time given, not by name of the medication.
Good start, missing a few things. Could use 'recurring' scheduling instead of having to manually choose a monthly reminder date.
very helpful tracking all my pets meds after a dog attack
So far so good.

title: Pill Tracker and Medication Reminder by Safey
description:
Up to 50% of patients don‚Äôt adhere to medication properly. Safey is a Medication Reminder app that helps with medication adherence, increases medication effectiveness, and keeps your support network connected.  
 
Manage your pill schedule with Safey.
 
Safey medication reminder app helps you regain control of your medication schedule so you‚Äôll never miss a dose again. 
 
Managing, remembering and taking medication on time, every time can be difficult for many, which is why Safey has been designed to alleviate the burden of remembering your medication schedule. Contained within a single convenient app on your phone, Safey medication reminder app keeps you on track to looking after your health with ease. 
 
With the ability to track your own and your family's medication schedules, connect with your doctor and a support network of social contacts, and monitor your prescriptions, it takes the hassle out of remembering your medication. All you need to do is take it when your reminder alarm sounds. 
 
The dangers of the mismanagement of medication
Medication safety and adherence are some of the biggest issues facing the health system in the United States.  
 
‚óè	With up to 50% of patients not adhering to their medications as prescribed it can have significant consequences.  
‚óè	Mismanagement of medication contributes to as many as 120,000	 deaths annually.  
‚óè	Over 650,000 hospital admissions linked to failure to take medication correctly.
‚óè	Medication non-adherence is a $500B+ healthcare problem globally.

There is significant room for improvement in how people can self-manage their medication adherence. 
 
FREE Medication Reminder for Men, Women & Teens 
Safey Free Medication Reminder App gives you access handy features including: 
‚óè	Easily reminds you when you are due to take your medication 
‚óè	Add family members to help manage the household medication schedules 
‚óè	Record and track your blood pressure, blood glucose and peak flow measurements to monitor your health 
‚óè	View your dashboard to see what‚Äôs due today.
‚óè	Option to opt-in to register for automatic backup and restore on the Safey HIPAA- compliant servers 
‚óè	Connect with your doctors to share your medication intake information along with other measurements like blood pressure, blood glucose, peak flow, spirometry to support a more comprehensive care management plan 
‚óè	Set up social contacts to share your information with friends and caretakers to enable your support network and help care for others 
 
Lung Function Tracker
‚óè	Input daily peak flow and spirometer measurements to identity trends 
‚óè	Track day-to-day readings to identify changes before they get worse 
‚óè	Use a connected device to get accurate results every time with our new Peak Flow meter and Pocket Spirometer 
‚óè	Maintain consistency with regular reporting 
 
Benefits and Features 
 
‚óè	Provides digital reminders for your medication to ensure you don‚Äôt miss a dose 
‚óè	If you forget to dispense your medication, the app will issue a missed dose notification 
‚óè	Alerts connected caretakers, doctors and family members to missed medication dosages  
‚óè	Relieves patients and carers of manually logging medication administering 
‚óè	Assists with the management of health and treatment plans  
‚óè	Provides data-driven insight into your habits and results across a range of health-related measurements including blood pressure, blood glucose and peak flow recordings 
 
Safey is FREE for download and use. Safey Premium includes unlimited Safey friends and access to more than 10 health measurements. Premium is offered by a subscription with automatic renewal.

title: Pill Logger - Meds Tracker
description:
Pill Logger: Use this app and you'll never forget when you last took medicine, all with NO ADVERTS!

With Pill Logger you can:
  ‚Ä¢ add your medication - using your own description
  ‚Ä¢ customise the dosage
  ‚Ä¢ record each time you take medicine
  ‚Ä¢ export your usage history as a CSV
  ‚Ä¢ set reminders
  ‚Ä¢ create custom widgets to record your dosage with a single touch
  ‚Ä¢ accurately track and display your medication over time
  ‚Ä¢ view charts displaying your medicine history

Pay to unlock:
- Backups & CSV exporting
- Unlimited users, track your spouse or children's medication usage all within the same app.


It takes just a few moments to add a new medicine (including name, dosage & identifying colour) to your library. Once added, you can quickly and simply record each time you take your medicine. If you forget, you can enter it later.

With the ability to export your usage history as a CSV, with customisable filters to export only the time-frame and meds that you want to.

You can choose to set reminders, either by date and time or in so many hours‚Äô time. You can also create a widget that records the medicine and dosage with a single touch.

Pill Logger will track your medication usage over an unlimited period and, with a dedicated statistics page, show medicine history. At a glance you can see:
  ‚Ä¢ Most taken medicine
  ‚Ä¢ Distribution across the day
  ‚Ä¢ Distribution across the week



With more features planned in the near future including:
  ‚Ä¢ Sync between your Android phone and tablet

Our support for this app is on-going and we welcome any feedback or suggestions for future development. Get in touch at support@pilllogger.co.uk or at https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/100765230896179453229



Our users say:

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ - "The best app for keeping track of your medications."

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ - ‚ÄúGreat app! The only app I found that logs history of each med in easy & efficient way... my doc scrolls thru my pill history holding my phone.‚Äù 

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ - ‚ÄúThis app is so useful and easy to use, especially now the developers have introduced single press widgets. Well done guys - keep the updates coming‚Äù

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ -  ‚ÄúFinally... an app that would simply help me remember my last dose... This is exactly what this does. Not so fancy that it is cluttered and not so bare bones that it doesn't work. In the infamous words of Goldilocks; just right.‚Äù

recentChanges: Add notes to the export.
comments: Have used this app for over a year and I find it so useful just to log in the time if I take a painkiller. Also use it to keep tabs on my vitamins intake and sometimes antiobiotics. Would definitely recommend.

Love this app. I can log Rx dosage and time taken no matter where I am. Def worth paying $2 for Data Service to Export and Back up. It is Free to use but costs $2 to add a user and another $2 to use data services but worth every dime. I can now Export, Backup, & Restore when needed!
Difficult to set the reminder and when to take medication. Why isn't there an option to put multiple times under one medication and one time to set for one reminder? Confusing and difficult to use.
Exactly what I wanted, a casual diary to suit fluxation in pain levels and medications when required. No annoying alerts, tells you the exact time logged. Colour coded medications. Worth downloading!

Excellent app! Ideal and easy to use for tracking medicine usage and particularly helpful for showing doctors evidence in taking medicines. It also stops overdosing on meds by reminding me what I have already taken in a 24 hour period which is very helpful as I have a brain injury affecting my short term memory. I can't rate this app highly enough. Brilliant and thank you!

title: Medication Reminder: Pill Reminder
description:
Stay healthy and fit by downloading Medication Reminder app, create your own reminders to take medicine on time so you and family doesn't have to worry about your health. Add as many pill reminder as you need with this free to use app. 

üíäMEDICATION REMINDER AND HEALTH TRACKER
Keep track of your health with this health tracker app. Just set up your medicine reminders in one go and be stress free. You no longer will have to worry if you have taken your medicine or not as this app will give your medication reminder. This app also works offline so you can use it anywhere you go. It is quick and easy to create a simple medication reminder with material design ui. 

‚è±Ô∏èMEDICINE REMINDER APP WITH ALARM
This medicine reminder app with alarm will give you a notification when its time to take your medicine. This is useful as a medicine reminder for kids as they can also hear the sound and remind you. You can turn on or off the alarm in the app according to each medication reminder at the tap of a button. You can also add notes to the reminder to add the dose to be taken for example two pills or one spoon of syrup. Or add a note to remind you to take a full glass of water with your medication so this app can be your water and medicine reminder. The alarm is useful for a baby medicine reminder as your spouse will also hear the alarm and can give the medicine even when your busy. 

üìÖDAILY MEDICINE REMINDER
Now days its common for certain diseases to have to take medication every day. With the repeat feature you can set a daily medicine reminder so you can reminded at the same time every day to take your medicine. With all these features this app is your daily health tracker as you be notified daily to take your medicine and will help you create habits to keep you healthy by taking your medicine on time. So you won't have to worry about missing your pill again.     

MEDICATION REMINDER FEATURES
‚úîÔ∏èEasy and quick to set a medication reminder
‚úîÔ∏èTurn each medicine reminder alarm on or off 
‚úîÔ∏èCreate a custom medicine dose reminder with repeat options for daily, weekly or monthly
‚úîÔ∏èSet any date and time for your reminder for medicine 
‚úîÔ∏èSimple and easy to use material UI design  
‚úîÔ∏èSuitable to set simple medication reminders 
‚úîÔ∏èUse can use this app offline without internet connection
‚úîÔ∏èThis app can also be used a pet medication reminder, baby medicine reminder and medication reminder for kids 
‚úîÔ∏èBest of all this is a FREE medication reminder app

title: Medication Reminder
description: Have you been forgetting to take your medication? Medication Reminder is here to help you with this and make sure you follow the doctor's prescription by reminding you when it is time to take your meds.
descriptionHTML: Have you been forgetting to take your medication? Medication Reminder is here to help you with this and make sure you follow the doctor's prescription by reminding you when it is time to take your meds.
summary: Your doctor's prescription companion
recentChanges: - Initial release

title: Safe and Sound Pill Reminder
description:
Organise your medication the smart way and take control of your daily medications. By taking the stress and confusion out of managing multiple medications, Safe and Sound‚Äôs Pill Reminder App makes taking your medication on time easy. 

Timeline view of upcoming reminders:
View a timeline of any medication reminder you have for the day and set them as either taken or missed.

Get personalised pill reminders:
Receive personalised medication reminders to your smartphone, letting you know which medications you are due to take. 

Medication report:
View a report of medication reminders you have taken or missed in the medications report section.

Set complex medication schedules:
Easily set complex medication reminder by choosing how many times a day you want to receive a reminder, and at what time. Easily make amendments or switch pill reminders on/off.

Safe and Sound‚Äôs Pill Reminder App takes the stress out of managing your medication. Simply set reminders for how often you need to take your medication, whether that‚Äôs once-a-day or several times a day, and at what time you want to receive the reminders. The app will automatically send personalised reminders to your smartphone letting you know when it‚Äôs time to take your medication and any instructions you need to take your medications (eg. with or without food).

Keep track of any medications you have missed or taken with Safe and Sound‚Äôs Pill Reminder medication report. View all medications you have missed or taken, helping you stay on top of your medication schedule and preventing you from missing or doubling up on a dosage. 

Safe and Sound‚Äôs Pill Reminder app is free to use and complete ad free. Download today and starting organising you medications the smart way.

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Bug fixes
comments: I don't want to count. I want to insert info like "a pill every x hrs during x days" and the start time and the app auto set reminders.
I have been unable to get the app to make a noise or flash a light to remind me to take my medication. This makes it pointless - did I miss something?
Straight to the point. Very simple to follow. The only thing I could suggest is a "pill countdown" to remind us when we need to order again. But overall a nice, easy app to use.
Easy to use and really handy for reminding me to take my meds

title: Pillgo: Medication Reminder
description:
Pillgo is an innovative pillbox paired with a completely-free medication tracking mobile application. Other than providing pill reminders, remote monitoring function for caregivers and comprehensive dose-taking records, more functions are integrated with the Pillgo app, such as analysis with biometrics (e.g. blood pressure or resting heart rate), drug allergy or drug-drug interaction alerts. With Pillgo, you can effectively control your or your loved ones‚Äô daily medicine consumption and improve medication adherence.‚Ä®‚Ä®

üíä Key features:‚Ä®
‚Ä¢¬† Intelligent pill reminder from mobile notification
‚Ä¢¬† Track your biometrics during your medication plan, e.g. blood pressure and resting heart rate
‚Ä¢¬† Drug allergy and drug-drug interaction alerts‚Ä®
‚Ä¢¬† Quantifiable medication performance index‚Ä®
‚Ä¢¬† Daily, weekly, monthly and yearly medication records reporting user‚Äôs progress
‚Ä¢¬† Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for medicine information input
‚Ä¢¬† Refill reminders‚Ä®
‚Ä¢¬† Remote monitoring by caregivers to track users‚Äô medicine consumption and receive notifications‚Ä®
‚Ä¢¬† Integration with Pillgo Smart Pillbox: Medication adherence can be further improved with the visual and auditory alerts and dual sensor system of Pillgo Smart Pillbox‚Ä®‚Ä®

‚è∞Intelligent pill reminders with logbook for taken and missed records‚Ä®
Pillgo App allows user to set their medication schedule and give accurate alarm at exact time. By entering the drug name, dose, quantity and medication time, the app will automatically generate a schedule for you. Taken and missed records will be saved on the app and be shared with doctors by exporting a CSV file.

üìàAnalysis with your biometrics
Pillgo App integrates your biometrics, such as blood pressure or resting heart rate, with your medication data. It allows users to visualise their body reactions under various medication practices. They could see how their body condition is being affected by different dosage schedules or types of medicine.

‚ùóDrug allergy and drug-drug interaction alerts
Pillgo informs users of potential drug allergies and drug-drug interactions, which assists in lowering the risk of possible side effects that might arise from combining certain medications.

‚Ä®üíØQuantifiable medication performance‚Ä®
A quantifiable performance index is calculated based on your taken and missed pill-taking records. It provides an overview of all medications or a specific pill to the user and helps them adjust their medication performance. ‚Ä®‚Ä®

üë™Caregiver remote monitoring‚Ä®
Pillgo app allows caregivers to track and monitor users medicine consumption. After adding as friends, users can track each other‚Äôs medication schedules, records and the quantifiable performance index. Also, they will receive reminders from mobile notifications when the user does not take pills on time. ‚Ä®‚Ä®

‚ûïIntegration with Pillgo Smart Pillbox‚Ä®
Pillgo Smart Pillbox provides a 7-slot compartment for pill storage. It can connect with the mobile applications through Bluetooth, and medication schedule can be set in the app and sync with the pillbox. The pillbox will provide accurate medication reminders with visual and auditory alerts to notify users to take pills from a specific slot. Pillgo Smart Pillbox will have wrong dosed alert when the user opens the pillbox at an unscheduled time or turns the lid to the incorrect compartment. Moreover, Pillgo Smart Pillbox has a dual sensor system which ensures that the user has turned the lid to the right slot and pour out the pill from the pillbox. Medication adherence can be further improved and ensured with Pillgo Smart Pillbox.‚Ä®‚Ä®

Pillgo App is FREE to download and use. It is recommended to be used with Pillgo Smart Pillbox. It is a perfect companion to improve your medication adherence. 
‚Ä®
Please note that you need to consult your physician if you're having issues. Pillgo App is not intended to be medical advice.

title: PocketNurse - Pill Reminder
description:
WHY TO USE?
‚Ä¢ It's a fancy, easy-to-use, visual and intuitive medicine management & pill reminder app offering great user experience.
‚Ä¢ An all-purpose and convenient solution that works great for medicines, birth control lady pills, contraceptives or vitamins and helps you take any pill on time and safely.
‚Ä¢ Suitable for managing medication courses for complex health conditions via optional, one-tap-to-turn-on features.
‚Ä¢ You can easily manage and track pill taking for your whole family & pets. Assign a color to them, spot their to-dos and stay on schedule with all their meds and pills with ease.
‚Ä¢ Medication history is at your full discretion. PocketNurse keeps your data on your phone only. The only way for guaranteed and total discretion. Even we can't check your schedules!
‚Ä¢ It's completely free and will stay free.


SOME OF THE FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Medication Courses: you can simply group multiple Medicines that were prescribed for the same problem into a single Course. Medicines may have different schedules.
‚Ä¢ Complex Schedules: you can optionally define multiple periods or pause in any Medicine taking schedule, making it easily adaptable for contraceptives or medication courses with shifting or periodically changing schedule.
‚Ä¢ Medicine Inventory & Restock on Medicine: let the app notify you if you're low on pills and need to arrange for a refill.
‚Ä¢ Consult with your own trusted people: send any part of your Medication History to your doctor, caretaker or family member in standard email or via Bluetooth. They don't have to have PocketNurse installed!
‚Ä¢ Customize for your preference: use the app's modular approach and just turn on features on a medication course you need. Set global features to work on the way you want.
‚Ä¢ Choose the level of details: you can give a lot of information for any pill taking, medication course or medication... Or you can just stay brief. Make your choice on-the-fly, it works both ways.
‚Ä¢ Never miss a pill with the built-in widgets & dashboard! You can safely prepare in time by checking the due taking times either in the app or on the widget, and if you'd still forget, it'll safely but persistently reminds you when it's time.


supported In-App Languages
‚Ä¢ ENGLISH
‚Ä¢ German
‚Ä¢ Spanish (Latin-America)
‚Ä¢ Italian
‚Ä¢ Hungarian
‚Ä¢ Romanian (Beta)


PocketNurse is your new, fancy and easy-to-use drug taking app, providing assistance in your, or your beloveds‚Äô regular medicine courses or continuous pill taking. Be it vitamin, birth control lady pill, insulin or medicine... PocketNurse is your most intuitive and modular, all-round solution for scheduling them.


Although PocketNurse has been tested on several real devices of multiple Manufacturers, with the codebase currently supporting over 7400+ device types, bugs might happen. If you‚Äôd encounter with any issue, please don't hesitate to let us know+


Please make it sure that PocketNurse is set as an exception in your Power Saving options, otherwise, notifications might be delayed. Please refer to our note about how to do that on the different Android versions: https://goo.gl/g2HQcA 


PocketNurse is being continuously developed and new features will be added based on your feedback - so don't hesitate to let us know if you have an idea about how to make it better!


Resources, App Page & Contacts
‚Ä¢ Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pocketnurseapp
‚Ä¢ Feature Highlights: http://goo.gl/EgiJm7
‚Ä¢ Tips & Tricks: http://goo.gl/1smqZN
‚Ä¢ Version History: http://goo.gl/ldjkO8
‚Ä¢ Email (for suggestions, bug reports, comments): apps@instait.com


We haven‚Äôt improved PocketNurse in the area you wished to see changes the most yet? The app is for you, so drop us a line here, on Facebook or via email and see that change!


Are you satisfied with PocketNurse? Please write a review and let others know about it!
Thank you!

comments: Excellent app. Many options.
Best thing since Fish and Chips and Ice cream
Start back to the first of the year every time

Its not bad helps, me rember to take my daily meds, I would like to be able to edit my meds easier. Example  I have something that can be taken every 4 - 6 hours. so reminded every 4 hours instead of having to add a dosage in every 4 hours. Maybe im using it wrong. But it works well.

I would like to be able to save a course but keep it inactive. I have a complicated sick day schedule- different from the regular one, it would be nice not have to plan out and enter in the info each time when I already feel bad. Love the ability to enter notes. Would also like it if the last dose showed on the homepage.

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker
description:
Keep up with your medication easier and faster than ever. Create and track your medication history. Stay organised with an alarm notification. This app is your easiest pill reminder ever.

This medication reminder allows you to manage all of the medications and pills you take on a regular basis, so that you don't forget to take them ever again.

This app reminds you to take the right medication at the right time, and also to refill your stock of pills before they run out. Enjoy the smart medication reminder with flexible schedule options, pill tracker, refill reminder, and more.

MEDICATION REMINDER

This is where you manage all of your medications. Here you set reminders for each medication to avoid missing doses. Notifications remind you to follow your medication regimen.

To set reminders, you will first need to indicate whether you are taking pills, syrups, or injections. You can set reminders on them collectively or separately, depending on how you use them. Daily reminders, weekly reminders, monthly reminders, and yearly reminders are all available.

Another great feature of this section is Inventory Setting. Here you can enter the number of medications left in your medical box and tell it to send an alert when you are left with a certain number. The app will notify that ‚ÄòYou are running out of medication‚Äô as soon as you reach that amount.

DOCTOR VISITS

This is a great feature that helps you to set reminders in order to keep track of upcoming doctor appointments.

VACCINE REMINDERS

Timely vaccinations are important to ensure healthy growth of your child. To make things easier, use the

Pill Reminder's main features:

‚Ä¢ Customize the pillbox: customize all of the medications you take, selecting the name of the medication, the quantity, the frequency, start date, etc.
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder alarm: the pill reminder app will send you a notification based on the time entered for the medication alarm. You'll be able to add a medicine reminder for each medication or pill individually each with their respective alarm.
‚Ä¢ Medicine tracker: using a convenient calendar you'll be able to see the pills you need to take and when you need to take them.
‚Ä¢ Compatible with all types of medications: whether you want to track your birth control pills or medications you need to take continuously, this medicine reminder app allows you to customize settings for any type of pill.
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications
‚Ä¢ Pill tracker with logbook for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢ Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health journal
‚Ä¢ Family medication reminder

title: Medical Reminder‚ÄìPill Alarm and Appointment Alerts
description:
Medical Reminder is a MUST HAVE APP for Everyone.

Medical Reminder can keep track of all your Medications, including; Which one to take?, and When to take it? It can even remind you of your Doctor appointments. 

Medical Reminder has been comprehensively formulated to keep you on track with your Medications and Doctor appointments. With an amazing Elderly Friendly UI, Medical Reminder has been designed with every patient's needs. 

Simply input your medication name and dosage, select the type of medicine, note down any instructions, and set schedules of when to take them. The App will alert you at the time you need to take your medication. 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢  Experience the full medication management experience with our intuitive user-friendly interface that makes it easy to keep all your medication needs in one place.

‚Ä¢  Never again forget about any upcoming doctor appointments with our comprehensive appointment manager that keeps track of all your appointment information and alerts you of your upcoming appointments. The appointment list is sorted in chronological order. Upcoming appointment appears at the top in the list. 

‚Ä¢  Afraid of losing your medical records? Simply create a backup file of your Medical Reminder data.  When you get a new Android phone, you can now back up and restore your medical data.

‚Ä¢  Medical Reminder makes it easy to view your health journal and send your medical progress reports to your doctor instantly.

‚Ä¢  Always have all your personal information with you on-the-go, including your Medical Insurance details, Blood Group, Weight, Height, etc.

‚Ä¢  With compact reminders on the home screen, you will always be up to date with all your medicines and appointments for the day.

‚Ä¢  Stay safe and be on time with Medical Reminder's reliable alerts even when your device is locked.

‚Ä¢  Customizable snooze alerts to make sure you receive your needed dosage at the right time.

LIKE US and STAY CONNECTED
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Deskshare-1590403157932074
Deskshare: https://www.deskshare.com
Contact Us: https://www.deskshare.com/contact_tech.aspx

comments: I bought the full version because of the number of meds I need to manage. The alerts don't come at the time they are supposed to, if they come at all. I don't understand what the start and stop thing is about when entering meds to take every "x" hours. If I'm not able to administer a med at a specific time, it won't let me enter the time I do give it it. Wrote them but no reply. Getting very fed up.

Nice app with many useful features. Keep track of your medicines and appointments. Very easy to set up and use. The only negative is that it costs $14 per year via subscription. It's good, but not that good.
Doesn't allow to specify decimal numbers in hours repeatation, like in some case doctor might specify every 4.5 hrs a day repeat perticular medicine.. This app doesn't allow such intervals
good ap but free version only lets you add 4 medications....also 14 dollar a yr subscription... otherwise was a good app
Make you pay to use. It would be good, but not a "free" app.

title: Pill Assistant
description:
We are living in a fast and busy world. Therefore, how many times have you missed your medication? And how badly could it affect your health and life?
Pill Assistant is a free pill reminder and medication tracker. This APP will help you to remember about every pill you need to take regardless of how complex your treatment is.
Key features:
¬∑Pill reminder for all type of medications
¬∑Get reminders of your medications at exact time
¬∑Control dosage of your medications
¬∑Simple configuration
¬∑Completely free

title: Pill Reminder - Medication Alarm
description:
Get reminders of your medications at exact time

We Forget to taking medicines and taking daily medicines is a challenge for the majority of people. We make it easy with our unique pill reminder, so you wont miss taking your medicines and vitamins anymore.

Pill Reminder - Medication Alarm is easy, beautiful, and reliable.what every patient just needs. Forget about your old pillbox.It's useful for chronic patients as well as normal forgetful people with occasional common cold. 

App. Features


- Enable/Disable notification vibration.
- Reminds you the right dosage of medicine.
- Family info sharing.
- Pet medication reminder
- Pill reminder app for all medications.
- Completely offline and free to download.
- Simple to set up and use.
- Very friendly and beautiful interface.
- Choose the notification sound.
- Do not disturb mode

title: Pill Reminder - Pill Tracker & Medicine Alarm
description:
Pill Reminder - Pill Tracker & Medicine Alarm is an easy-to-use and reliable app that helps you remember to take medications at the right time. It is very simple to set up and use. Pill reminder is the perfect app to keep track of taking birth control pills. Tells me when to take them, if they need to be taken with food, gives me info about the pills and keeps track of me taking the pills. It also keeps track of other health areas like your weight, glucose, pulse, blood pressure and much more. So it allows me to keep track for myself and to show the doctor. You just have to indicate the type of birth control pill you take (number of pills in the packet) and the time you usually take pill and will notify you when you'll have to take your pill. In addition, you can check the status of the current pill packet.üíä

üíäFeatures of Pill Reminder - Pill Tracker & Medicine Alarmüíä:

üíä Pill reminder app for all medications.
üíä Choose your medicine reminder sound.
üíä Appointment reminder.
üíä The date wise and day wise time schedule.
üíä Measurement module & 9 types of measurement.
üíä You can enable/disable notification vibration.
üíä Reminds you of the right dosage of medicine.
üíä Track and keep health in good condition.

üí¢Medication Managementüí¢:
Every days, weeks or months schedule to take your medication at fixed times every defined frequency of days, weeks, or months. Tablet, capsule, syrup, injection, powder, inhaler, drops, mouthwash, douche, spray, cream, gel, ointment, lotion, suppository, vaginal douche, physiotherapy, treatment session, and others is set a default does that you still can change and adjust when you take the medication useful for medical plans with changing doses. Every hour interval schedule to take your medication an interval after your last time of taking the dose. You set the interval (number of hours) and starting date & time.üíä

üí¢Comprehensive Meds Reminderüí¢:
We designed a medicine reminder app that puts all your medication needs in one place: Pill reminders (e.g. for birth control pills), a comprehensive database of OTC and RX medications, support for any dosage form (tablet, pill, inhalation) frequency and even refill reminders. And as the app is not only a pill alarm but also a medication tracker, you just need to check its pill diary to make sure you‚Äôve taken that important dose to pill reminder - pill tracker & medicine alarmüíä

üí¢Motivation To Take Your Medsüí¢:
Involve family and friends with a team and successfully manage together and you can even have your family see if you‚Äôve missed a med despite the pill reminder, so they can help you stay on track. My therapy is for you, no matter if you are taking antibiotic medicines or deal with hypertension, atrial fibrillation, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, multiple sclerosis, anxiety or depression that are often complicated. My therapy is medication tracker and health journal. Have peace of mind from medicine reminders and health tracker.üíä

A monthly pill organizer, medicine organizer, my medicine box with daily pill schedule reminder. Birth control app to contraception pills reminder is lady pill reminder with any timer pill reminder. title: Med Alert ‚Äì Pill Reminder -Medicine Reminder
description:
Do you suffer from various diseases but fails to the medicines on regular basis? Or your old parents who are living alone at home and need assistance of reminding them of the medication on right time? If yes, you can take help from Med Alert available in your mobile phone. It is one of the best choices among the physicians, pharmacists, and patients. You can join the millions of people using the free app ‚Äì stay on track and never miss some medicine. 

Top Features of Med Alert:

‚Ä¢	Reminder with Alarm for timings for the medication requirements.
‚Ä¢	Pill to pill interaction checker.
‚Ä¢	Caretaker and family assistance through the functionality of ‚ÄúMedfriend‚Äù.
‚Ä¢	Refill reminders and Medicine tracker.
‚Ä¢	Managing the Doctor appointment calendar and manager.
‚Ä¢	Complete choice of RX and OTC medications.
‚Ä¢	Medicine reporting on daily, weekly & monthly along with logbook to share with your physician.
‚Ä¢	Measurement of more than 20+ health conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, cancer, multiple sclerosis, anxiety, depression, HIV, weight, blood sugar levels blood pressure.
‚Ä¢	Supplements reminder.
‚Ä¢	Vitamins reminder.
‚Ä¢	Perfect for Android.
‚Ä¢	Set your time with time setting option. 
‚Ä¢	Automatic time zone discovery.
‚Ä¢	Coupon and Discounts of the drugstore coupons.

Free Medication Reminder doesn‚Äôt just hark back you to take your medicine. We offer a comprehensive tool that compiles all of the health and medical information at one place: pill and medicine reminders, interaction of the drug-to-drug, refill alerts, appointments of doctor, and health periodical with 20+ medication reminder app. 

Information on App Permission:

Phone Contacts are used if you wish to add doctor. However, the app never stores the address book content and it doesn‚Äôt get the address book without inquiring you at first. Appointment Reminder App  will help you to get a reminder of the appointment.

title: Complete ‚Äì Medication Tracker
description:
Please see Indications and Important Safety Information, including BOXED WARNING on Serious Infections and Malignancy, for HUMIRA (adalimumab) at www.humira.com/important-safety-information.

Please see Important Safety Information, including BOXED WARNING on Serious Infections, Malignancy, and Thrombosis, for RINVOQ (upadacitinib) at www.rinvoq.com/important-safety-information.

Please see Important Safety Information for SKYRIZI (risankizumab) at www.skyrizi.com/important-safety-information.

Please see the Full Prescribing Information for HUMIRA at www.rxabbvie.com/pdf/humira.pdf, RINVOQ at www.rxabbvie.com/pdf/rinvoq_pi.pdf, and SKYRIZI at www.rxabbvie.com/pdf/skyrizi_pi.pdf.

The Complete App features personalized injection and symptom logging, medication reminders, and goal setting that can support and encourage you throughout treatment.

‚Ä¢ Customized Injection Logging & Training - Keep track of when and where you inject either HUMIRA or SKYRIZI on your body. View your injection history by date with details. Tapping on a specific date will show injection times, sites, and notes. You can even personalize how you would like to rotate injection sites through your own chronological order. Review the injection training you received from your doctor with in-app videos, training kits, and more.

‚Ä¢ Calendar & Activity Log - View your injection or medication schedule, symptom history, and a body diagram of injection locations in your selected date range.

‚Ä¢ Symptom Tracking - Keep a log of your symptoms and discuss them with your doctor at your next visit. This may help you have more productive discussions about how treatment is working for you.

‚Ä¢ Dose Reminder and Medication Tracker - Find tools to help manage your medication through this free app - set reminders so you never miss a dose.

‚Ä¢ Set Personal Goals with RINVOQ - Setting goals is a great way to focus on something meaningful to you that you want to work toward. Personal goals can be a great motivator and may help keep you on track with your prescribed treatment plan.

‚Ä¢ Access Complete Resources - Request resources to support you throughout your treatment, starting with a Savings Card, where commercially eligible patients may pay as little as $5 a month. A dedicated Nurse Ambassador is there for you to provide the support you need and to help answer any questions you may have. Other resources include Complete Prescription Rebate ‚Äì where you can submit your receipts for reimbursement of your eligible out-of-pocket expenses.

Additional Information
If you‚Äôre taking HUMIRA, SKYRIZI, or RINVOQ, you may want help starting and staying on track with your treatment plan. The Complete App can help by providing resources that allow you to set reminders, track symptoms, and create personal goals that can support and encourage you throughout your treatment journey. 

If you have any questions or concerns with the Complete App, or you need to report medication side effects or adverse events, call 1.800.4HUMIRA (1.800.448.6472) for HUMIRA, 1.866.SKYRIZI (1.866.759.7494) for SKYRIZI, and 1-800-2RINVOQ (1-800-274-6867) for RINVOQ.

This app is intended for the exclusive use of U.S. residents 18 years of age and older. The Complete App is not intended to provide treatment decisions or replace the care and advice of a licensed healthcare provider. All medical analysis and treatment plans should be performed by a licensed healthcare provider.

recentChanges:
The Complete App has been updated to include:

‚Ä¢ The ability to order resources for SKYRIZI
‚Ä¢ Arm injection support for SKYRIZI
‚Ä¢ An improved sign in/sign out experience
‚Ä¢ The ability to update insurance coverage information

comments: I take my injection every 2 weeks but this tracker has it set at every 3 weeks. So I have to keep up with it by putting it on my personal calendar. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling and resetting it but nothing works. I'm just gonna uninstall it permanently and keep track on my calendar. I do like that i can track where have each injection.
I have forgotten my dose before, and the app reminded me...which was awesome! Very convenient, easy to use, and lots of extra resources for help with any problem u may encounter.
Probably the easiest app I have used. It is a wealth of information! I love this app.the only negative is that it is not available to use on my tablets. 10/26/2020

Helps me keep track of symptoms, flares, and pain-free days so I am able to accurately describe this to my doctor. The "help" section is good for trouble-shooting how to use the app and make the most of it.

Really quite a good app the only major problem I have with it is it likes to cancel the timer you have running when you go away from the app. We should use the camera to scan expiration dates and lot numbers

title: Daily Pill ‚Äî Medication Reminder
description:
Ideal if you need to take your medicine every morning. Daily Pill shows a reminder on your lock screen which is visible in the first time you pick up the phone in the morning. Respond with the press of a single button, without unlocking.

If you need need to take your medicine on an empty stomach, this app also remembers the exact time when you last took it.

Daily Pill is free and open source software. It does not display ads, and does not collect your personal information.

summary: Reminder app for your daily medication. Easy to use and respects your privacy.
recentChanges: Added georgian language translation.
comments: Does exactly what it says. I just wish you could add more than one alarm setting. I take morning and evening pills but this app only allows for 1 alarm to be set.
It has potential, but if you take multiple meds at different times it is useless.

If you have any questions or concerns with the Complete App, or you need to report medication side effects or adverse events, call 1.800.4HUMIRA (1.800.448.6472) for HUMIRA, 1.866.SKYRIZI (1.866.759.7494) for SKYRIZI, and 1-800-2RINVOQ (1-800-274-6867) for RINVOQ.

This app is intended for the exclusive use of U.S. residents 18 years of age and older. The Complete App is not intended to provide treatment decisions or replace the care and advice of a licensed healthcare provider. All medical analysis and treatment plans should be performed by a licensed healthcare provider.
summary: The Complete App can help you stay on track with your prescribed treatment plan.
recentChanges:
The Complete App has been updated to include:

‚Ä¢ The ability to order resources for SKYRIZI
‚Ä¢ Arm injection support for SKYRIZI
‚Ä¢ An improved sign in/sign out experience
‚Ä¢ The ability to update insurance coverage information
‚Ä¢ Simplified fingerprint log in
comments: I take my injection every 2 weeks but this tracker has it set at every 3 weeks. So I have to keep up with it by putting it on my personal calendar. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling and resetting it but nothing works. I'm just gonna uninstall it permanently and keep track on my calendar. I do like that i can track where have each injection.
I have forgotten my dose before, and the app reminded me...which was awesome! Very convenient, easy to use, and lots of extra resources for help with any problem u may encounter.
Probably the easiest app I have used. It is a wealth of information! I love this app.the only negative is that it is not available to use on my tablets. 10/26/2020

Helps me keep track of symptoms, flares, and pain-free days so I am able to accurately describe this to my doctor. The "help" section is good for trouble-shooting how to use the app and make the most of it.

Really quite a good app the only major problem I have with it is it likes to cancel the timer you have running when you go away from the app. We should use the camera to scan expiration dates and lot numbers

title: Daily Pill ‚Äî Medication Reminder
description:
Ideal if you need to take your medicine every morning. Daily Pill shows a reminder on your lock screen which is visible in the first time you pick up the phone in the morning. Respond with the press of a single button, without unlocking.

If you need need to take your medicine on an empty stomach, this app also remembers the exact time when you last took it.

Daily Pill is free and open source software. It does not display ads, and does not collect your personal information.
