comments: Does exactly what it says. I just wish you could add more than one alarm setting. I take morning and evening pills but this app only allows for 1 alarm to be set.
It has potential, but if you take multiple meds at different times it is useless.

title: Pill Reminder
description:
Have you missed your medication? Dealing with a seasonal condition or injury? Taking regular medicine and need help remembering your pill?

Our app is a free pill reminder that helps you to remember about every pill you need to take at the exact time.
So you will not forget about your medications and pills anymore and take them at the right time.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder for all type of medications
‚Ä¢ Get reminders of your medications at exact time
‚Ä¢ Track the dosage of your medications
‚Ä¢ Multiple profiles so you can keep track of medication intake for your whole family
‚Ä¢ Get daily/weekly notifications
‚Ä¢ Easy to use

‚Ä¢ Completely free

Pill Reminder is available for free and no registration is required! Your personal data is not released to any third parties.

title: Drugs.com Medication Guide
description:
The easiest way to lookup drug information, identify pills, check interactions and set up your own personal medication records. All mobile-optimized to speed up your browsing experience.

Key Features

My Med List
Add your medications to instantly assemble relevant medical information in a simple, easy to read personalized format. Access in-depth consumer information, FDA alerts, drug interactions, plus food, allergy and medical condition interactions. An invaluable tool for medication management and adherence. Now offers offline support.

Complete Drugs A to Z listings
Fast search, accurate suggestion engine and the most comprehensive database of drug information available online.

Pill Identifier
Identify any meds simply by entering an imprint, shape or color. Database updated daily.

Interactions Checker
Provides a list of interactions that may occur when different drugs are taken at the same time. Also checks food interactions automatically.

Q & A
Ask a specific question about your medication. Search on thousands of questions and answers.

Health Professionals
Quick access to all the tools you know and trust. 

Many helpful tools. Try the Symptom Checker. Lookup specialised databases for side effects and dosage information. Not quite sure how to spell a drug name? Use the phonetic search. 

Permissions

The app requires full network access to gain access to the Drugs.com drug information database.

The app requires access to "Photos / Media / Files" to allow the app to be installed on the SD Card. We do not read your photos, media or files.

Important Notice: You must not rely on this application alone to remember to take your prescriptions or to replace medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always consult with your healthcare professional.

Drugs.com does not provide medical or treatment advice. Always consult with a physician.

Follow us on Twitter @drugscom for tips and updates.

About Drugs.com

Drugs.com is the most popular, comprehensive and up-to-date source of drug information online. Providing free, peer-reviewed, accurate and independent data on more than 24,000 prescription drugs, over-the-counter medicines & natural products. Drugs.com is a multiple Webby Award nominee and attracts more than 25 million U.S. visitors per month (Comscore, June 2016).

App Support

If you have any feature requests, suggestions or you simply need help, please visit https://www.drugs.com/apps/support/ and our responsive support team will prioritize your request.

comments: Love this app. I enter every new med I need to start before I take it and it lets me know all the potential interactions with my current meds. I first started using it after I had started a new med and had some bad interactions. Even my doctor hadn't warned me about them. I was able to request a med change and get it resolved. It's also helped me avoid several over the counter meds that I wouldn't have known not to take otherwise. There are a lot of other features, but that's the main one I use.

I really was impressed with this app and all it offered. Until I spent over an hour inputting all my drugs, then got a message that the app had an update and I needed to update it, turn it off, then re-open. Upon doing so, all the descriptive info, like dosages, etc. were gone. The next day at my MD visit, I was unable to pull up a simple list of my drugs. When I put in a drug name, nothing I'd put in was available. So I'd wasted all my time entering everything. Won't do it again! Delete!
Very informative,but couldn't put all of my medications in. The app didn't allow past a certain number.

This app has an extensive list of available medications and medical conditions. Having the ability to list personal medications is very helpful, especially if you have 2 or more. It is great for checking medication and food interactions, as well as looking at side effects of each medication.

My mother is a nurse and she uses this app so I thought I'd give it a try. I am a dietetic intern and this app has really been very informative in my rotations. I bought the premium subscription because the ad placement made the app difficult to use, but the ad free upgrade for a year is really affordable. Thank you for this app!

title: Pill Reminder-HK
description:
Pill reminder app is designed to allow you to take good control of your worry-free life and keep a record of your well-being.  Missing a pill will never be a worry again! This app supports all the birth control pills available in Hong Kong and know when to remind you and when not to while you‚Äôre on pill break (if applicable). All the functions in the app are free with no hidden feature for paid upgrade. 

Features: 
- Pill-taking reminder and tracker
- Snooze function - If you want, the app will keep reminding you until you have taken your pill. 
- Intimacy, symptoms and bleeding pattern tracker
- Customize the number of pills in the pack ‚Äì 21/0, 21/7, 24/4, 28/0
- Customize missed pill window of your pills, your alarm tone, (secret) reminder message, reminder time and interval
- Tips on pill intake
- Reminds you to schedule your checkup with your healthcare provider
- Your diary that contains your pill intake, bleeding and other annotation that can be exported for your doctor appointment
- Supports both Chinese and English

title: Medication Reminders Widget
description:
Get the essential medication reminders application:

- Take a picture instead of typing the medication name, or vice versa, or both.
- Automatic & regular re-reminders with adjustable snooze interval until taken
- Auto-updating home screen widget with "Take early" button when it's approaching time to take, and "Take now" button when missed
- Built-in schedules / recalls previous choices - for quick setting
- Full reminder screen with pictures and/or text when it's time to take, showing all meds to be taken then on one page. Option to have them on separate pages.
- Reminder sound can be set to any ringtone (long) or notification (short) sound on your phone
- Sound off in silent mode
- Vibrate can be set to repeat, one-shot, or off, with adjustable duration.
- Touching any reminder screen stops sound/vibration
- Status bar notifications at the same time
- Re-reminds if not taken after an adjustable time interval, for all meds. Puts these with other scheduled meds if their alarm times coincide.
- All alarms survive even if phone was restarted, switched off, battery ran out or battery was removed, for any duration.
- Alarms take daylight savings time into account
- Tapping home screen widget brings up meds in order of time to be taken, earliest first, with "Take now" buttons for meds that have been missed (at the top) and "Take early" buttons for meds whose times are approaching, and an "Add new med" button.
- Edit/delete med by long press
- Settings available via menu/options on the same ("My meds") screen

For basic instructions see screenshots. Please use this page as reference.

comments: Used to work great now glitches out. Doesn't go off when scheduled and constantly reopens the page so I cant press the buttons. Sometimes can get it other times i have to restart my phone. Still no others widgets like this available so I hope it gets fixed. S9+
Happy with this widget,most of the time working well compared to others.
Cant set hourly and have to tap one minute at a time to set time. What a stupid waste of my time!
I got more than what I need in this app.
Was a great app before you put the d---- ads in it. I would rather pay a little and have it ad free. It was a 5 star till you put the ads in it. I take a lot of meds and depend on it

title: Repeat Alarm - Recurring reminder
description:
‚óâ What's this app?
There are lots of things to do repeatedly every day.
You forget those things occasionally due to forgetfulness...
And it's hard to watch the clock every minute to check it.
It is also cumbersome to set the alarm on each thing that is repeated several times a day. 
‚ÄúRepeat Alarm‚Äù app is a reminder app that helps you not to forget these repetitive work. 




‚óâ For whom is it useful?
It is useful for anyone who has things to do repeatedly at regular time intervals.
The way of usage is various and infinite; many current users utilize it as follows: 

üïí [Hourly Reminder]
- Hourly Reminder is the most basic and beloved type of use.
- Hourly Reminder notifies you every hour with alarms.
- You can use ringtones(mp3) or voice as alarms. 
- Hourly Alarm.

üíä [Medicine Reminder]
- Taking medicine on time and always stay healthy.
- Reminds you to take medicine for rhinitis, diabetes, blood pressure, or vitamin consumption. 
- Medicine Alarm.

üëÅÔ∏è [Eye Drops Reminder]
- Management after eye care is really important.
- Do not forget your timely dose of eye drops and artificial tears.
- Eye Drops Alarm / Artificial Tears Alarm. 

üö∞ [Drinking Water Reminder]
- Drinking water is one of the easiest and best practices for your health.
- It is an alarm for a good habit of drinking water for your health. 
- Drinking Water Alarm.

‚è≥ [[Extending Reserved Time]
- Do not worry about the reserved time on your seat at the library; just concentrate on studying!
- It helps you to remember to extend the reserved time on your seat at the library.

ü§∏ [Stretching Reminder]
- Stretching is necessary for people with a sedentary lifestyle.
- It reminds you the time to stretch and prevent neck/waist pains. 
- Stretching Timer.

üò¥ [Break Reminder]
- Taking rest is just as important as working hard.
- It reminds you to take breaks during the hours of duty, work, exercise, or study. 
- Break Time Reminder.

üëç [Creating Good Habits]
- Repeating good practices creates a good habit.
- A reminder that helps you create good habits. 
- Habit Reminder.



‚óâ Is it difficult to use?
Only four fields are required to set alarms!üòÅ
‚úì Alarm Name
‚úì Repeat Day
‚úì Start and End Time
‚úì Alarming Intervals
Easily set up your own alarms by the hour, time, or week with simple settings. 
So, the app works as a timer with interval and repetition functionality and reminds you what to do timely. 




‚óâ What are notable features?
üìù [Putting on Records]
- You can put on records on the performances with simple notes whenever the alarm sounds.
- You can check your history at any time in the app.

üé∂ [Setting a Sound for each Alarm]
- You can choose a mode for each alarm: sound, vibration, silent.
- You can set the ringtone and volume for each alarm.
- When using earphones, the alarm is heard only through the earphones. 

üó£Ô∏è [Voice Alarm Functions]
- You can use voice alarm that speaks the name of the alarm and the current time. 

‚è∞ [Unlimited Number of Alarms]
- If you have many things to do repeatedly, register them in the alarm list without limit. 




‚óâ Do I need to allow any permission?
[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]
- Access to the storage space is required to use music files(mp3, etc) for alarm sounds.
- The permission is optional and you can use it without the permission, but alarm sounds may not be available. 




‚óâ Concluding the Description‚Ä¶
I'm very happy that the app I made for myself out of need is helping so many people.
This app is becoming even more useful thanks to your support and feedback.
We will continue to strive to provide good service.
Thank you for your continued usage and interest.‚ù§Ô∏è

recentChanges:
‚úì Fixed an issue that caused the app to crash when exporting the history list to Excel.

comments: The app works so that's three stars. But not as I intended. Maybe it's a misunderstanding on the apps name. For me, "Repeating" means that the alarm continues to ring until it is shut off. This alarm shuts off after a maximum of one minute. The developer's understanding of "repeating" is that it repeats every week. The Google calendar already does that so there is no need for this app.

im using it to remind myself to stop touching my head and pluck out my hair. you can even record if you did the task or not. good for referencing your progress. would reccomend to others with compulsive habits they wish to stop. a little ugly. would like some customisability for colors at least. but i understand that can be distracting for some users.

I dislike required interaction with alarms... excepting wake up alarms! :) So why a "5 star" rating? Premium upgrade! In addition to being AdFree, Repeat Alarm Premium upgrade has uninterrupted "mode"! I use multiple repetitive 5-second voice reminder/alerts which "speak" and immediately restore previous device activity! ...video play resumes, gmail editing (including VTT) is not even paused! Repeat Alarm Premium provides useful reminders without suffering required interruptions or ads.

Very useful reminder alarms that work alongside other apps. Not sure why but a whale has appeared over the reminder screen in the last day but still. Adverts are a bit annoying but bearable considering it's otherwise a free to use the app. Thanks
It does exactly as I need it to... I have premium.. it was worth it to me. Simple. Easy. Impactful. Anytime you need a reminder or an alarm, this is your golden ticket

title: medicine - pills time reminder

To modify an existing  medicine select the medicine from saved medicines list (main screen) then add your modifications then select "save changes". title: Pill Reminder : Medication Alarm and Pill Tracker
description:
Pill Reminder reminds you to take the right medicine at right time. Enjoy the best Pill reminder, flexible schedule options, refill reminder and pill tracker.

Pill Reminder is easy, beautiful, and reliable... what every patient just needs. Forget about your old pillbox! It's useful for chronic patients as well as normal forgetful people with occasional common cold. 

Receive a beautiful picture of the day as motivation to take your medicine. Involve family and friends with MyTherapy Team and successfully manage together. And you can even have your family see if you‚Äôve missed a med despite the pill reminder, so they can help you stay on track. Pill Reminder is for you, no matter if you are taking antibiotic medicines or deal with hypertension, atrial fibrillation, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, multiple sclerosis, anxiety or depression that are often complicated. 

================================

**  Flexible medicine schedule options  **

- Every days, weeks, or months schedule to take your medicine at fixed times (to 12 times) every defined frequency of days, weeks, or months.
- Every hour interval schedule to take your medicine an interval after your last time of taking the dose. You set the interval (number of hours) and starting date & time.
- Track your medicine: view medicine log and track your taken, skipped doses medicines for the past days, weeks and months.
- Delete a medicine or deactivate it to keep it for reference.

================================

**  Conveient Reminder  **

- Reliable reminder along the day no matter how much you reboot your device
- Alert screen shows up even when your device is locked
- Convenient alert styles: Alert Forever, Notification Only
- Customize your reminder: tone, volume
- Set custom reminder tone: pick from your favourite ringtones
- Mark your medicine doses as taken, skipped or leave them as missed
- Refill reminder: reminds you to refill your meds if they go under the threshold
- Pill reminder app for all medications
- Refill reminder: reminds you to refill your meds if they go under the threshold
- Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
- Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health journal
- Easily view, create, edit, remove, active and deactive medication reminder from the reminder list.
- Quick configuration of multiple notification times under each medication reminder. 
- Smart notification that combines all reminders at the same time for ease of viewing. 
- Press on a notification to view the full list of medications needed at the time. 
- When desired, slide a medication reminder to the left directly on the reminder list to expose the option to remove. Slide to the right to hide the option again.

================================

title: MedManage - Medication Reminder App and Daily Log
description:
Use MedManage to help log and manage your medications, or help take care of your family members.

MedManage has a wide range of uses including monitoring chronic diseases, elder and geriatric care management, birth control reminders, and even to help monitor opioid and other potential dangerous substance abuse.

Use MedManage's cloud system to create a Medication List of your current and previous prescriptions that follows you (and your family caregiver) everywhere you go. Once you've entered your medications, you can choose to get reminders and log how well you've been sticking to your schedule. By keeping a digital log of your medication intake, it can help your healthcare providers manage your care better!

Ditch the post it notes and medication log sheet excel templates.
Easily create custom medication lists, schedules, and pill
reminder alarms with the MedManage medication reminder app.

Take a look at some of the screens and features you'll see when using the MedManage app. This includes a medication list, calendar, and digital log you can access on the go.

We follow the Universal Medication Schedule (UMS) system which attempts to find the best way to display medication directions. By using the most up to date research on medication management combined with cloud technology, MedManage can provide a powerful and portable way to track your medications.

Download MedManage for Android to start logging your medication history and Adherence today! MedManage is flat out the simplest and most modern way to keep track of your medications.

title: PetDesk - Pet Health Reminders
description:
Our goal is to help your pets live longer, happier, and healthier lives. PetDesk puts you at the center of your pet‚Äôs health needs by seamlessly connecting you with the best pet care professionals near you. Now it‚Äôs easy to be the best pet parent you can be.

Effortlessly manage your pet‚Äôs health in one place with these indispensable features:

APPOINTMENTS
With our 24/7 appointment request tool, your favorite pet care providers are always just a few taps away.

REMINDERS, MESSAGES AND TO DO‚ÄôS
Sync reminders and add custom to-do‚Äôs to your calendar.

PROVIDERS
Add and quickly view your pet care professionals in one place (veterinary clinics, grooming facilities, boarding, pet daycare, and more!).

LOYALTY
Earn points for every dollar spent at your favorite pet care provider locations.

MEDICATION REQUESTS
Easily request medication refills for your pets.
descriptionHTML:
Our goal is to help your pets live longer, happier, and healthier lives. PetDesk puts you at the center of your pet‚Äôs health needs by seamlessly connecting you with the best pet care professionals near you. Now it‚Äôs easy to be the best pet parent you can be.

summary: All you need to manage your pet's life on the same device where you manage yours
recentChanges:
Thank you for using the PetDesk app!
We‚Äôve fixed a bug that allowed users to submit appointment requests to veterinary clinics, during times when appointments were not available based on the schedule of the associated veterinary clinic or hospital.
comments: My vet provider does use this app; however, there is no record of my puppy's previous appointments, vaccinations, and I get constant notifications that he's overdue for his second set of shots when he's finished them all. Have another pet that's on several meds but no meds or appts listed on her record. You can't update anything yourself - no records, just basic stuff you already know like your pet's name.

Took multiple attempts to create an account without the process failing. The only error message was "Please try again in a moment". Then when I finally got my account created, my password didn't work. I reset it twice and still was never able to login. App simply does not work.

After 3 weeks I finally gave up and dismissed my most recent appointment request. If the providers don't respond, this is essentially a place to keep a list of your pets (with a single photo). Since ther's no way for owners to add any medical info, or even a description of a pet (other than species & gender), I don't find this very useful. There are other apps that offer much better record keeping for pets. This is too dependent on the provider's management.

Love it!! I find it a very useful tool. Especially during COVID. Something that would improve the experience is an "I'm here" button. The Panera app has it. It allows you to give a quick vehicle description and let them know you have arrived.

This app has been so helpful by sending reminders related to my pet's health care. It's super easy to schedule appointments and allows me to keep all vaccinations up to date. I highly recommend this app to help anyone care for their furry friends.

title: Medsmart Meds & Pill Reminder App
description:
Medsmart¬Æ Meds and Pill Reminder makes it easier to take control and track your medicines. It is designed to function within the United Kingdom. Manage your medicines by scanning the barcode on the medicine packaging, get smart customised meds and pill reminders for yourself and others.


Happy customer reviews:

- ‚ÄúBrilliant app!‚Äù

‚ÄúMy go to app to track my medication and to remind me to take my medication. Also, great customer service, as they're very helpful and willing to help if a medication isn't logged in to their database/system. I highly recommend this app.‚Äù - Eleshia H


- ‚ÄúGreat app for managing medicines.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis app is perfect for keeping track of and managing medications. The barcode scanner function makes it super easy to add medicines. If you or your family take medication, I would recommend this app!‚Äù- Gary S


Featured in:

-	Insider Uk

-	The National

-	The Scotsman


Medsmart¬Æ Features:

Add medicines and profiles:

‚Ä¢ Scan medicine barcode with barcode scanner to add to medicine cabinet

‚Ä¢ Type in barcode number of medicines to add to medicine cabinet

‚Ä¢ Create profile for personal medicines

‚Ä¢ Create profile for someone else you care for and their medicines and managed the medicines of the whole family, including loved ones you may be caring for

‚Ä¢ Switch between profiles of the people you care for and your own profile

‚Ä¢ Give a medicine a custom name to remember it by (e.g. My diabetes medicine)

‚Ä¢ Share your year of birth/gender & region you live in for Medsmart¬Æ to help the healthcare community make better medicines

‚Ä¢ Select any ingredients in a medicine you may be allergic to

‚Ä¢ Easily add health condition/ medicine and allergies to your medicine cabinet through the add button



Everyday use:

‚Ä¢ Set up reminders for your medicines

‚Ä¢ Group reminder together to only get 1 reminder

‚Ä¢ Mark your medicine as taken, skipped or reschedule it for later in your medicine log

‚Ä¢ Keep a medicine log of what time and date you took the medicine

‚Ä¢ Check when you started taking the medicine (when it was added to Medsmart¬Æ ) through the 'edit reminder' page

‚Ä¢ The medicine cabinet will show active and inactive medicines for easy access when asked by a Healthcare professional

‚Ä¢ Get alerts when an ingredient has been selected as a potential allergen

‚Ä¢ Alert needs to be resolved through the resolution centre before it disappears from the medicine cabinet

‚Ä¢ Share a version of your medicine cabinet with yourself or someone else by sending it through an email in the App

‚Ä¢ View videos on how to use the medicine you have scanned

‚Ä¢ View videos on how the medicine you have scanned works

‚Ä¢ Connect your medicine to the health condition your Healthcare professional has told you it's for so that when another healthcare professional asks you, you have it easily available

‚Ä¢ Some medicine will show side effects of the medicine

‚Ä¢ See the ingredients of your medicines

‚Ä¢ Suspend a medicine if you are no longer using it so that you don't get notifications when you don't want them

‚Ä¢ Share how you feel with the App

‚Ä¢ Contact Talking Medicines with any queries or feedback you may have


Medsmart¬Æ is a lot more than your average period tracker, pill reminder, daily reminders, health tracker or medicine tracker - It is all in one


Download Medsmart ¬Æ - Meds and Pill reminder today and take control of your Medicines


Our terms of use privacy policy: https://gomedsmart.com/legal

If you're not able to scan a medicine please try again, and if the medicine is not in our database, we'd love to hear from you. Please contact us on info@gomedsmart.com and we will make sure to add it to Medsmart¬Æ as soon as we can!

comments: After reading the terms and conditions this app is not really for helping patients it's actual purpose is to collect data also you can do a covid survey every day to see what your personal movements are to then share the information with 3rd parties, you also have to get permission from your health authority to use the app as it's a legally binding contract. There really needs to be an alternative to this barcode scanning idea, only one of the four meds I take had a scanable barcode and even that it didnt recognize.

summary: Medication management app
developerAddress: 2001 Route 46, Waterview Plaza, Suite 310, Parsippany, NJ 07054
comments: The notes in this application VERY CLEARLY "A REMINDER APPLICATION " why on earth do people complain about this very reason.

This meds list app is just 'ok'.  They need to add some kind of sorting feature for the list...alphabetical, perhaps sort by OTC vs presciption, frequency, etc...  Even a drag/drop manual sorting would be useful.  Otherwise nice, simple app.

title: Birth Control Pill Reminder & Tracker
description:
This application will help you remember every day to take your birth control pills, so that you don't miss a day.

Main features: 
If you are looking for an application that will remind you everyday of when to take your birth control pill, this is the app for you.

-100% customizable pill reminder app: Compatible with all types of pills, set the number of days to take the pill, number of placebo pills, etc.  
-Reminder app with alarm:  Set the time that you want the application to remind you to take the pill. Also, you can have the application repeat the alarm every five minutes until you've finally taken the pill.  Remember to take the pill and never forget again! 
-Contraceptive pill calendar: use the pill tracker to see when you took the pill before, when you have to take it next, and when to take the placebos.
-It's compatible with the most popular anti-contraceptive method: the birth control pill. 
-Notes: the application allows you to add notes every day that you take the birth control pill, so you can jot down how you feel, or anything else going on, so that later you can refer back to it or check it with your doctor or gynecologist.  

We hope that this medication reminder for birth control pills will be very useful to you.  If you have any issues, questions, or suggestions on how we can improve, don't hesitate to contact us.

summary: Don't forget to take your birth control pills. A daily birth control reminder!
recentChanges: Problem with placebo notifications fixed
comments: I've used this app for several months and so far has been very useful. It reminds me right on time, with repetitions if needed. One thing that bothers me though is the following: my reminder is at 10PM, and sometimes I forget to take the pill and end up doing it after midnight. All the time, the app keeps reminding me to take it, so after midnight I mark my pill as taken on the day before (since is past midnight), but it keeps reminding me to take it on the present day even if it's not the hour.
I just love getting a loud, unskippable ad IMMEDIATELY after installing this app. Haha, no.

This app obviously doesn't have the user in mind. Upon opening the app, you automatically get an advertisement that you can only skip after 5 seconds. Like hello, guys? I haven't even started to use the app but you already play an ad immediately after I start up the app? No notifications or alarms whatsoever either. I wish I could give this app zero stars. DO NOT INSTALL.
I've been using this app for years. The last 2 months it has not reminded me to take my pill at least 5 times. I don't know what happened to make it do this, but it's way too many for me.

App reminder is set to 9pm, no repetition. Despite this, a notification is popping up every few minutes. If you go to check the settings to ensure constant reminders are off, app will reset all the information that was saved previously. For that reason, uninstalled!

title: MyMedSchedule Plus
description:
"Why MyMedSchedule Plus?

FREE
MyMedSchedule Plus is 100% free with no add ons.

TRUSTED BY HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS SINCE 2004
MyMedSchedule and MedActionPlan programs have been used and trusted by hundreds of thousands of healthcare providers across hundreds of healthcare systems to help patients and caregivers follow their med schedules.

TAKE THE RIGHT DOSE AT THE RIGHT TIME
Automatically receive reminders for all of your pills and supplements. You can mark meds taken directly from the notification screen or by opening the app.

LET PROVIDERS UPDATE YOUR MEDICATIONS FOR YOU
If your healthcare providers use MedActionPlan PRO, they can send updates to your medication schedule directly into MyMedSchedule Plus so you don't have to add medications yourself.

MANAGE MEDICATIONS FOR YOUR LOVED ONES
You can create a separate profile for each family member.

MEDICATION IMAGES HELP YOU IDENTIFY THE RIGHT PILLS
Pictures are available for most popular branded medications, and you can add your own photos too.

IMPORTANT MEDICATION INFORMATION
MyMedSchedule Plus lists why you are taking each of your medications along with simple instructions for how to best take them.

REFILL REMINDERS
Easily schedule alerts that tell you when you need to order refills for your prescriptions.

YOUR INFORMATION IS SECURE
Your personal health information is protected with military grade AES 256-bit SSL. We follow all HIPAA standards for protecting your health information. We do not sell lists of customers, users, or others to third parties.

The main sections in MyMedSchedule Plus are:

TODAY
Tap on the Today tab to see all the medications you have scheduled for the day. Swipe right to mark a dose as taken, or swipe left to snooze or reschedule a dose.

INBOX
Receive updates from your healthcare provider, including changes to your medication schedule. The Inbox also collects your refill reminders and opportunities to save money on your prescriptions.

PROGRESS
We keep track of doses you mark taken so you can see how well you adhere to your medication schedule. If you are connected to a healthcare provider via MedActionPlan PRO, your provider will be able to follow your progress too.

MED LIST
This is a complete list of all your current medications. It's simple to make changes to dosing, refill schedules, or reminder times. It's easy to add new medications or remove discontinued ones.

CARE TEAM
Keep a handy list of your healthcare providers, friends, and family members. 

QUESTIONS?
We are here to help. Contact us at info4@medactionplan.com.

Thank you,
The MyMedSchedule Plus team
"

comments: Can't really comment beyond this app was recommended so installed and no luck. Invalid email, invalid password at first few attempts then decided to try forgot password didnt like my email mail so I can't go past go. Did at first use auto populate on email address but have typed in each character individually. At a basic loss, not enough options to trouble shoot much beyond install, reinstall, email, password. ?? I will keep shopping.
I like how the meds are listed, but I wish it had a built in alarm or worked with device's alarm/clock. I ended up setting personal alarms since this feature was not available.

Useless app. It is down more than it works. No point in having a progress tracker for your meds when it goes down for a day or more (has not worked/would not open for the past 3.5 days for me, so I just uninstalled it), and screws your progression tracking up anyway. May be small to some (since you track and know when you're taking your meds), but it is a flawed tool in a flawed app. Very unhappy with it, liked the old app MUCH better.

I love this app - it makes a world of difference in managing my son's meds post transplant. The only feature I could wish for is the ability to share updates (not just printouts) with another caregiver. The most important problem is that I can't see a way to undo marking a med as taken if I enter it by mistake. Obviously that shouldn't be easy, but it would be valuable.

Just saw in an email reply that you intend to add "health tracker" to MyMedSchedule Plus. Thank you. it is a very valuable feature. Please don't take down MyMedSchedule until after "health tracker" is added so that users have a chance to migrate their data. Its now Oct 2019 and still no "health tracker." Has it been abandoned?

description:
Did you take your pill on time ?
Forget to take medicine on time to time ?
Want to remind doctor visit on time ?

Pill Reminder App is an amazing application that helps you to take your pill at the right time.
If you forget to take pill on the same time on day time.
Here you can remind every hours, specific times, daily, weekly, days of the week & set as your time.
Now don't worry you can set reminder for the pill taken time as you want.

Medicine Reminder with Alarm application helps to remind your medicine time to time with alarm & notification style.
If you forget to take your medication & don't want to compromise on your health than organize your medicine timer.
Show all your reminder at one place for easy access.

Doctor appointments reminder helps to when your appointments booked with doctor & forget to visit then set here reminder to visit.
A smart reminder helps remind doctor visit on particular time or time ago also.

- Notification with date wise and day wise time schedule.

Don't forget to take medicine on time for good health but if you forget then "Pill Reminder App - Medicine Reminder with Alarm" application remind you via alarm & notification.

title: Lady Pill Reminder & Birth Controll Tracker
description:
Lady Pill Reminder is your personal contraception and birth control pills reminder what helps track pills and take it in time. Easy to use and setup, just choose start day, desired time of alarm and input your pills period, that's all. 

Lady Pill Reminder:
Everyday tracker of taken pills with a month view interface
Contraception & birth control pill reminder
Alarm notifications for pills
Everyday note app to describe your mood or emotions
Your personal tool for tracking contraception and birth control pills

Lady Pill Reminder is all what you need to track birth control pills, you can choose any custom period of pills taking and lady pill reminder will calculate your taking period for current year.

With our birth control pills reminder you can easily plan your vacation or trip, because it shows month by month taking period for years.

App will alarm you through notifications when you need to take your birth control pill, so you will never forget to take pill in time.

Miss a pill for some reasons? Point this inside lady pill reminder to not forget and maybe, after consultation with a doctor, change your pill take period.

To reveal month days on the birth control pill tracker screen, just tap on month name. To revert to pill tracker tap it again.

If you have any suggestions about Lady Pill Reminder feel free to contact me through email

title: Birth Control Pill Reminder
description:
Birth Control Pill Reminder is a reliable and easy to use oral contraceptive app that helps you to take your birth control pill everyday. Must have contraception app for every woman who forgets to take her birth control pill.

Birth control pill reminder is compatible with all birth control pill types. You can set your own oral contraceptive taking plan with custom number of birth control pills per packet: 21/7, 24/4, 28/0, 84/7, or any other. You can also add placebo (non active) pill reminder during your period or automatically pause contraception reminder on break days.

If you want, birth control reminder app will repeat to remind you at regular intervals until you've taken your birth control pill. App also will remind you the day when you should to buy new oral contraceptive. You can customize your reminder message to hide the true meaning from other people when getting notified. Birth control pill reminder doesn't need to be running in order to receive notifications and no internet connection is needed too.

Moreover, birth control pill reminder app has allow you to add and manage any contraceptives and other pills, medications, vitamins or whatever you need. Just add this information to your schedule, receive daily notifications and take your meds.

Contraceptive pill reminder app is designed to give you the best tools, that would match your personal needs and would make your life much more easier. App makes sure you'll never miss any oral contraceptive or other pills ever again. From now you can truly be free of worries. 

Birth control reminder app free features include:

- Contraceptive pill reminder
- Birth control refill reminder
- Detailed log of all of your oral contraceptive
- Different backgrounds and color schemes

Surprise! Just now as a gift along with the downloading this birth control reminder app you are getting a free trial 14 days access to all of premium features including ovulation days and period reminder. Just try to see how easy and useful it is.

Please note that birth control pill reminder app is not intended to be medical advice. You need to consult your physician if you're having some issues.

comments: Very good. The only issue i have with it, is that occasionally the notifications stop. But there is a short manual on how to fix that. ( I'm just gonna write it down here for ppl who don't know where to find it) If that happens just go to the settings bar at the top left corner, then choose "incoming messages", and then to " Do you receive all notifications?". There you can find various settings and also how to enable the alarm again.

Very good app, it's great at reminding me to take my meds and if I don't respond to the notification it'll notify me every 15 minutes until I do so it's a fantastic reminder. Cute themes, don't particularly enjoy the amount of adds but I don't need to open the app often so it works out.

This app helped me remember my pills and track my period, but suddenoy the period tracking got blocked by a paywall, and ridiculous amount of unskippable ads started playing. My period is horribly irregular and I had the dates saved on this app, but i cant even access it anymore. Don't recommend. Gonna move to a different app.

Use to work very well, then notifications stopped popping up, and even when I marked down that I took meds I wouldn't show in the app. Now there's unreasonable pop up ads with this. Kinda messy if you ask me.
It is easy to use and actually works... The first app that I have used skipped the alarms so many times... And I was upset

title: Pill Reminder üíäüîî & Meds Manager - MediKeep
description:
How do you usually manage and track the medication you should take during the day? MediKeep is a free pill reminder and medication tracker app that helps you to remember what medication you should take and when you should take. 

üíäKey Features
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications and supplements
‚Ä¢ Pill tracker with health diary for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢ Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities and well-being as a comprehensive health journal
‚Ä¢ Share with a family member.
‚Ä¢ Pharmacy map that is global.
‚Ä¢ Pharmacy inventory and personal notes.

So, if you are always having difficulties in tracking and managing the pill and medication you should take, and looking for an easy to use yet advanced pill tracker app, download MediKeep for free on your Android device and never miss a single dose again.

MediKeep, the free pill tracker app for Android, comes with a clean and neat design and the interface is so user-friendly that you will get the whole idea as soon as adding your medicine, supplements, and vitamin inventory into the app. You get to either manually add the details of the medicine or scan the bar code (support us by building the database) and let the pill tracker app take care of the rest.

Add medicine, supplements by scanning the bar codes or add manually if bar code was not found (we are growing our database day by day). Thanks to Your patience and contribution! 

‚è∞*Comprehensive meds reminder*
You can get expire date information and reminder. Set pill reminders. Quantity with stock reminders. Find nearest pharmacy - globally! Handy when travelling. Health diary for notes about drug side effects or health events, log Your symptoms. Share medicine box with family or caretakers.

So, download MediKeep, the free pill reminder app for Android, on your phone or tablet and make sure that you never forget taking an important pill. The refill reminder feature notifies you when to buy new medicine.

Stay tuned and let us know about any bugs, questions, feature requests or any other suggestions.

title: Pill Timer - Medication Tracker & Alarm Reminder
description:
Pill Timer helps you keep track of all of your medications.

Pill Timer has an elaborate prescription form that has descriptive options such as whether to take your medication before or after meals. It also gives you a custom way to input your dosage and dosage period.

The Prescription form has a reminders section that can add the reminder based on your dosage interval in a day that spans between the start date and end date of your prescription.
Pill Timer makes you manage more than one medication and edit the reminders/details of the prescription.
With this useful pill reminder you will never miss your pill again. You will create healthy habits of taking your medication at the right scheduled time so that you can get better.

Upcoming features include; Interaction checker, Drugs description usage & side effects, Pregnancy & Breastfeeding notifications, Drugs regional approvals alerts( FDA, EMA, PPB) and Healthcare Professional section.

title: Pill Reminder and Medication Tracker - MediSure
description:
Never miss a medication with timely reminders from MediSure.

Manage medications
- Schedule medications to get timely reminders. Wizard to generate reminder times based on hour interval.
- Duplicate brand medicine alert to prevent overdose.
- Snooze, reschedule medicines if medication needs to be delayed.
- Take unplanned medications without the need for scheduling.
- Schedule reminders for doctor prescription and self medications.
- Schedule medications for daily, weekdays and days interval.
- Optional refill reminders can be set on medicine.
- Stop medication reminders during an active schedule.

Doctor appointment
- Create doctor appointment reminders to help reach your doctor on-time
- Add notes to appointment.

Health measurements
- Add measurements during medication.
- Visualize latest 7 measurements for a quick glimpse health improvement.

Family members
- Create your family members and manage enteries for them.
- Medicines, appointments and measurements are isolated from each member.

Reports
- Get daily, weekly, monthly and date range reports for medication and measurements.
- Email pdf report to self and doctor.

Settings
- Ability to backup and restore data.
- Data backup is encrypted.
- Your data remains with you.
- Set your favorite notification sound.
- Choose from a selection of 7 themes.
- Measurement unit can be set to imperial / metric unit.

comments: I've rated this app before, but, I know there are people that may doubt the utility of any apps. I have a complicated medication regimen, and this is the best app I've tried, solves all my challenges. Plus the development team has helped me out a few time already, and I can't praise these people and their product enough. Patience and understanding have been the cornerstone of all their work with me. Thank you all very much!

Very good app for people taking medicines on a daily basis..

it should be easy to say "take two pills every 4 hours", but it isn't.  AppTrailz Support (see below) says "On the "Medication" screen, tap the 'LIST' icon next to 'Reminder Times' label. On the popup you will be able to generate take times based on "take x pills every y hours". I tried this before I gave up and created this review. There is some strange start and stop time thing (I don't recall exactly) that makes no sense.
Never missed my medication after installing this app. Very reliable

title: Mango Health
description:
Mango Health simplifies your daily health routine, to make it fun, easy, and rewarding. App feature highlights include: reminders to take your medicine and keep up with healthy habits, drug interaction info, a health history, and best of all - points and rewards, just for taking care of you! 

HOW MANGO HEALTH SIMPLIFIES YOUR HEALTH:

RELIABLE MEDICINE REMINDERS
Schedule customized pill reminders for medications and supplements. Our user-friendly reminders are easy to schedule and edit, giving you the peace of mind that comes with knowing you‚Äôll never miss a dose. 

HEALTHY HABIT REMINDERS
Set up custom reminders to drink water, record your mood, check your blood glucose, take your blood pressure, or watch your weight. Our habit reminders make managing your health as easy as possible, so you can focus on the rest of your life.

DRUG INTERACTION WARNINGS
Once you‚Äôve added a medication, Mango Health alerts you to side effects and potentially dangerous drug interactions with other meds, supplements, or food. Color-coded messages also make it easy to understand the severity of interaction warnings.

POINTS AND REWARDS
Each day you take your medicine correctly, you‚Äôll earn points. Points unlock the chance to win rewards, including gift cards from your favorite stores, donations to leading charities, and more. 

DAILY HEALTH DIARY
We automatically log your health history, so you can look back and see what you did and when. We make it easy to reference your health history at your next appointment to make sure your prescription and treatment plan is right for you. 

TIMELY REFILL ALERTS
Our real-time count of your medicine on hand helps ensure you won‚Äôt run out of pills. Mango Health gives advance warning when it‚Äôs time to order a refill.

Mango Health has been featured on CNN, Self Magazine, the Los Angeles Times, and more. See what people are saying:

‚ÄúA new app called Mango Health aims to make taking daily meds (like birth control) less of a chore ‚Äî and less of an after thought ‚Äî by rewarding users with real-life rewards. The best part? It‚Äôs free.‚Äù - Self Magazine

‚ÄúEver get a complicated prescription from a doctor? There are apps out there to help you remember to take your medicine. The latest is Mango Health's iPhone app, designed to make managing medications and nutritional supplements easier, safer and maybe even exciting by using games.‚Äù - Los Angeles Times

Read more reviews below or better yet, try it for yourself! It‚Äôs 100% free. We hope you enjoy Mango Health! 

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mangohealth 
Follow us on Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Mangohealth   
Follow us on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/mangohealth  
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mangohealth

comments: I honestly love this app. I have used in on and off for years. I recently started using this app again this year. I have been trying to register an account with Mango, but each time I try it gives me an error of "registration unavailable" - every time. So 4 stars. I also wish you could add your own habits to the app. Like a custom habit that you could edit, and congifure to fit your needs. I use other apps for habits I can't track in Mango. Would be nice to be able to track it all in one place.

It is great for putting your meds in and keeping track with what you eat. What it does not do is take into consideration not ALL people are glued to their phones to add the information in when it wants it. Yes you can add it in later but does not give you your points. As well as not being linked to other apps like my Samsung watch which keeps track of my steps and this app does not even register 1 step and again does not give me points. How about calories since your tracking food?

This is my go to app to input my health information. It would be nice if it would connect to other apps like Fitbit, Garmin, Onetouch for glucose monitor results so i only have to input in one app and Mango picks it up. Also would be nice if reminders can be adjusted based on weekdays or weekends. I wear my watch to bed to monitor sleep and my watch buzzes at 6am on weekends because I have it programmed for 6am on weekdays.

This app really pushes you to take your medication and other healthy habits of your choice. I've only used this for 2 days now but I already appreciate how helpful it is. I love the leveling system and the rewards you can get the more you stay on track. A+ app in my book. :)

Have not received a reminder notification for the last 4 days. All notifications are turned on and had been working, although it had been messing up randomly prior to last update. Not useful to me anymore without the reminders.

title: Popit Smart Pill Reminder
description:
Stop missing pills with this AD-FREE app!

The Popit Smart Pill Reminder App helps you stay on track of your medication. It works with or without the Popit Sense smart pill tracker and effectively supports your medical treatment. 

Together with Popit Sense the solution has been proven to reduce missed pills by over 80% in a clinical setting.

EFFORTLESS - Together with Popit Sense the app will automatically log pills taken and remind only if you have forgotten to take your pill.

SMART REMINDERS - No more needless alerts. Be reminded ONLY if you miss your pill (this feature requires Popit Sense).

PILL HISTORY - See how you have been taking your pills and if you already took it today.

The Popit Smart Pill Reminder app is free to use.

You can get Popit Sense from: https://shop.popit.io/

title: MedLeaf Medication Reminder
description:
An easy and quick way to set up daily reminders at specific times to take desired amount of medicine, pills and supplements. 

There is no registration needed and no internet connection required. Just download and start.

Functions:
Easily view, create, edit and remove medication reminder from the reminder list.
Quick configuration of multiple notification times under each medication reminder.  
Smart notification that combines all reminders at the same time for ease of viewing. 
Press on a notification to view the full list of medications needed at the time. 
Uses standard alarm ring tone for notification and respect all notification setting of your phone.
Disable and enable notification at a specific time by toggling its switch under a medication reminder. No deletion required.  
When desired, slide a medication reminder to the left directly on the reminder list to expose the option to remove. Slide to the right to hide the option again.

title: Medicineüíä Reminder with Alarm ‚è∞ and Notifications
description:
Start using the Medicine Reminder App and join thousands of happy users who are in control of their medications! üë®üë©üëßüë¶ Be healthier ... isn't that what you're looking for?

The Pill Registration is a very simple and easy to use application that allows you to add and manage different medication schedules. You can edit your medication schedule, add new pills or other medications, delete the available prescription, or replace it with more real medications anytime you want. In this way, you can use this application as a medication schedule, pill organizer, medication alarm or medication control.

title: AlarMeds alarm pill reminder
description:
LANGUAGES: english, espa√±ol, fran√ßais, galego.

AlarMeds is an application created to help you to remember to take your medication, an intuitive medical reminder that allows you to schedule custom alarms. Unlike some applications, the alarm information is saved when you switch off your device, and retrieved automatically when you switch it on. 
Among other benefits, you can take a photo of the medicament and the dose or choose them from your picture gallery (pills, sachets, syrup, etc), add notes, save and export a dossier, call your emergency telephone numbers (for example a person, a pharmacy or a hospital), set the sound (on, off, vibration), the melody (any song you prefer), the volume, change the size of your drug picture (the best for tablets), select the time format (am or pm), etc.. All this through a simple design and easy to handle.

NOTE: THIS IS A FREE VERSION AND IT IS LIMITED TO REMIND ONE MEDICINE. If you prefer, you have avilable the full version "AlarMeds"; you can also find it on Google Play Store; thus, you will also contribute to make "AlarMeds" a better app..

The developers of this application encourage you to give feedback about it in order to optimize and correct if necessary.

title: RxDroid
description:
RxDroid is a simple medication reminder app. Apart from reminding you to take your meds, it will also keep track of your pill count, warning you to get a refill in time.

This app is free and open source, contains no ads, and requires only very limited permissions.

I'm a medical student and this app is a hobby of mine, so development can be slow at times!

Help with translating RxDroid to your language at https://crowdin.com/project/rxdroid!

title: Medi-List Free Medication List & Pill Reminder
description:
Manage lists of medications for family members with their respective physicians.

Are you tired of forgetting the medication names that you or members of your family are taking, or having to write the list of medications every time you go to the doctor? Same here. That's why I created an app to share my medication list via email (my wife is the main user), and I decided to share it with the world, What'sApp to any other sharing form. It can make it easier to show the list to the physician or just share that information with your doctor.

Every time my spouse visits a new doctor, they ask the same question: Can you give me the list of all the medications or vitamins that you're taking? They all want the same information every time.

The worst part is remembering all those long drug names that are difficult to pronounce and nearly impossible to spell. Of course the doctors need this information. But honestly, my spouse and I don't remember all the names or sometimes what are they for.

That's why I created a simple app that you can carry around in your cell phone, instead of copying the same stuff over and over again, enter the information about your medications once to the app and share the list whenever you need to. Simple.

Please use it and let me know if it works. After you install this app, please provide feedback. Might even come in handy during emergencies.

I designed this app to be pretty and easy to use. Give it a try, and let me know.

Use our app to help you remember to take your medicines, antibiotics, antidepressant, birth control, and other prescriptions or supplements according to your medication schedule. We also have daily health trackers: weight tracker, mood tracker, track blood sugar, etc and you can also use our app as your medicine journal to keep track of your dosage.Stay healthy with MyMedsTracker by using our Pill Reminder, Medication Tracker, &

BEST Features of Pill Reminder, Medication Tracker to help you stay healthy: 
‚Ä¢	Pill alarm & medication alert app for all prescriptions & supplement that you take. 
‚Ä¢	Medication tracker with logbook for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢	Supports reminders for birth control, antidepressant, diabetes drugs, antibiotics, and all kinds of prescription drugs.
‚Ä¢	Support for wide range of dosing schemes 
‚Ä¢	Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health reminder & journal so you will be on schedule with your treatment. 
‚Ä¢	Sharingdaily health medication schedule & medicine journal with your family. 
‚Ä¢	Share your printable health& medicine journal with your doctor to discuss the treatment effectiveness. 
‚Ä¢	Wide range of measurements for all conditions (diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, anxiety, depression, hypertension, multiple sclerosis) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels
‚Ä¢	A medicine alert that is FREE to use.

‚è∞Comprehensive medication reminder 
Use our health reminder and medicine alert app to schedule your medicine intake: prescription drugs, birth control, antibiotics, antidepressant, and even supplements. We have comprehensive database of OTC and Rx medications, support for any dosage form frequency, and even refill for meds reminders. Don‚Äôt forget check our medication schedule to make sure you‚Äôve taken that important dose today. 

üíäA daily health tracker to help you stay healthy
We closely work with people who needs prescriptions and medicine, but it‚Äôs also useful for everyone. You can use our built-in weight tracker and keep track of blood sugar. The built-in mood tracker supports you to keep track of your mental health or depression to see if your antidepressant medicine works for you.

‚è∞A tracker for mood, weight, blood pressure and more 
You can not only log your meds, but also track your mood and general well-being in the app‚Äôs mood diary. Use our app as diabetes logbook and track blood sugar. Overall, MyMedsTracker supports ~50 measurements. 

üíäMotivation to take your meds
Aside from medicine alert, we motivate you to take your medicine. Involve family and friends with MyMedsTracker Team to keep you on track to stay healthy. 

üîíPrivacy
No registration is required! We strictly follow German privacy laws and do not release personal data to third parties without permission. 

üîéResearch
It‚Äôs the collaborative efforts from users, their families and medical experts that makes our pill tracker app so simple. Check out our academic research partners on our homepage.

We keep improving the MyMedsTracker app to best meet your meds tracker needs and desires. Leave us your rating & review to support us!

title: Contraceptive pill reminder
description:
‚ÄúContraceptive pill reminder‚Äù is created for women who often forget to take that all-important little tablet‚Ä¶ and who don‚Äôt want to get pregnant just yet! However cute babies may be‚Ä¶

If you aren‚Äôt quite ready for interrupted sleep, feeding at all times of day and night, changing diapers or indeed going to the pharmacy to buy a pregnancy test just because you‚Äôve forgotten to take your pill, the ‚ÄúContraceptive pill reminder‚Äù application is for you.

This simple, user-friendly application helps women never forget their pill

It can be used for all types of contraceptive pill.

"Contraceptive pill reminder" helps women take their pill on a daily basis and at a regular time thanks to a reminder you set up yourself. You can also check how far you are through your pack and find out when you will have your period.

comments: Hi very good app, but few suggestions to use more 1. Doctor prescrption can be added in one screen With doctor name , visit date , illness type , prescription withe multiple image attachment , patient name. If needed alarm for next visit date. 2. Seperate screen for medicine purchase date , expiry date , place of medicine , medicine store address , contact person , phone no , remarks, Qty , (patient name is opt, if not mentioned the stock can be shown separate) 3. Consolidate report for stock

The app is easy to use and does come with some tips such as making sure you add to battery saving safe list. I use an Huawei handset and at first the alarms wouldn't work and I was losing my mind trying to understand why despite following advice notes. After persevering with it, It turns out this app does not work on the alarms if your "sleep when inactive option is turned on" you need to make sure that this option in your phones settings is turned to Never. My alarms are now coming through.

For those who are looking for a option to clean up the history, you can save a backup and edit the "appointments.txt" with any android files explorer... then Restore your backup. How can I make to have my "stock" properly work? I have set it up stock and the dosage. The dosage are 2 pills, but each time I confirmed that the medicine is taken, it only decrease 1 pill from stock. Tks

Nice little app! Helps keep track of the meds that keep me alive! 2 things tho... Please make the app able to deal with cutting pills in half! Doing .5 doesn't do anything to my count of pills! Also I wish it would group my meds together on the notifications rather than individual pop-ups for each pill. Thanks for the great work!

loved it, i always get all fuzzy with my medication and so, when i discovered this app, it does just what you need, i buyed after first use just whish that they let you took te photo the you want for the medicine or sutf, insted of having to select one in the gallery or so

title: Bearable - Symptoms & Mood tracker
description:
‚úÖ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.  

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note. 
‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements. 
‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶

‚ûï Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether it's a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements. 
‚ûï Share and Export -  Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
‚ûï Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
‚ûï Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
‚ûï Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time.  It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with mental and physical health issues themselves.  With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.  Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most.  We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health.  If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to james@bearable.app.  We‚Äôd love to hear from you.




Credit to Freepik for icons

comments: This is absolutely the best of its kind. I have never seen such a comprehensive, customizable, well-designed app that serves as many functions as this one. I've already shown it to multiple friends/therapists. For those of you moaning about the cost... seriously, getting the subscription will set you back just over $2/month. I work professionally with highly impoverished individuals who do have to count every penny, but come on. Most people can shell out a couple bucks without harm.

The app lets you log your mood, any symptoms you are having, and a number of factors that you think may be affecting your mood/symptoms. The default categories to log are good, but you can add/remove/edit all of the categories to fit you better. It's super easy to fill out, even when I'm not feeling well. It (sometimes) feels like I'm logging meaningless information, but then when I click on the Insights tab, it shows me tons of relevant information about which factors are influencing my mood (or any other symptom I log!). Turns out listening to music and video chats work wonders for my mood--good to know! This is also a wonderful way to record how I'm feeling over time--it lets me easily decipher long-term changes in my wellbeing, which is great information to discuss with medical professionals.

I really like this app, it's easy to use and the design is nice and the ability to customize it to your needs is great. However, the syncing isn't very reliable. I have a phone and a tablet, and downloaded it on both, I tried to log in on the tablet, and only a few entries were visible. Later I went to look at the one on my phone, and half the entries are gone, and so are factors I added. I want to keep using this app, but if it's going to randomly forget things that's a problem.

I have tried multiple times in the past to find a way that I could easily log my moods in a way that felt nuanced and meaningful but also flexible and customizable, but this is the first app I have ever seen that got it right. For once, I am finding it convenient to do quick check ins and even monitor my food and water intake which I never thought I'd have the patience to do. You don't have to get premium, but it's well worth it at least to support a great app.

Brilliant App & well worth paying for. I wanted an app to record daily symptoms to enable me to give an accurate report to my GP. This app has everything I wanted & more. Being able to write notes by each symptom is so helpful & the insight reports are incredible. I did have a little snag when I first signed up for the free trial, but I made contact, explained the situation & James helped me to sort it all out. The app has been fantastic ever since. Thank you bearable team üôèüèªü•∞

title: Birth Control Pill Reminder
description:
Birth control pill reminder app is perfect app for women using contraceptive pills, ring or patch contraceptive. The Pill Reminder lets you select what type of contraceptive you are using and an notifications will remind you when it is time to take your pill or replace your contraception. Pill reminder app also tracks your history, has a planner so you‚Äôll know when it‚Äôs time to go pick up your next prescription, and it helps to track your controlled period.

Remembering to take your pill every day is hard. But it doesn‚Äôt have to be with Birth Control Pill Reminder. The app reminds you to take your contraception every day at the same time and automatically stop reminders during the break days when you are on your period. It‚Äôll also reschedule on its own, taking your birth control pill has never been so easy. 

For those who use the patch or ring Birth control remainder will notify to change your contraception. If you‚Äôre into planning ahead Birth Control Reminder lets you see your next pack dates for months in advance so you can plan vacations and other events around your period.

Birth Control Pill Reminder features:
- Daily pill remainder, automatically preset to pause on break days during your period
- Different notification sounds that you can choose and customize your pill notification
- Pin code protection to protect your privacy,  lock app with password
- Customizable number of pills per pack and number of break days
- Custom alert messages to avoid embarrassment in front of others
- Monthly view calendar with marked active and break days

Importan note:
Some Android devices have a setting that prevents apps from firing notifications when the app is not active. A simple solution is to check your phone and see if this functionality is enabled. Those settings are battery optimization features that some device manufacturers implement to extend phone battery. Please contact us on email contact@smsrobot.com if you have problem with notifications to help you setup your phone. 

Enjoy using our free Pill reminder app!

comments: The app works fine and keeps good track of my cycle. The BIGGEST problem is that it does not notify me unless I open the app which is a great inconvenience as it is downloaded to remind me about birth control üôÑ

the app itself is good for tracking the patch but it won't let you skip break weeks/change start day, the community forum bit is very unorganized and pregnancy and ttc posts are everywhere in every section including relationship advice and other topics which have nothing to do with trying to avoid pregnancy especially considering this app is supposed to help you avoid pregnancy not help you fall pregnant on purpose. if that gets fixed then I'll rate it higher

It's a good app for tracking your contraceptive method (pill, patch or ring), for tracking symptoms and other things. However, it does not ring to remind about the pill or when to remove the patch or ring. And there is a problem with the calendar, it skips the days of the week, so it gets a little confusing. I have to reset it all the time.

I never get notifications even though they're turned on, but I'll put that on my phone instead of the app, however it doesn't wait for you to tell it that you changed your patch. It assumes you did and if you miss a day won't let you change your start day. I have to uninstall and find another for this reason

When I first installed it was great, but no matter how many times I reinstall it the reminder doesn't seem to connect from the app to my OS. The reminder can be seen by my phone but it doesn't sound or show a notification.

title: PillRx - Pill Reminder
description:
PillRx - Pill Reminder helps you put one in mind of and never to forget your Medicine.

PillRx - Pill Reminder application is basically all about to remind your daily dose of medicine of its particular diseases. All you have to do is just add a medicine doze and times at which you are supposed to take the medicine for (daily, weekly or monthly basis) to it and it will remind you at every dose time as you have kept alarm for that.

You can easily add family person and can mention particular dose with its image with its particular mentioned diseases though keep alarm for that on daily, weekly and monthly basis as per your regular schedule.

Pill Reminder app features:

  ‚Ä¢	Simple way to add no of doses with particular medicine image and get time alarm.

Download this FREE PillRx - Pill Reminder app now and keep alert to take your medicine on particular time, moreover can help to remind to take these doses to your friends, relatives or to anyone.

title: Medicine Reminder And Pill Reminder By Rappil(Beta
description:
Rappil- Medicine and Nutrition reminder app helps you to take care of health and well being of you and your loved ones for free. comments: 1, 2, or 3 times a day for a reminder is not enough. Some things require repeated interval usage. Every 2.5 hours during the daytime & every 5 hours at night for example, & if late using you must still wait the 2.5-daytime/5-night hours from when you do take/use it.

a pill box or at least give the option to change it. I couldn't turn the 
sound off until I'd unlocked my phone either. Also when I tried adding a 
picture from library or took one it would crash and close the app when I 
clicked the tick. Please see if these can be changed or point me in the 
right direction and then I will give you 5 stars. Thankies

There is no alarm!!! The reminder is a quick 1 second blip on the screen. 
So disappointing.

Just lovely! I keep track of my and my wife's meds. Easy to navigate and 
fill

There's no option for 4 times a day with meds so this app was not useful to 
me

comments: Worst app. Do not get this. The notifcations don't work absolute waste of time
The alarm doesn't work in the app and it gives false knowledge.  They are sell outs now, not worth the money. Says you're protected even after missing 2 days? Don't trust this app.

Rubbish, doesn't go off every morning even though I have all the settings correct. Hasn't gone off for the past 2 mornings, but luckily I don't need reminding to take it. If you need a reminder every morning do not download! Waste of time.  *Update* installed to try again and this time the dates and the days of the week didn't even match up!! The dates were going up in numbers as the days went backwards. Literally made no sense!
The features work even if you don't pay for it and it shows how protected you are and the timings of taking the pill. Works for me :)
This app would be great if you could change what date/time you took your pill. I often remember to take my pill but not enter it in the app, so it is constantly telling me I'm not protected.

title: Medify - Pill & Medication Photo Reminders
description:
Medify ensures you never forget to take your medication ever again, with photo alarms and reminders. 

Features:
- Always take your medication on time with accurate alarms and reminders. Get alarms & notifications to take your medication.
- Never be confused about which medication to take. Every alarm reminder comes with a photo. Identify your medication with the help of images.
- Know when you've taken your medication. Every action is tracked and logged for future reference. View logs of all your medication, or for individual medications, backed up into the cloud.
- Remember specific instructions (i.e. take before or after food) about your medication with notes. 

Steps to use Medify:
1. Download and install Medify - Pill & Medication Photo Reminders 
2. Add medication items with images & alarm details
3. Add medication notes, if there are specific instructions to be followed.
4. The alarm will trigger at the appropriate time to remind you to take your medication!

title: VitusVet: Pet Health Care App
description:
When it comes to managing your pet‚Äôs health, it‚Äôs important to stay informed and organized. The VitusVet‚Ñ¢ App makes keeping track of your pet‚Äôs health a breeze by putting all of their necessary information in one place. It‚Äôs a great tool for anyone with a single pet, multiple pets, anyone who travels with pets, and those with multiple pet care providers including veterinarians, groomers, walkers, sitters, and more.

 

Features:

Monitor your pet‚Äôs health

Manage your pet‚Äôs weight, keep track of their medications, log microchip and pet insurance details, plus note any allergies or medical alerts for quick reference.

 

Access your pet‚Äôs information anytime

Get access to your pet‚Äôs medical records on your phone wherever you are! Need a vaccine record for your landlord, the dog park or a dog-friendly restaurant? Breathe a sigh of relief knowing that their information is just a few clicks away. It‚Äôs easy to share with other care providers while taking the best care of your pet.

It‚Äôs the to do list for pet health management

Set reminders on everything your pet needs ‚Äì‚Äì from giving your pet medication to scheduling appointments to buying food and more.

Request Appointments and Prescription Refills

If your veterinary practice partners with us, you can easily request appointments, medication refills, and products directly through the app.

 

Download VitusVet to keep your dog, cat, rabbit, bird, snake, or whoever your friend is, healthy and safe.
