title: To Do Reminder with Alarm
description:
To Do Reminder app - ‚ÄúMake life easier‚Äù
It's a quick, simple and easy to use reminder app.

No Stress, Feel Relaxed. It will remind you everything!!
Memory like a sieve? Now there‚Äôs no need to remember all those things that you have to do, because To Do Reminder will do that for you! It‚Äôs quick and easy to use; you can set a task in the reminder list in mere seconds. It's a best reminder app with alarm.

App can helps you to remind - Daily Todo Tasks, Meetings, Homework and Assignments, Business Appointments, Taking Medication/Pills, Paying Bills, Policy renewals, Important Calls, Birthdays, Anniversaries and many more.

It has following key features
- Easy and quick to set reminders.
- Customise your reminder in your own way with repeat options minute, hour, daily, weekly, monthly, weekdays, yearly.
- Can set in-advance alerts for Reminders.
- Can choose reminder alert as Notification or Alarm.
- It will remind you with alarm notification with your favourite sound.
- With Speech-to-Text, no need to type to create an Reminder.
- Can smartly handle your reminder notification in case of Driving Car etc for your safe drive.
- Synchronise birthdays and anniversaries of your friends from Facebook, Phonebook, Google Calendar, or add them manually.
- Post birthday wishes with lovely cards on your friends Facebook wall or send them Wishes by Gmail, SMS, WhatsApp.
- Daily Google drive Auto backup 
- With Backup & Restore, you can save all your reminders to SDCard, as mail attachments or upload to Drive.
- You can see all reminder notes on home screen using app widget.
- Can choose Day or Night theme for good visibility.
- You can set reminders to friends and remind your friends to remember something important.

With this Send Reminder feature, you can :
1. Set an Alarm for your friends to meet up.
2. Set an Alarm for your husband to buy groceries while he returns from office.
3. Set a Reminder for your office meetings.
4. Set a Birthday Reminder.
5. Set a Gentle Reminder to a friends who owes money.

Important Note - If you notice that some reminders are late or may not appear at all, Please check user guide (FAQ) page in app. it has first option "Reminder not working?" . Just tap on it and following the suggested steps to fix the issue.
For Help, Please write us using "Report bug" option in app.¬†

Why does the app ask permissions to access personal data?
Contact access - It allow the app to sync birthdays from phonebook and show that on Birthdays screen
Photos / Media / Files- It allow the app to take backup or restore the tasks and birthdays. 

Got a question or suggestion? Just email us, and we will be happy to help.

YOU CAN HELP! BY

* Give Rating and comment on Google Play.
* Like us on Facebook¬†https://www.facebook.com/ToDoReminder
* Share and join on Facebook, Twitter using this link 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ToDoReminder.gen

It will keep us motivated to work on new features.You can contact with us at support@todoreminder.com

Thanks :)

comments: Great app, works as described after one week. I would like to SELECT MY ALARM SOUND, but as long as it works. I've been using "Reminder" app, with an alarm that can't be stopped, made me crazy. This alarm is short and does the trick. Ads are small at bottom and not intrusive. Nice job developers! When an app works well, is free w/ ads at bottom, I try to patronize ads if interested. Least I can do for an honest developer.

The alarm part is very usefull...other apps won't really remind you with alarm and you can really miss your appointmens. I actually tried one of those for a month and it did not help to remember. Two days would go by without remembering my to do list. With this app, it can be a pain when the reminder goes on and on, but we won't miss any appointments! Thank you!

Very useful app. Works well. I just had to figure out how to not get a bunch of advance notices, because to me no advance notice should be the default. But you have to go into the advance notice settings and specify you don't want any. Otherwise you get notices all day long. Overall an app I can recommend.

It isn't working properly, for some reason. It doesn't let me know when I need to take my meds.. no sound.. nothing. It worked great in the beginning, but it just stopped. I have a Huawei P30 Lite. Now I have to look for another reminder app, unless someone can help me..

Great little reminder app. I have to have a particular reminder go off 10x a day and this app let's me customize it how I like, including the ring tone and the ability to snooze the reminder with several options. It also has a silent driving mode, which is good for safety reasons!

title: Medicine & Pill Reminder 2019
description:
Millions use medicine and pill reminder to stay safe with their medicine and keep track of blood pressure, glucose and other measurements.Keep yourself and loved ones safe and never forget to take your medicine, supplements and vitamins again with medicine and pill reminder, the easy-to-use and FREE app that helps you remember when to take your pills and manage pill usage. Don't put yourself or your loved ones at risk by missing a dosage -- or taking a double dose because nobody tracked. Our mission is giving people the tools, support and information they need to take their medications the way they're supposed to. 

That's why millions use medicine and pill reminder user, the top-rated medication manager and pill reminder for those who need reminders to take medicine.pill reminder  is capable of managing drugs for many complex health conditions, such as diabetes, heart disease, and cancer. It also acts as a perfect companion for those who need a mobile organizer for vitamins, blood pressure medicine, glucose level tracking, period tracking, and other health concerns.Whether you‚Äôre taking medication or know someone who is, you can use medicine and pill reminder to manage hourly, daily, or weekly pill dosages.pill reminder is perfect for those in charge of their own medicine schedule but need a reminder for dosages and the correct medicine to take.
medicine and pill reminder  is a free, award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker. But pill reminder is more than a medication reminder: Combining a pill tracker, mood tracker and a health journal, e.g. with a weight tracker, this medication reminder app allows you and your doctor to put your treatment‚Äôs success into perspective.
Research
It‚Äôs the collaborative efforts from users, their families and medical experts that makes our pill tracker app so simple. Check out our academic research partners on our homepage.

Why it‚Äôs the best medicine reminder is for you, no matter if you are taking antibiotic medicines or deal with hypertension, atrial fibrillation, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, multiple sclerosis, anxiety or depression that are often complicated. medicine reminder is medication tracker and health journal. Have peace of mind from medicine reminders and health tracker.

A health tracker for your needs medicine and pill reminder  is the result of us closely working with people taking medications. People with Diabetes use the built-in weight tracker and keep track of their blood glucose. Also, they use it as logbook for insulin and a medication reminder for Metformin etc. The built-in mood tracker supports you to keep track of your mental health or depression. Review your health using the blood pressure log, your mood diary or other aspects of your health journal. MyTherapy can be a different app to many, with some using it as depression app while others refer to it as stroke app, cancer app, or weight tracker.

How Does medicine and pill reminder Work?
With a few simple steps, you can add a medication, get reminders for taking pills, and receive constant tracking of your healthprogress.Add your family member‚Äôs medications or have a caregiver manage your medicine as prescribed.

FREE medicine and pill reminder  Features:
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications
‚Ä¢ Pill tracker with logbook for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢ Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health journal
‚Ä¢ Wide range of measurements for all conditions (diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, anxiety, depression, hypertension, multiple sclerois) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels
‚Ä¢ Family sharing
‚Ä¢ Share your printable health journal with your doctor

YOUR OPINION COUNTS!!! We are constantly aiming to improve the medicine and pill reminder  app to best meet your medicine tracker needs and desires. Support us with your ideas, suggestions and feedback.

title: Contraceptive pill reminder
description:
‚ÄúContraceptive pill reminder‚Äù is created for women who often forget to take that all-important little tablet‚Ä¶ and who don‚Äôt want to get pregnant just yet! However cute babies may be‚Ä¶

If you aren‚Äôt quite ready for interrupted sleep, feeding at all times of day and night, changing diapers or indeed going to the pharmacy to buy a pregnancy test just because you‚Äôve forgotten to take your pill, the ‚ÄúContraceptive pill reminder‚Äù application is for you.

This simple, user-friendly application helps women never forget their pill

It can be used for all types of contraceptive pill.

"Contraceptive pill reminder" helps women take their pill on a daily basis and at a regular time thanks to a reminder you set up yourself. You can also check how far you are through your pack and find out when you will have your period.

title: Pill Reminder by MediMate
description:
Worldwide, non-compliance is a major obstacle to the effective delivery of health care.
According to studies about 50% of patients don‚Äôt take their medicine as prescribed by their doctors.
We all know how easy to miss something in our busy life, but medicine is not the thing we can forget about. It is really important.
Pill Reminder is designed to help you with this.
All you need to do is to add your medicine, setup prescription details and the application would notify you every time you need to take action.
Unlike general use calendars or reminders, it is specially aimed at satisfying your medicine need.
Also, it is integrated with medical database to provide you all the information(including indications, mechanism of action, absorption and toxicity info) about the medicine you are advised to take as well as the information on medicine interactions between each other. 
In case you are taken ‚Äúconfronting‚Äù medication you would be alarmed.
Just remember - your medicine can‚Äôt work when it‚Äôs not taken.
Stay safe! Use Pill Reminder!

Key features:
- medical database integration provides you with full info on medicine you take, including indications, mechanism of action, absorption and toxicity info
- alarms if the interaction between medicine you take is dangerous
- setup reminders by super-flexible scheduler: by date, time or custom conditions
- setup reminders for kids and pets separately from yours
- keep full history of your medication and generate comprehensive reports based on it
- social account support allows you to use your data from any device


Also visit:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/MediMatePillReminder

title: Pill Reminder
description:
Pill Reminder is an application that helps you to remember to take your pills. Set the pill cycle, the stop days and time of notification. It will do the rest!

Features:
- Ads free
- Multi-pills support
- Configurable notifications time with time zone support
- Ability to enable / disable notifications at all times
- Ability to change the beginning and the end of the cycle at any time
- Gestures support
- Supports all Android 2.3 Gingerbread and later
- Supports portrait and landscape display mode

Application is complete and free!


Thanks to Nicolas Ciotti for the UI design ( http://www.nicolasciotti.com )
Thanks to TuttoAndroid.net for the review ( http://www.tuttoandroid.net/applicazioni/app-nursery-pill-reminder-152028/ )
Thanks to Androidiani.com for the review ( http://www.androidiani.com/applicazioni/pill-reminder-da-uno-sviluppatore-italiano-unapp-che-ci-ricorda-di-prendere-le-nostre-medicine-193912 )

English, italian, german, french, spanish, dutch, polish, ukrainian and chinese

comments: The options to change the sound don't show all of my sound files... users should be able to find a root folder instead to pick the tone they want.

I have some pills that I do not take every day, so it's nice to have a daily reminder of which one is due. This app started out doing just that, but then...it stopped with the reminders! What?? Isn't that what it is supposed to do?? Dunno, when I have the time, I'll have to check out the other ones available. This one need help in terms of resetting the reminders as well as maybe an actual "Settings" feature.
This app works very well. Ignore the one star ratings. It's unfortunate people don't understand what this rating system is for.

App works okay, but it would be helpful if notifications could be customized. For example, being able to turn off the LED light notification or having an audible alarm. Basically as another reviewer mentioned, having actual settings screen with such things would make this app good rather than just OK.

I was very excited to try this app because it's so lightweight and it has no ads but, sadly, it doesn't work. It doesn't notify on time and sometimes it doesn't even notify at all, so it's pretty much useless :( I hope they can fix it because I really appreciate its other features :/

title: Pill Reminder - Pill Tracker Pill Alarm
description:
Now stay healthy and never forget to take your medicine, pill, vitamin, or supplement on time.

Pill Reminder & Medication Alarm ‚Äì Pillbox is a very simple and free app that allows you to add and manage unlimited number of meds simultaneously and absolutely for free. Add medicine details like the time to take medicines, daily schedule, dosage, with or without food, doctor details, and medicine shapes. You can edit your medication schedule, add a new pill, remove existing prescription or replace it with a more actual one at any time you want. 

It is a free medication reminder app that cares for all your medication needs: Pill reminder(e.g. insulin reminder, for birth control pill, support of dosage-tablets, capsules or pills). This is not only a medication reminder app but also a pill tracker so you can maintain your medicine log.


About Medication Alert:
The medication reminder and medication alarm system is a simple to use medication alert that works by popping medication reminders, pill reminders everytime it's medicine time. It generates medicine alarms, pill alarm that pop up every time for individual medicine, birth control pill and supplement. Take it, snooze it or skip the medicine alert by sliding away the medicine notification.

--- Key Features ----
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications
‚Ä¢ Pill tracker with logbook for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢ Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health journal
‚Ä¢ Family sharing
‚Ä¢ Share your printable health journal with your doctor
‚Ä¢ Wide range of measurements for all conditions (diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, anxiety, depression, hypertension, multiple sclerosis) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels



--- Privacy ---
MyTherapy is available for free and no registration is required! We comply with strict German privacy laws and do not release personal data to third parties.


Pill Reminder & Medication Alarm ‚Äì Pillbox is available for free and no registration is required! We do not release personal data to third parties.

title: Birth Control Pill Reminder
description:
Lady Pill Reminder it's an easy reminder that will help you to follow after your taking of your birth control pills. All you need to do is to fill up you pack type and the time you usually take your contraceptive pill and the app will inform you at this time. Very simple to use!

Main features:
-Remind you in the time you choose to take your contraceptive pill.
-Mark your pills inside Lady Pill Reminder and prevent from forgetfulness.
-Lady Pill Reminder will stay at the notification until you mark the current pill.
-Start a new pack in a click.
-More information will show you the pills number, date, taking time and average taking time.
-You can choose between 8 different pack types - doesn't matter what kind of birth control pill you use.
-Change notification text if you want to hide that this is a pill.
-Add a note to every pill and track your period easily!
-Override timezone changes
-Lady Pill Reminder will display your current contraception pack status, that will give you the option to use it as period tracker as well.
-Track and keep your health in good condition

No need for extra alarm clocks or reminders. everything is here! Lady Pill Reminder!

Please send us reviews and improvement suggestions to:
ladypillreminder@benbasha.com

title: Drink Water app: water tracker & drinking reminder
description:
"Drink Water app: water tracker & drinking reminder" tracks your daily water intake and reminds you when it's time to drink water to ensure proper hydration levels. This daily water reminder helps you develop healthy habits via drinking alarms and many other useful features. All for completely free!

Developing your healthy hydration habit will be easier than ever before with our free water app.

You can use this water tracker for weight loss, but there are many more advantages...
Drink more water and:
üíß Stick to your diet
üíß Detox your body
üíß Clear up your skin
üíß Fill up on much-needed minerals and lower stress
üíß Avoid bladder infections
üíß Boost energy
üíß Prevent kidney stones
üíß Increases brain power

Why use "Drink Water app: water tracker & drink water reminder"?
üõë ALL FOR COMPLETELY FREE!
Unlike our competitors, this drink water tracker offers you a variety of reminders, notifications and much more for free. Take advantage of unlimited features without any charge. Doesn't matter if you need water alarm or water calculator, you'll find everything in this app. See below what you can get!

üõë CREATE A PERSONAL HYDRATION GOAL
A water calculator in this hydration app will automatically calculate your water intake goal on the basis of your weight, gender, and activity. Your calculated target will also take into account whether you are breastfeeding or pregnant. You can even add other additional lifestyle details to further tailor your water balance target. This daily water reminder is just right for you. 

üõë PREDEFINED AND CUSTOM CUPS
Quickly add a drink using our predefined collection, or create your own customizable cup using a wide range of colors and unique volumes.
The hydration app provides information about the hydration level for different types of drinks. This means that there are different hydration levels for the most popular drinks: aqua, tea, coffee, juice, milk, beer, wine, and strong alcohol.
Choose preferred units: imperial (oz) or metric (ml/dl/cl).

üõë SMART AND CUSTOM REMINDERS
Set your bedtime and rest well without being disturbed by drink water notifications.
Choose your alarm interval to decide how often the app will remind you to drink, or manually set specific dates and time to drink water.
Select your preferred alert mode in just a couple of taps; from silent, through vibration only, to automatic mode. In this water drinking app, you can also snooze alerts easily whenever you need to. 

üõë DETAILED MOTIVATIONAL STATISTICS
Our water drinking reminder allows you to see your daily/weekly/yearly liquid consumption, and drinking progress with hydration graphs and water intake log.
Review your current and longest streaks, stay motivated, and develop an effective water drinking habit!

üõë ADD INFORMATION ABOUT THE WEATHER
Did you know that the weather and climate can affect your hydration needs? You can add this information to make your daily target even more accurate. Unlike other apps, our drink tracker and alarm lets you do it for free!

üõë CUTE OCTOPUS
Drink more water and make the cute octopus happy. The more dehydrated you are, the more thirsty the octopus becomes. Your cute companion will reflect the changes in your hydration levels. Whenever you need a drink, make sure your octopus gets one too!

A better water drinking habit means a better, healthier life! This water drinking app is everything you need to stay healthy.

If you see anything we can improve in our water drinking reminder, please let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful for making this free water app better and smarter! Contact us at support@listonic.com :)

May the aqua be with you!

This daily water reminder helps you develop healthy habits via drinking alarms and many other useful features. All for completely free!

Developing your healthy hydration habit will be easier than ever before with our free water app.

You can use this water tracker for weight loss, but there are many more advantages...
Drink more water and:
üíß Stick to your diet
üíß Detox your body
üíß Clear up your skin
üíß Fill up on much-needed minerals and lower stress
üíß Avoid bladder infections
üíß Boost energy
üíß Prevent kidney stones
üíß Increases brain power

Why use "Drink Water app: water tracker & drink water reminder"?
üõë ALL FOR COMPLETELY FREE!
Unlike our competitors, this drink water tracker offers you a variety of reminders, notifications and much more for free. Take advantage of unlimited features without any charge. Doesn't matter if you need water alarm or water calculator, you'll find everything in this app. See below what you can get!

üõë CREATE A PERSONAL HYDRATION GOAL
A water calculator in this hydration app will automatically calculate your water intake goal on the basis of your weight, gender, and activity. Your calculated target will also take into account whether you are breastfeeding or pregnant. You can even add other additional lifestyle details to further tailor your water balance target. This daily water reminder is just right for you.

üõë PREDEFINED AND CUSTOM CUPS
Quickly add a drink using our predefined collection, or create your own customizable cup using a wide range of colors and unique volumes.
The hydration app provides information about the hydration level for different types of drinks. This means that there are different hydration levels for the most popular drinks: aqua, tea, coffee, juice, milk, beer, wine, and strong alcohol.
Choose preferred units: imperial (oz) or metric (ml/dl/cl).

üõë SMART AND CUSTOM REMINDERS
Set your bedtime and rest well without being disturbed by drink water notifications.
Choose your alarm interval to decide how often the app will remind you to drink, or manually set specific dates and time to drink water.
Select your preferred alert mode in just a couple of taps; from silent, through vibration only, to automatic mode. In this water drinking app, you can also snooze alerts easily whenever you need to.

üõë DETAILED MOTIVATIONAL STATISTICS
Our water drinking reminder allows you to see your daily/weekly/yearly liquid consumption, and drinking progress with hydration graphs and water intake log.
Review your current and longest streaks, stay motivated, and develop an effective water drinking habit!

üõë ADD INFORMATION ABOUT THE WEATHER
Did you know that the weather and climate can affect your hydration needs? You can add this information to make your daily target even more accurate. Unlike other apps, our drink tracker and alarm lets you do it for free!

üõë CUTE OCTOPUS
Drink more water and make the cute octopus happy. The more dehydrated you are, the more thirsty the octopus becomes. Your cute companion will reflect the changes in your hydration levels. Whenever you need a drink, make sure your octopus gets one too!

A better water drinking habit means a better, healthier life! This water drinking app is everything you need to stay healthy.

If you see anything we can improve in our water drinking reminder, please let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful for making this free water app better and smarter! Contact us at support@listonic.com :)

May the aqua be with you!

comments: So far the experience has been very positive. The reminders are much more constant compared to other apps (which i like since i forget to drink water easily) and being able to select diferent kinds of beverages is a huge plus.
Good design, easy to use, good challenges, BUT after a while it becomes slow day by day and you have to clear all the data

After a while, it is getting slower. Enter your drink, wait for the sum to update, wait for the next drink time to update, wait for the animation. Wonder what it's doing. Edit: Reinstalling fixed the lag at the cost of all records. A pity, but those records are of little consequence anyway. Next time I will try to just clear all data from the settings, maybe that will have the same effect. Edit 2: Using it for a few more months and the slowness is back. So it's time for a new flush. Bye badges

So far I've been really happy with this app and may consider the purchase upgrade if I find I stick with logging my fluid intake. My kidneys are currently thanking me as I've never drank so much water on a daily basis as I have in the past 5 days. With this app, I find I often drink my intake before required but on the occasion I got behind in my schedule... I really appreciated the app's reminder. Update 9/9/2020. I use this app every day. I always meet my goals. May actually become a habit!

Great app with nice graphics. It's satisfying for me to drink more than 5 glass of water per day. With help of this app now i am drinking 10-12 glass of water and i like it. Challenges feature of this app is also a great tool to stay on your target.

title: NFC Talking Pill Reminder
description:
This medical alert app will take care of the medication schedule and medical history of your family.
Create the treatments for your pills, set the medication calendar and the alarm time reminder and take the pill on time.
Select the name of the pill from the medication list or tap the medicine and the phone will speak aloud the information of the treatment.
Use the medication history log to delete, terminate or re schedule the treatment for your common pills.
Personalize the reminder alert sound with a message from a member of your family or record a message with detailed instructions for the medication.
See the list of upcoming medicines for the next two days and receive reliable reminder alarms even if your device is asleep.
The only pill tracker and alarm reminder free app that works with any real medicine thanks to NFC technology.

stops working

title: ListMeds - Free
description:
Are you tired of filling out monotonous medical history forms? Me too. That's why I created an app to e-mail my medication list. It can make those forms easier to deal with.
.
Every time I visit a new doctor, they want me to fill out another long boring medical history form. They all want the same basic information but each form has a different format so you can't just use a copy of the last one you completed. 
.
The worst part is the medications list. You know, writing out all those long nonsensical drug names that are difficult to pronounce and nearly impossible to spell. Of course the doctors needs this information. But honestly, I don't even want to remember those silly names, much less struggle to write them down again.

So, why not have a simple app you can carry around in your cell phone? Instead of copying the same stuff over and over again, enter the information about your medications once to the app and e-mail the list whenever you need. Easier, right?  

You bet it is. Worked for me already. Went to a new dentist recently (the old one kept raising his prices). When his receptionist gave me the medical history form, I powered up my phone and sent him my drug list with just a couple of quick clicks, right there in his office. I was prepared. You will be too, after you install this app. Might even come in handy during emergencies. 

This app is designed to be easy to use. Not a lot of bells and whistles to complicate things. Give it a try.

title: Reminder with Alarm
description:
Reminder - a truly intuitive free reminder app that will never let you miss a thing. 

A must-have Reminder app 
Embrace the power of  the Reminder and start getting your things done on time.

‚ùç Deadlines are no longer a problem with Reminder; simply create a reminder for each deadline and let the app do the work for you.

‚ùç Meetings ‚Äì work schedules can get busy and the last thing you want to do, when such a thing happens, is miss one of your meetings. Create a weekly reminder for each meeting and be sure you will never miss one. 

‚ùç Homework and Assignments ‚Äì we are all familiar with them, and know that to get all of them done on time a good planning is required. Using Reminder you can solve this problem and make your life easier.

‚ùç Birthdays ‚Äì sometimes it can be difficult to remember all the birthdays of your close friends and relatives, and you most definitely don‚Äôt want to make any of them upset.
But don‚Äôt worry, Reminder can help you with this, too; just create a yearly reminder for each birthday and let the app do the rest.

‚ùç Anniversaries ‚Äì never forget about the important anniversaries. Create a recurring reminder for each special date.

‚ùç Errands ‚Äì create a personalized list of tasks to take care of your errands with ease. Add some extra meaning to the tasks using the colorful markers.

‚ùç Paying Bills ‚Äì no more extra charges for the late fees! Use it to remind you about the next payment day.

‚ùç Important Calls ‚Äì stay in touch with the people you care about.

‚ùç Taking Medication ‚Äì never forget to take the right medication at a right time; create a daily reminder to help you do just that.

‚ùç Use it as an event planner. 
Plan your events in advance with Reminder. Create the informative reminders easily, and be assured you will never miss a thing.
 
‚ùç Use the beautiful reminder widgets to always keep yourself up to date.

‚ùç Use daily reminders to remind yourself about the important daily routines. 

‚ùç Use the task synchronization to keep yourself notified across all of your devices.

‚ùç Create your own, personalized task list; use colorful markers to signify the importance of particular tasks.

‚ùç Customize the appearance of the Reminder with the gorgeous themes.

‚ùç Create new reminders using your voice.

‚ùç Stay organized.



Important note
If you have any battery saving apps installed or the Doze mode enabled(Android 6.0+) on your device, please make sure to whitelist this Reminder app to ensure the correct work of it.(Is required only on certain devices)


‚ùç Features

‚Ä¢ Material design

‚Ä¢ Ability to create the custom task/reminder recurrence (every N minutes/hours/days/weeks/months/years; or on certain days of week)
‚Ä¢ An ability to choose between regular Notifications and Alarms
‚Ä¢ Task/reminder markers
‚Ä¢ Powerful Alarms
‚Ä¢ Convenient task/reminder ordering
‚Ä¢ Straightforward navigation
‚Ä¢ Informative notifications
‚Ä¢ Task synchronization

‚Ä¢ Many useful widgets: Task List Widget, Calendar Widgets, Quick Action Widgets
‚Ä¢ Gorgeous themes
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable experience
‚Ä¢ Speech Recognition support
‚Ä¢ Do not disturb mode
‚Ä¢ Tablet support
‚Ä¢ Optimized for Android 7+
‚Ä¢ It's FREE

‚Ä¢ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reminderforandroid

comments: I was getting to sleep way too late, and getting to appointments was rushed. Maybe, I thought if there was some way to get things done earlier, like a reminder? Hmm? That could get better results. This reminder app in less than a week is already getting improvements. A little less tired, and stressed, in just a few days. I am glad that I found and am using this app.

UPDATE: ALARM DOES NOT STOP for several minutes, & no way to turn off! Drives me CRAZY! THREE CONTACTS TO DEV. WITH NO RESPONSE. That's fine. AVOID THIS APP. Devs who don't respond do NOT deserve your support or money. Replaced this with GREAT APP, FREE, called simply, "REMINDER," IT'S RECOMMENDED! This app has been DELETED.

Great Application. The only problem is that in notification settings you can see all available sounds but it does not play it when you touch one just to see how it sounds. So you have to create a test alarm just to hear it. Unfortunately, as all such apps, it does not have an option to set a recurring alarm at the last day of each month. I bypassed this with setting a recurring alarm on the 1st day of each month with 24hrs advanced notification. Looks ugly but it works.

i like it because you dont need your phone's volume turned on for the reminder to alert you. it seems to be working good for me. I also like the fact that you recently updated the app üëçüëçüëç However, i would like to see notification on phone screen to light up when reminder alarm goes off.?

Volume of alarm is too low & there is no way to control it. If my phone is in my purse, I walk into another room away from it, or I'm asleep, I can't hear it. I missed taking meds, waking up on time, & an appointment. This ap is useless unless you fix this problem, which is disappointing, because I like the format otherwise. I also can't get it to repeat daily tasks like taking medication reminders. I set it to daily, yet it only shows up on one day.

comments: Never got to use it. They asked for money for 'extra features' and I deleted it right then and there. They wouldn't let me decline to pay so they can suck it. Was really disappointed as the pics of the app looked promising for someone looking for something that doesn't look like the girliest unicorn vomitted all over it.

This app is great, but seriously flawed. Despite having a 'support' network in the form of an email address, it's rare to actually get a response from them, therefore questions and issues do not get solved. Emails are ignored. The android version of this app is extremely basic in comparison to the Apple version, and countless times I have had problems with not being able to sign in, or create a new account. None of my problems get resolved as my emails are ignored.

it was super helpful, but the past few updates have not been sending notification reminders. the whole point of this is to be able to remind someone to take a pill. instead it will "remind" me at random inconsistent times of the day. used to love the app, now just super disappointed that it can't perform and I'm constantly resetting the reminder times

App was great until I got logged out of my account and now cannot sign back in to use the forum. Renders it pretty useless now. I emailed support 3 times and eventually got 1 reply promising an update 'ASAP'... more than a month later and still waiting, I emailed a 4th time to recieve no reply. Funny to see I am not the only one with this problem looking at reviews here. Android version has less features than IOS too.

For a app that has in app purchases their customer service and app is very poorly run. if you are a android user (like myself) trying to use this app let it be know you do not get anywhere near the same features as a ios user. I purchased the "membership" for $6 and nothing changed, literally not a thing. The support team doesn't email anybody back ever and now I've been completely locked out of the app, or at least the best parts of the app. I don't recommend at all.

title: My Medication Diary
description:
How often have you forgotten to take your medication? How often have you forgotten to take your medication on time? Do you know what medications you were on 6 months ago? Do you know what medications you are allergic to?

My Medication Diary is an app that not only reminds you to take your medication on time but a comprehensive diary to keep tab of every aspect of the medications you are taking now and were taking before. 

It is simple to use, easy to reference yet comprehensive. 

Features
‚Ä¢	This app helps you with the medications you are taking:
          o	The name, dosage or number, how you are going to take it (e.g. pills or injections), the number of times per day, the time you need to take it and the duration you need to take it.
          o	It alerts and reminds you at the time you need to take it.
‚Ä¢	You are able to keep a history of all the medications you were on before. 
‚Ä¢	You can keep a history of all the medications you are allergic to and the type of allergy you had with a particular medication. 
‚Ä¢	There is a special window for you to write about your medications or write your personal health notes.
‚Ä¢	This app is password protected.

Please note. My Medication Diary is an app to aid you with your medications. However, you should still record and remember aspects of your medications despite this app.

title: IPill Med Reminder
description:
IPILL is a medical application, created in order to help the people track them medical life, and we believe that IPILL can do it.

IPILL meanly working as a medicine reminder, by let the people logged them medicine in the app with many information related to it, and remind for the requested time for them to take the right medicine.

IPILL have many ways in order to do your registration and build your own profile, you can do that by logging through google, Facebook, or regular registration through the app, with a verification code sent to your email.

Logging the Medication inside the IPILL App will help the people to track the medication that they had it before, and help the doctors to do a better judgement about whatever his patient took the medication before, the nice dashboard that representing your daily medication, will help you to follow up your medication and know exactly what‚Äôs pending and what‚Äôs already taken.

IPILL has an appointment registration, that you can log your appointment with your doctor, and the app will have to remind you for that appointment and help you to avoid missing it.

IPILL has ability to track your weight, sugar, blood pressure, and the temperature, logging this information will help you to have your weekly average and share these values with your Doctor.

IPILL has a reporting capability for your medication, by that you can got the monthly report filtering by month, disease, and the medication, the report will be showing your progress of taking the medication and it can be shared with your Doctor.

IPILL has a medication database that allow you to search for the registered medicine, and get the necessary information about.

IPILL has the capability to guide you for the near pharmacies, through the connection with the GPS.

We believe that the IPILL will help even to track your family, by helping you to add a dependent with full dashboard and medication for them, based on that the app will remind you to let your family member to take the right medicine on the right time.

IPILL will be the app that you can rely on it for your medical part in your life.

IPILL has ability to track your weight, sugar, blood pressure, and the temperature, logging this information will help you to have your weekly average and share these values with your Doctor.

IPILL has a reporting capability for your medication, by that you can got the monthly report filtering by month, disease, and the medication, the report will be showing your progress of taking the medication and it can be shared with your Doctor.

IPILL has a medication database that allow you to search for the registered medicine, and get the necessary information about.

IPILL has the capability to guide you for the near pharmacies, through the connection with the GPS.

We believe that the IPILL will help even to track your family, by helping you to add a dependent with full dashboard and medication for them, based on that the app will remind you to let your family member to take the right medicine on the right time.

IPILL will be the app that you can rely on it for your medical part in your life.

title: Healthy Reminder
description:
Do you forget to have a break from the PC every hour?
Do you need to take medicines every few hours?
Do you want to be reminded every X minutes/hours to drink water at work?
Do you need to do a medical treatment and be alerted every X minutes?

If you answered "YES" to any of the above questions, this app is designed for you

Healthy Reminder is a free time keeping application with more powerful scheduling functions than a built-in alarm.

It allows to schedule reminders for workdays/weekend between to set up hours with the given frequency.
So if you need to do something daily every hour from 9am to 5pm, then just set it and that's it! The app will not wake you at night. It won't "forget" to restart notifying you the next day either!

KEY FEATURES:
- set the start and end time
- set the frequency
- calculates the number of reminders in this period
- set the weekday/weekend or both
- set one of 5 built in reminder sounds and all the default phone's notification sounds
- adjust the reminder sound volume
- set a vibration too
- set the popup notification
- give a title to the reminder
- change the app background and color theme

The app is very energy effective. It "wakes up" only when the reminder needs to be displayed, otherwise is asleep in the background

If you like the app and you would like to support the developer, there will be the "Healthy Reminder Pro Unlock Key" available on Google Play. Moreover, you will get the access to the pro features.

PREMIUM FEATURES:
- scheduling an unlimited number of reminders
- scheduling reminders for single weekdays (like Mondays, Tuesdays, etc)
- pick whatever image from your gallery and create your own background! Zoom, pan and crop it to fit perfectly application's screen
- set if the app shall observe phone's mute status while showing notifications
- possibility to choose your own custom reminder sound from MP3, OGG, WAV files from your phone
- no advertisements

Enjoy your time!

comments: Excellent app! Just what I needed. Smooth and attractive interface. Works perfectly without interruption: *Remember to Whitelist it in all battery saver and cleaning/clearing apps. Very good customer service; I highly recommend emailing developer with issues or questions. He is responsive and very helpful. I like it so much I bought the Pro version (Inexpensive at $2.99). Lots of additional features ‚Äî More than worth it!

Finding this app very helpful for extended meditation practice of two to three hours. I set it at 20 minute intervals and adjusted the volume so that it makes a very subtle gong sound. I don't have to open my eyes as much to check the time :-)

pretty good basic reminder app, simple to use and does what I want. Only one problem, I have it set up for daily reminders and sometimes it auto starts as it should and sometimes I have to open the app to get it to start for the day.
Im enjoying it, but one big issue is when the reminder chimes, it turns the system volume up really high and hurts my ears if I am listening to something with earbuds in at the same time
Lovely bell to remind me to breath and move if I haven't for a while. Brings my priorities to the front of the moment, what ever they might be!

title: Pregnancy Pill Reminder
description:
Pregnancy Pill Reminder will recommend you the BEST contraceptive pill, will help making your contraception to be safe and effective. For you now it is enough to pass several tests to learn everything about contraindications and hormonal contraception benefits and risks. Create your own pill schedule, set the reminder to convenient time. Pregnancy Pill Reminder knows everything about contraceptive medicines and will tell you a lot about them. 

If you aren‚Äôt quite ready for interrupted sleep, feeding at all times of day and night, changing diapers or indeed going to the pharmacy to buy a pregnancy test just because you‚Äôve forgotten to take your pill, the ‚ÄúPregnancy Pill Reminder‚Äù application is for you. Pregnancy Pill Reminder is a free, award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker. But Pregnancy Pill Reminder is more than a medication reminder: Combining a pill tracker, mood tracker and a health journal, e.g. with a weight tracker, this medication reminder app allows you and your doctor to put your treatment‚Äôs success into perspective

** Flexible medicine schedule options
- Every days, weeks, or months schedule to take your medicine at fixed times (to 12 times) every defined frequency of days, weeks, or months.
- Every hour interval schedule to take your medicine an interval after your last time of taking the dose. You set the interval (number of hours) and starting date & time.
- Track your medicine: view medicine log and track your taken, skipped doses medicines for the past days, weeks and months.
- Delete a medicine or deactivate it to keep it for reference.

** Conveient Reminder
- Alert screen shows up even when your device is locked
- Convenient alert styles: Alert Forever, Notification Only
- Customize your reminder: tone, volume
- Set custom reminder tone: pick from your favourite ringtones
- Mark your medicine doses as taken, skipped or leave them as missed
- Refill reminder: reminds you to refill your meds if they go under the threshold
- Pill reminder app for all medications
- Refill reminder: reminds you to refill your meds if they go under the threshold
- Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
- Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health journal
- Easily view, create, edit, remove, active and deactive medication reminder from the reminder list.
- Quick configuration of multiple notification times under each medication reminder. 
- Smart notification that combines all reminders at the same time for ease of viewing. 

For those who use the patch or ring Birth control remainder will notify to change your contraception. If you‚Äôre into planning ahead Birth Control Reminder lets you see your next pack dates for months in advance so you can plan vacations and other events around your period.

** ABOUT Phoenix Games LLP **

With over millions of users Phoenix Games LLP to be known as the creator of Drink Water and pill reminder or more health and fitnesh app that yunger and older both love.

comments: Loved the idea. Pill box mini arrived. Pretty cheap hardware. No matter, app experience might make things better. Crashes every time I try to add a location. The 'Misplace feature' was the USP for me as I always leave home in a rush. Without it you might as well use the pill packet and phone alarm. If this worked properly it could help people who struggle with memory but instead it's a nice idea executed without care charged at a premium. Disgrace
Pretty upsetting just bought it was excited but the app just keeps crashing upon opening. Looks like they did not built the app to support Android 11. Waste the time and money.
I just purchased this 08/20 and it's bricked. No updates in nearly a year. Will not work with Android 11 but they keep selling them. I now have a 40 tic-tac case. Fraud.

Y'all really let me down in an area of my life I need help the most. With Android 11, the app no longer starts. Even before it would disconnect from my pill box causing me to forget to take medications. Taking medications on time and remembering you took them is SO important, considering health risks. It really doesn't seem like this company takes that into account. I had a normal amount of hopes and got very low returns. If you're looking into a pill box and app: look elsewhere. This ain't it.
As with last year, does not work on Android 11. The beta is out, why does this app not test and update in advance?!

title: Medicine Reminder: Pill Tracker Organizer
description:
üîî Never forget to take a pill again! üîî
Have you forgotten to take medication on time? 
What about your pets or seniors you take care of?
It can get immensely complicated when supplements, vitamins, pills, and other medications are in question. Especially since most of the prescription medication has a specific time of recurrence.
Here is where Medicine Reminder: Pill Tracker Organizer üíä is of great help! Our intuitive pill tracker, medication reminder & medication organizer app manages the way you take medications, injections, syrups, and inhalers. 

üíä SIMPLE MEDICATION TRACKER
Use Medicine Reminder as a pill tracker to add all your medications like vitamins and supplements, birth control (lady pill) pills, dog pills & supplements, insulin injections, inhaler treatments and more. Make it your medication diary with medicine list to organize better and get a better perspective on which medications you and your pets and family are taking.
It also allows for precise medicine tracking. Just enter the number of pills in a full bottle or the dosages, then our medicine tracker counts down each time you take a dose. The app tracks your pills by your actions (tap to mark as taken or skip) and calculates the remaining pills or doses (also tracks liquids, great for vitamins, supplements, syrups).

üîî VERSATILE MEDICATION REMINDER
Add reminders for each medication with ease. Use it as your lady pill reminder, prescription medication reminder, vitamin reminder, contraceptive pill reminder, dog medicine reminder, insulin reminder & as a universal med reminder. 
Simply add new medicine & add a specific reminder. Add pictures & total amount of doses in the bottle/ container too. Notifications come with the relevant information for each pill in your notification bar. 

üëç WHY THE MEDICATION REMINDER APP IS A MUST-HAVE
‚ñ™Ô∏è track pills, injections, syrup, inhaler
‚ñ™Ô∏è track remaining pills or dosages in a bottle/container
‚ñ™Ô∏è a simple way to add reminders for each medication
‚ñ™Ô∏è add images & amount of doses for each medication reminder
‚ñ™Ô∏è push notifications give relevant info for each pill

Make medicine taking a breeze with Medicine Reminder.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Download the simply convenient & undeniably handy Pill Tracker & Med Reminder for FREE!

title: EatWise - Meal Reminder
description:
It's well thought out and has all the functionality to help you be successful in your journey. We take the remembering off your shoulders!

Features:

1. Set how many meals you would like to eat
2. Set the increments of time you want between each meal.
3. Set when and how many reminders you would like before and after a scheduled meal
4. Unique feature to even remind you about your first meal of the day
5. Keeps track of your weight loss progress with a weigh-in record keeper. (Auto Saved on the cloud)
6. Can add extra meals after the day has already started
7. Ability to edit any individual meal time at any time during the day

The goal is for our app to be the only one you will need to maximize your results. If it‚Äôs not then please give us your suggestions on new features using the feedback option in the app.
descriptionHTML:
It's well thought out and has all the functionality to help you be successful in your journey. We take the remembering off your shoulders!

summary: EatWise is the best meal reminder App. Take the remembering off your shoulders!
recentChanges: Bug fixing and performance improvements
comments: This app is simple, easy to use, and an excellent way to remind you to eat small meals throughout the day. I love the "awake" function that lets you start your day when you actually wake up vs. a specific predetermined time. I love that you can adjust the intervals between meals, and it automatically times out the next meal based on when you click "eat" vs. a predetermined time. So helpful for real life that changes from minute to minute.

I love this app. It really makes it easy to set your eating schedule. The only recommendation I would make is to allow for a medication reminder(s) as some need to occur at a specific time before or after eating and having all in one app would be ideal.

This is exactly what I was looking for! I have a bad habit of not remembering to eat, but generic alarms don't work because my awake hours fluctuate so setting the same times everyday wasn't going to cut it. This app automatically adjusts the next meal based on the previous one, so I never have to worry about the hassle of resetting an alarm after every meal. I also appreciate that it isn't weight loss-specific because so many apps are like that and those stress me out. It's so easy to use, too!
Super simple and easy to use. Also keeps track of my weight! Your day can start at any time and the other times automatically adjust!

This has been a huge help to remind me when to eat! I would give it 5 stars if it had a quick button for 'eat' instead of just the push back eating for 15, 20, and 30 minutes. I would like to be able to look back at previous days. Would it be possible to enter a daily weight and have it show on a graph of some kind?

title: My Pill Reminder
description:
"My Pill Reminder" is an app which keep an eye on your medication, keeps reminding you for every medication, alerting you for every dose.

This app has the latest technology involved, which lets you automate the Alarm without interacting with the app; just scan the pill box, and it will take care of the rest.

comments: The app is easy to use and intuitive, the assistants are very cute and the free version of the app is super ok. This app really helped me with drinking more water.
Encourages you to drink more which in turn helps in weight loss especially if you are already dieting or following an eating plan. All drinks can be logged including hot drinks.
Love it even with the free version üòÉ I dont personally see many ads so that's a plus for sure. It definitely helps to keep me motivated to drink water more often an stay on track

I thought the app was awesome when I first got it and was more than happy to pay to unlock extra features. Now I've come back to using it after a break and found that despite paying for the additional features I now no longer have them and have to wait to unlock them. Cool app, but if I pay for a feature I should keep it, even if you update the way the app works.
App was nice until they've changed the subscription to a monthly one. I've previously paid for the full version only to have it revoked with their new subscription system.

title: Just Reminder with Alarm
description:
Just Reminder
Simple all-in-one reminder app for Android to just remind you everything at a specified time!

‚òõ  Can set ToDo / Task Reminders, Birthday Reminders, Anniversary Reminders and Bills Reminders with just few clicks.
‚òõ  With Speech-to-Text, no need to type to create an Reminder.
‚òõ  Customized Repeat Intervals like repeat every few minutes, hours, day, specific week days, weeks, months, years and many more.
‚òõ  Customize each reminder with image, specific ring tone or Talking Alarm tone.
‚òõ  Can set in-advance alerts for Reminders.
‚òõ  Can customize Date & Time Formats.
‚òõ  You will not miss any reminder with LED blink (if device supports) and Auto-Snooze feature.
‚òõ  Can send wishes from Birthday / Anniversary Reminders.
‚òõ  Smart Bills Reminders will remind you every day till they were 'PAID'.
‚òõ  With Backup & Restore, you can save all your reminders to SDCard, as mail attachments or upload to Drive.
‚òõ  Please refer HELP section in app if you are missing reminders due to battery optimization in your phone.

PREMIUM version features:
‚òõ  Ad Free.

PERMISSIOIN:
Internet ‚Äì Google in-app purchases.

Feel Free to send your queries and feedback to apphouze@gmail.com or from App's "Contact Us". We are happy to help you. :)

Important Note - Don't prevent Alarms from 'Stamina Mode' settings, battery saver app or a task killer app.

YOU CAN SUPPORT US BY
‚òõ Rate Us on Google Play.
‚òõ Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/JustReminderapp/
Feel free to share your suggestions/feedback. It will keep us motivated to work on new features.
Thanks :)

recentChanges:
v2.5.5
- minor fixes
comments: It's just a great app for what I need.. Although... Unlike with my LGs I've owned in the past....With my new Motorola E 2020 cell... I had to use more options to get it to work correctly...like turing off battery saver on this app.. I like you can set a reminder for a year andor monthly just by choosing a prompt... On other similar apps... You have to scroll the calendar 1 year.. to get it to repeat that time frame.. Thanks for this app

It is OK, but it doesn't have option to switch off and on the alarm, only delete or reschedule possible. If it's a recurring one, it automatically change to next time after passing the first occurrence. Despite having dismissed the alarm on due date it shows up next day and rings. Why?

******UPDATE: In my last review I said how the app wasn't alarming off w/ the notifications. Then I read how another reviewer fixed the issue by changing the optimizations in the phone settings. I tried it & it works! Thank you God that I saw Roger's review!

Three days or so after giving the App an excelent review, the app stopped working after an Android update. I have followed your instructions for the battery power management problem with negative results. Do you guys have specific instructions for a Note 10 Plus. Thank you

Good App with no cloud sync or backup. When I lost my mobile I realise what I missed, it's not the aesthetic of app but the data I which I lost. This is 5 star app if it has cloud sync or at the least to backup the data over cloud. Hope developer will hear this out.

title: Clue: Period Tracker, Ovulation, Cycle & Pregnancy
description:
Clue is more than a period tracker ‚Äì it‚Äôs an accurate menstrual calendar, ovulation app, and pregnancy tracker that helps you take control of your reproductive health. It‚Äôs a scientific and fluff-free way to learn about your body and discover unique patterns in your menstrual cycle.  

With the Clue app, your periods, symptoms, fertility and pregnancy are all in one place. Great skin when you ovulate? Headaches during PMS? Learn about your personal patterns with 30+ tracking options from birth control pills to cramps, emotions, skin, moods, cervical fluid, and more. Plus, set reminders so you never get surprised by a period again. Clue is the period calendar, fertility tracker and pregnancy app that adapts to you and your unique cycle: the more you track, the more you learn, and the more you start to live in sync with your biology. 

** Top free period tracker app ‚Äì Obstetrics & Gynecology Journal (ACOG) **
** Best Fertility Apps 2020 ‚Äì Healthline **

CLUE PERIOD & OVULATION TRACKER TOP FEATURES:
¬∑ Period tracker, period calendar, ovulation tracker, and fertility tracker
¬∑ Accurate period predictions for upcoming cycles
¬∑ Log your symptoms, flow, moods and more and find patterns in your cycle
¬∑ Ovulation app to track ovulation tests and your BBT 
¬∑ Calendar reminders for upcoming periods, ovulation and PMS
¬∑ Predictions for your recurring symptoms, like cramps, pain, and headaches
¬∑ A period calendar with your menstruation, ovulation and fertile days
¬∑ Log and set birth control pill reminders
¬∑ A cycle analysis of your period lengths to observe trends and irregular cycles
¬∑ Menstrual health tips curated for you that explain your symptoms 

PERIOD TRACKER & MENSTRUAL CALENDAR 
¬∑ Period predictions, fertile day and ovulation estimates 
¬∑ A period diary to log your period days, flow intensity and the menstrual products you use
¬∑ Track symptoms, cravings, pain, exercise, and more to find patterns in your cycle
¬∑ Set up calendar reminders before your next period, ovulation, fertile window and PMS 

OVULATION TRACKER & FERTILITY TRACKER: 
¬∑ Ovulation calculator and basal body temperature tracker
¬∑ Fertility predictions and fertility friend to help you get pregnant if you‚Äôre trying to conceive
¬∑ Log ovulation test and cervical fluid for improved ovulation estimations
¬∑ Set fertility and ovulation calendar reminders to help plan a pregnancy

*NEW* PREGNANCY TRACKER & WEEK BY WEEK GUIDE
¬∑ Log into pregnancy mode to set your expected due date with a pregnancy calculator
¬∑ A pregnancy calendar and baby growth tracker to keep track of your trimester 
¬∑ Track pregnancy symptoms, baby movement, and more 
¬∑ Fact-checked health content to guide you through your pregnancy week by week so you know what to expect

FIND UNIQUE PATTERNS IN YOUR MENSTRUAL CYCLE
¬∑ View your period lengths and cycle variations
¬∑ See the symptoms you tracked in relation to your menstrual cycle
¬∑ Use Clue to help you manage your PCOS and irregular cycles
¬∑ Started menstruating? Clue is a helpful period tracker for teens
¬∑ Bring the Clue Period Tracker app to your OBGYN and have your period history available

Clue is a cycle tracker built for anyone who menstruates and uses gender-neutral language.

Note: Clue Period Tracker & Ovulation app should not be used as a contraceptive.

recentChanges:
Welcome to the world, pregnancy mode! Our most requested feature is finally here! Now, you can switch from period to pregnancy tracking by upgrading to Clue Plus.
- Log your pregnancy and set your due date in a new pregnancy calendar
- Track your baby‚Äôs growth week by week, and log your pregnancy and postpartum symptoms

comments: I've been using Clue for a solid 5 years now, and I really like the app. I've only had issues with the new update. The app has been throwing me out sometimes when I press the "back" button. Also, whenever I try to reorder my tracking options to my taste, it doesn't register them and shifts them back to the original, unwanted order. I also don't like that the "track today's data" button on the centre of the cycle got removed. It was super convenient and I'd want it back. Otherwise love the app.

Please help! This app is amazing but it's starting to be weird!- Basically, it keeps tracking stuff on its own and it changes everything. It completely destroyed everything in my cycle! It made the period length from 5 days (which I am) to 1.5 days! And it keeps tracking to heavy bleeding etc when I'm not bleeding at all! I love this app so much and I really need it to work. Why does it do this? What can I do about it? Did someone possibly "hack" me without knowing and starting tracking?

Easy to use and unobtrusive experience. I haven't gotten enough cycles yet for symptom predictions, but just the act of tracking them has gotten me in better touch with what's going on. The app has useful information as well. I am not subscribed and just using the free version. I'll think about subscribing when I see how the experience is with predictions.

Edit: yes! The lock is 'fixed'! I now need to punch in my pin everytime I navigate to a different screen in the app instead of just once! Great work guys! /sarcasm. This app has gotten really pushy with trying to get you to pay to the point I want to uninstall. To top it off , the password lock is no longer functioning even though it's on in my settings.

Idk what they did to the app because after an update around september, it startes crashing when i tried to use certain features. I knew it wasnt my phone because many people complained about the same issue around the same time and I was hoping they'd fix it. Instead, the problem got progressively worse to the point where i get error messages telling me the app isn't working or that it needs to close when it's already supposedly closed. Years lost cause now I can't even get my data back. Trash.

title: Wildwood Pills
description:
Wildwood Pills is a personal medication management system that helps you to: 

‚Ä¢Manage the usage (both amount and frequency) of your medication 
‚Ä¢Set up and trigger reminders as to when to take your medication 
‚Ä¢Keep a history of all the medications that you have taken 
‚Ä¢Re-order your medication from your Pharmacy or Doctor, directly from within the app 
‚Ä¢Your selected Pharmacy may also be able to send you instant notification on your device when your prescription is ready 
‚Ä¢Send you a reminder when to re-order your medication 

Key Features & Benefits :
Wildwood Pills is the first application to allow the user to not only track their medication, but also send reorder requests directly from their handset to their doctor or pharmacist, simply at the touch of a button. Reorder requests can be text or image based, with images taken with the device‚Äôs built in camera, and are sent via email from within the app interface. 

Say you want to transfer your prescription to a Pharmacist. No need to spend countless amount of time going through all the details over the phone. Simply transmit a copy of your prescription or a picture of your medication instantly from within the app. Job done! 

If you send in an order to Wildwood Pharmacy, you can also be notified by instant messages on your phone about the status of your prescription request 

The app keeps a record of medication taken, details of which can then be distributed via email to interested parties, directly from within the app. This can be very useful, for example, when visiting your doctor, since now you can transmit your medication intake history, to the doctor, prior to your visit 

Users can create audible and visual alerts when their medication is due, based on defined timescales for morning, noon and evening doses. Using Push notification, the app is able to alert you as soon as the medication is due, even when not using the application. 

All information within the app is PIN protected, ensuring that all data remains confidential and is only shared with trusted individuals for the purposes of tracking recent medication histories or for prescription modifications. 

The application also includes a handy Notes application which you can use to keep and track important notes about your medication etc. 

You may be able to dial the Pharmacy directly from their contact information as well as send in your prescription requests to your Wildwood Pharmacy.

‚Ä¢Re-order your medication from your Pharmacy or Doctor, directly from within the app

title: Drink Water Reminder - Water Tracker and Diet
description:
Drink Water Reminder - Water Tracker and Diet will help you to lose weight, keep fit and stay hydrated every day. Water drinking reminder tracks your water diet and promotes health benefits like diabetes prevention. Drink water app will track daily water intake using a single tap water logging. H2O diet encourages weight loss and prevents dehydration by reminding you to drink water, so you never get thirsty. Would you like to experience natural H2O hydration and have healthy skin and healthy nails, while getting additional kidney stone prevention and diabetes prevention? 

Drink Water Reminder - Water Tracker and Diet features:

title: Smart Pill ID: Identify Pills with your Camera
description:
Take a picture, choose from your photos, or manually enter pill details to identify pills and get details. Save pills to reference them easily. With auto capture, the app will take pictures of your pill until a result is found.

When viewing a pill, you may view details of the prescription including:

üíä Description
üíä Precautions
üíä Dosage and Administration
üíä Overdosages
üíä Adverse Reactions

Full version of the app is available with a monthly subscription. Features include:

üíä Unlimited Scans
üíä Unlimited Pill Saves
üíä No Wait Times
üíä Ad Free Experience
üíä Access to more information such as Geriatric Use, Pediatric Use, Packaging Directions, Information for Nursing Mothers, and more.


Did you know that every year at least 100,000 pills are incorrectly dispensed by pharmacists in America? Smart Pill ID is perfect for anyone who takes prescription medicine, pharmacists, police officers, and anyone else who needs to quickly and accurately identify a prescription.

DISCLAIMER: Do not rely on Smart Pill Identifier to make decisions regarding medical care. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated.

For business inquiries, please contact business@buildloop.com

title: Medicine Reminder Free
description:
Medicine Reminder App

Medicine Reminder will help you to take the medicines on time. It is an assistant that will remind you through voice you can write down about the pills or medicine names, it will spell exactly. Useful application for Seniors, kids,and adults. We tend to forgot to intake medicines on time, that causes severe health risks. To avoid and get cured from all the ailments its important that we intake all the medicines on time. 

This app especially help you on taking your medicines on time. You set an alert , exactly when the set time is reached it starts alarming you to take the medicine. Just Set it up and Be free - This Medicine Reminder app will remind you exactly at the right time.

Just fill the tablet name/Pill name, in the Next field type the info to Utter it as Voice. If you like this app, share this useful application to your friends.

Medicine Reminder for Seniors
This app will certainly be useful for Senior citizens of the country, some may have diabetes, some may suffer from a blood pressure, if they are not taking their pills at the right time, imagine what will happen to their life. 
This Medicine reminder will solve the problem of those seniors. It reminds them on time, helping them to take medicines on time that will keep them healthy and live longer life without complications.

title: Medication tracker
description:
Medication tracker is a very simple and intuitive medicine reminder application. Do you often miss the time when you have to take your medicine? Just enter the name of the drug into the application, set the schedule for taking it, and you will never miss taking your medication again.

Medication tracker will remind you of what dosage of the medicine you should take and of the time of day - for example, before or after a meal, - you should take it. You only need to add this or any other important information to the schedule for a specific medicine once. Universal settings of the app will allow you to control the intake of any pills, drugs or even medical procedures.

Medication tracker is a free application that allows to add and control the intake of an unlimited number of medications or procedures. Our app will always be free and it will never be overloaded with advertising.

In the Medication tracker application, you will be able to keep a diary of the results of your blood pressure, heart rate and body temperature monitoring. Our application is perfect for keeping control over your blood pressure.

Please note that you should consult a medical professional with any health problems you may have. This application is not intended for medical advice.

title: Personal Medication Diary
description:
Personal Medical Diary (PMD) app helps you to keep records of all visit to your doctors including medicines prescribed. It also helps you to how to take medicines.

You can add your all doctors profile with important information about your doctor and place to visit for appointment.

Appointment feature in PMD app will help you to remind your visit to doctor on time so you can never miss this important task. 

You can add prescribed medecines by your doctor and set reminder to take it including other related information.

Add your all health reports suggested by doctor in app to help in future if needed. 

PMD has important feature - APP DATA BACKUP which will never lose your information by backing up on your Google drive account.

Feature Highlights:

 - Add your doctors with required details
 - Manage your family members by adding them in your account
 - Manage your daily medication 
 - Appointment Management with calendar view
 - Appointment Reminders
 - Keep Records of your medications
 - Medication Reminders as per your specified schedule
 - Your Health Report Management
 - Database backup & Restore Functionality
 
As usual, if you love this app then please rate us on store. Your rating and feedback will really help us to grow and improve our app.

If you have any questions or require clarification for any functionality or flow then please feel free to contact us on support@pmdapp.com alternatively, you can also submit your query through App.

comments: WASTE OF TIME. This is not a free app so don't waste your time with this app. It has a lot of bugs. I got it for the Medication list. The medication list has a lot of information to add that you don't need, and if you don't input the field you can't save it. You also have to add a doctor to each medication which adds a new doctor to your doctor list. So if you have 10 medications by the same doctor, you will have 10 doctors of the same name in your doctors list. If you delete the duplicate doctors you are also deleting the medication under that doctor's name.. I put a lot of work into adding my medications and then had to delete all the duplicate doctors, which deleted my medications. Plus, so many pop-up ads.

This was a good app at the start. But like some other comments it keeps asking for doctors name.. I paid for the pro version and since then I haven't been able to access my reports. I had spent a lot of my time and effort to add and store this i information. And now I can't access it at all. I have refreshed the app but still no luck. ... Very Disappointed .

This is a fantastic app!!! However, unfortunately the medication reminders rarely work. Under notification settings, it shows one a week to start, but where I have kept at it, during updating my medication it has finally allowed two a day!! Also there is no quick way of taking your medication from within the app. This could be such a great app if only this could be fixed. If it wasn't I wouldn't keep updating this every day!!

This application has a lot of potential, however it needs more of an ability to interface and be customized. I bought the pro version and I'm going to have to stop using it. It's too complicated and I can put in the information that I need in a way that I can access it easily.

The app deleted all my medical records when upgraded to paid version. the app keeps on crashing every time I enter a new medication but I thought it was bearable because no other app was able to record the meds the same way however when I decided to upgrade to get the Cloud sync feature once I upgraded and turned on Cloud sync it deleted all my medical history and I have to start again from zero. after that this application completely stopped working everytime I fire it up it will crash.

Make notes of information for each shot.
Save a virtual image of the medicine you should take.

Do not forget to take your meds anymore.
descriptionHTML:

Controls medicine you should take.
Create an alarm to notify you when it's time for medicine
List the medications you've made.

summary: Do not forget to take your medicine

title: Lady Pill Widgets
description:
"Lady Pill Widgets" is a pack of 2 widgets that displays on your home screen all the information you need about your birth control pill. 

"Lady Pill Widgets" contains the following widgets:

- "Lady Pill Cycle":
    * Displays the current day of the 28 day cycle.
    * Indicates if you have to take the pill in the current day.

- "Lady Pill Calendar":
    * Displays a calendar telling you which days you have to take the pill, and which days you've taken it.
    * You can use it to see future months predictions.
    * Also you can see past months.

You can customize the colors of these widgets to integrate them into your mobile device home screen. Widgets also are shortcuts to "Lady Pill Reminder".

IMPORTANT!: 
- To use "Lady Pill Widgets" you need to install the free app "Lady Pill Reminder".
- If you need help about how to add widgets to yout home screen, please read this:
    * If you have Android 2: http://support.google.com/android/bin/answer.py?answer=168458#1166242
    * If you have Android 4: http://support.google.com/android/bin/answer.py?answer=2519826
