comments: Perfect, simple, and all the features you truly need are free for use. Bought the widgets for support, this app has made taking the pill an easy and non-stressful affair. Thank you!
Best period tracker app I've tried so far. Even when I was skipping periods the settings were easy to adjust and I could visually match up my actual pills to the ones on the app.
I use this everyday. Probably the most useful app I have. Bought the widgets just to support the makers. Never any glitches or problems. Would give more stars if I could
Does it's job in a fun way. It's satisfying that it mimics the packs being opened on your phone. It's customizable and hasn't let me down yet.
Great tool to keep me on track!!! I love the pop-up reminder.

title: Plant Nanny¬≤ - Your Adorable Water Reminder
description:
üéâ Google Play Best App of 2019 
Google Play in countries around the world, from Taiwan, to Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Italy, and Spain, featured the app on its list of Best Apps of 2019.

üíöThe Cutest Hydration App üíö

Water is essential for life, but drinking enough of it is also one of the easiest things to neglect. Plant Nanny¬≤ keeps track of how much water you drink -- each glass also waters the app‚Äôs plants so you can both thrive! Every day you can collect and take care of little plants to get hydrated and grow together!

What‚Äôs so good about drinking water?
Do you want a healthier body and a happier, more stress-free life? Are you looking to improve constipation, urethritis, or other common health conditionsÔºü

‚úÖ About 70% of our body is composed of water, so how our body feels depends a lot on how much water we drink. Starting with just a single glass of water, you can begin to change your entire water consumption habits and effectively improve your health, lose weight, and reduce bodily fatigue and illnesses.

‚úÖ  Plant Nanny¬≤ will provide you with a customized plan using simple charts and interfaces so you can get a solid grasp on your personal water consumption. Collect cute plants and improve the way your body looks and feels before you know it! These little plants will boost your spirits, improve your health, and help you cultivate good habits for drinking water!

-‚ú®Customize the way you manage your daily water consumption goals üéØ
üíßSuggestions for appropriate amounts based on individual body data and exercise habits
üíßAutomated reminders/buzzers‚Äã when it‚Äôs time to drink more water to help you truly establish the habit of regularly drinking water by having this handy‚Äã daily water track.
üíßCustomize the volume of your water cup and easily set the appropriate units for each glass in either milliliters or ounces
üíßRewards for regular use and small missions encourage you to stay motivated and reach your own water consumption goals

üìà Simple charts and interfaces at a glance üìù
üíßGraphics that progressively track your daily water intake
üíßTrack your water consumption history and quickly view daily, weekly, and monthly trends
üíßSimple design and user-friendly interface, so you can easily build good habits
üíßOptimized for screens of all sizes for use on multiple devices


üåøA variety of adorable and lively plants ‚òò
üíßEach glass of water you drink also waters the plants, so you can grow and thrive together!
üíßAll kinds of special pots and containers. Develop your own cute plant family!
üíßUnlock and collect a variety of different plants, and even interact with mysterious new creatures!

‚ñºAny questions or suggestions?
You can go to Plant Nanny¬≤ > Menu > Settings > FAQ to quickly search for a solution.
If you‚Äôre still unable to find an answer to your question, tap the envelope icon in the top right corner to contact our ‚ÄúGarden Assistant‚Äù (customer service). :)

‚ñºFeel free to reach out to our support team with any suggestions
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/plantnannyapp/ 
or on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/plantnanny_us/ 

Privacy Policy and Terms of Service: http://fourdesire.com/terms

comments: It's a very cute way to track my water intake and has shown me that even though I thought I was drinking enough water, I wasn't! You have to go to the options and enable all the sizes otherwise it yells at you for drinking too fast when adding two 8oz cups in a row rather than 16oz if you drink a water bottle.

Took off a star because ot doesn't let me customize when not to get reminders. The app currently automatically excludes 10pm-8am from the reminder schedule for sleeping time. I wish it would let me set my own schedule for that. Other than that, the app works well and it's cute. Keep up the good work.

You basically feed your plant it's awesome and you can also get yourself a cup still this game is really awesome no ads just the drinking too fast a sign and don't drink too much water sign just for those inferences it's awesome so I just gave it a four star hope you like it too try this out it's free and you are going to like it

This app is a fun way to get me drinking the proper amount with cute plants and easy mechanics. Unfortunately the app notifications make no sound so I don't know to drink water unless I'm actively on my phone.

I love using this app, but for the past couple of days it suddenly won't open correctly. I have to open and close the app at least 5 times before it will stay open. Not sure what happened, my phone hasn't updated this week, so that's not the problem. *Update: tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Worked once, now back to the app closing every time I try to open it.

title: Meal reminder
description:
Meal reminder application will help you to follow the diet you have chosen, reminding you about eating at the right time. The application will create several reminders and help you track the time of food intake by days, show the days of reception in the calendar. 
In the settings you can choose the type of notification that suits you best, simple notifications or an alarm window with playback of the installed ringtone.
App meal reminder for people who follow a diet or want to start eating several times a day.

****
The application does not work?
Notifications may not work for Android related reasons. The system can automatically turn off notifications or shift the notification time to save battery power regardless of whether power saving is enabled or disabled. This issue applies to all versions of this application. Unfortunately, the developer cannot influence this process, in some cases the application will not work correctly or after some time will stop notifying.
In some cases, this may help:
- reinstalling the application.
- shutting down an energy-saving system.
- restriction of the use of various applications optimizing the operation of the device, including cleaning applications.

comments: Decent app, says what it does and I have had no problems with it. It has simple reminders, that are not too invasive and just pause whatever you're doing for 10 seconds. Easy to use and understand. A good app with little to no flaws.

I love, love this app. I can set timers to remind me to eat my meals, meal shakes, snacks, & take my vitamins. And it doesnt come in the same way others reminder apps do, with yet another calender on my phone. I love the set up of this app. The only thing I would say I dont like is I wish it had more pictures to choose from to put with my reminders. For example, a pill picture, shake picture, not just the generic pictures. Or where we can download our own pictures. Thumbs up to creators!! ‚ù§üíú
It never sounded the alarm. O hate that because I liked the ease and look of app.

Im very underweight and really hope this app helps me gain some weight.. For some reason I only get hungry before bed so most days I only eat once a day,I hope this app helps remind me to eat a minimum of 3 meals a day
Great app. Would give it 5 stars but the ads while trying to set up schedules are very intrusive. Doesn't take away the usefulness of the app tho

title: All reminder
description:
If you have many things in your head that you hardly can remember them, do not worry, All Reminder is here to solve your problem.
With All Reminder you can create as many notes as you want. 
Each note has a date and a time that you specify when you create the note.
When that date and hour is reached, the associated note will be notified to you.
With this app you won't forget birthdays, aniversaries, orders, etc. anymore.
Enjoy it.

comments: Doesn't work properly. Notifications show up but the alarm doesn't sound for some reminders. When they do sound, it's very quiet, although it does escalate to louder if left. Can't select 'weekday' or certain days as an option - have to set an alarm for Monday and repeat weekly, Tuesday and repeat weekly, etc. On the plus side it looks nice and can choose different colours for task types, for example.
Quite versatile and useful. Its force lies in its simplicity and clean design. You have colour options which makes it easy to categorise your reminders. Great for everything!
wonderful app. I was completely satisfied with the app. It reminds me every event before day also. alarm will rings at time we mentioned.
It's very good app but my feed back is to add little photo, notes like actual date.
Reminder has different colours great for keeping male/female birthdays, anniversaries and shows a list of what you have programmed with out having to look for ages

title: Medication List & Medical Records
description:
Background

The healthcare ecosystem is a disparate collection of various Electronic Health Records, EHRs, located at many provider locations; primary care, specialists, and facilities. A patient has no ready access to this information and providers do not have a complete medical history of a patient at an encounter.

The Medication List and Medical Records smartphone application allows a patient to keep their own set of relevant medical information on their phone for easy access and sharing.

Value Proposition

Keep all your medical records in one location for easy recall.

Benefits

You can reference records at any time. Be able to provide information to physicians like medication lists from smartphone. Can turn over relevant medical records to ER medical professionals in times of emergency. Keep track of blood pressure to help you and your physician manage hypertension. Keep a record of lab results to monitor important levels such as A1C for blood sugar levels. Keep track of your weight to help manage it's affect on blood pressure, diabetes, and other conditions.

Brief Summary

The application provides the patient with many features that help them maintain records of many common medical concepts. For example, there are features for medication lists, allergies, supplements, immunizations, diagnosis, procedures, as well at others. The patient is able to fill out multiple entries for any of the categories by family member. Thus if a household has the need to keep records for the family this is possible. 

Detailed Description

‚Ä¢	Medication List
‚Ä¢	Supplement List
‚Ä¢	Allergies List
‚Ä¢	Immunizations List
‚Ä¢	Appointments List
‚Ä¢	Diagnoses  List
‚Ä¢	Complaint List
‚Ä¢	Procedure List
‚Ä¢	Surgery List
‚Ä¢	Lab Results Records
‚Ä¢	Medical Notes
‚Ä¢	Medical History
‚Ä¢	Pharmacy List
‚Ä¢	Facilities, clinic, hospitals
‚Ä¢	Physicians
‚Ä¢	Family Members
‚Ä¢	Blood pressure records
‚Ä¢	Vital signs
‚Ä¢	Weight record
‚Ä¢	Reminders
‚Ä¢	Backup and Restore

recentChanges: This is a bug fix. The new UI explanation message for existing users was omitted in last release causing issues when accessing previous data. This only affects existing user that did not previously have Family Members defined. Family Member is now required but a compatibility mode (LIST ALL) is available. The message comes up on first launch.
comments: I love this app, been searching for an app like this for a long time. The only drawback I see is under lab results, there is a note section upon entering result. I put the range the result was supposed to be in, but when you go back to that result, the note section is gone. It didn't make any sense to put it there. There is a special note section, but I didn't know I needed to put it in there to keep it. Also on medication list. Not a section on meds to show what it treats. I highly recommend .

It's pretty good so far but a bit insufficient. You can use the app for multiple people and on the main page, you select the person you want. But then when you go into a category and choose an option to view (like appointments or meditations), you have to choose the person again. It gets annoying to choose the person each time you want to view something different even though that person is selected on the main page.

The only drawback of this app is that you have to type everything in so be great if you update the app where you can upload or sync lab results and medical record with doctors that use My chart and similar health records.
I use for personal use since I take a lot of medication and changes frequently but most doctor offices make you write all them down anyway. I suggest you keep a printed copy with you when you go

Great having all this information with at all times. In case of emergency or even a doctor's appt., lab work, x-rays any type of procedure with or without a hospital stay, they all want to know what Meds u take, what Doc referred, what Pharmacy u use. Now I don't have to carry a notebook with all this info in it. Most people always have their phone them.

title: Rxremind - Pill Reminder and Medication Tracker
description:
RxRemind has been working towards an app that focuses on pill reminder, medication tracker and medication adherence reporting and helping users take their medication on time with an overview on how well they adhere to taking their medications
.‚è∞ üíäüîî

"The economic impact of medication non-adherence is estimated to cost $100 billion annually"

In fact, Doctors and researchers agree that Increasing Medication adherence may have a greater effect on health than improvements in specific medical therapy.

Poor medication adherence takes the lives of 125,000 Americans annually, and costs the health care system nearly $300 billion a year in additional doctor visits, emergency department visits and hospitalizations.

There are in fact number of medication reminders, medication tracker, pill reminders, pill tracking apps currently in the market. Most try to accomplish the simple task of reminders for users with little or no focus on medication adherence as well as compromise user security when it comes to privacy and medication.

RxRemind provides its users with detailed medication adherence views
including late, skipped medication details for every medication/prescription.‚è∞ üíäüîî

It allows you to enter all your dosage, set up reminders and keep track of all your medications, medicines, prescription, pills, vitamins, supplements and when to take them.

What makes RxRemind so useful to users.

 Simple stand-alone app with a focus on user privacy and security. 
 ‚Ä¢ No need to share information with any third party companies or need for social logins.
 
Simple to create different types of reminders based on the dosage frequency or the time you take or interval.
‚Ä¢ A clear view of when to take the pill/medicine/medication/ prescription on the home screen. 

Clear Focus on your Medication Adherence and how consistently you are taking your medications, pills. 

‚Ä¢ Support for different dosage types and different medication, pills, prescription types.
‚Ä¢ Get notifications for taking medicines, medications, pills even when you are offline. 
‚Ä¢ Automatic track or update remaining medicine, medication, prescription, pills quantity. 


Refill notifications - Get refill reminders when to restock and how many doses are remaining. 
‚Ä¢ Get notification when your medicine, medication, prescription, pills are running low. 
‚Ä¢ Ability to refill or transfer an existing prescription, medicine, medication, pills.
‚Ä¢ Export all your prescription, medication,  medicine, pill data with ease. 

Get your Medication adherence report, medication listing report and send it to your doctor, nurse or health care professional in email.

‚Ä¢ All of your prescription,  medicine, medication, pill information is secure and is only stored on your iPhone. You can even protect it with a passcode. 
‚Ä¢ Historical tracking of your prescriptions, medications, medicine, pills.
‚Ä¢ Get the location of the nearest hospitals and chemist/pharmacy based on your current location worldwide.

Start managing your medications, pills, refills, vitamins, supplements improve your health. 

Our users rank Rxremind as one of the simplest apps for pill reminder and medication tracking.‚è∞ üíäüîî

Rxremind helps whether you are taking one drug dosage or many medications, it helps you in remembering each pill right on time. 
If you are a caretaker for the elderly, patients suffering from chronic pain or illness, you know how stressful it is not knowing for sure if your loved one took their medications
correctly especially when they suffer from chronic illness and missing a drug dosage can have many consequences.

Rxremind is free to download and use. our premium upgrade options give you ads-free version for $0.99, medication adherence reporting for $2.99 and a complete version for $3.99  
* Current version supports English and Norwegian language.

Ideas, Suggestions, feedback, and issues. Help us improve RxRemind by sharing your thoughts with us. 

Email: support@rxremindme.com

 
Thanks,
RxRemind Team

If you are a caretaker for the elderly, patients suffering from chronic pain or illness, you know how stressful it is not knowing for sure if your loved one took their medications
correctly especially when they suffer from chronic illness and missing a drug dosage can have many consequences.

Rxremind is free to download and use. our premium upgrade options give you ads-free version for $0.99, medication adherence reporting for $2.99 and a complete version for $3.99
* Current version supports English and Norwegian language.

Ideas, Suggestions, feedback, and issues. Help us improve RxRemind by sharing your thoughts with us.

Email: support@rxremindme.com


Thanks,
RxRemind Team

title: Alarms, tasks, reminder, calendar - all in one
description:
Caynax Alarm Clock is more than just alarm clock.
It is perfect solution for time management, todo list, tasks list or tasks reminder.

Alarm categories:
Quick - make a note/alarm with two simple clicks
Everyday - runs everyday
Work days - runs on selected work days
Cyclic - runs every x-th day, every x-th week or every x-th month (PRO only)
Timer - simple timer (countdown) alarm
Any - select any days from calendar
Annual - birthday, anniversary (PRO only)

Main features:
- independent settings for each alarm like alarm length, ringtone, volume level, snooze and more
- dismiss option: standard buttons, math problem or arrange/complete quotation
- next alarms widget
- gentle alarm - increasing ringtone mode
- Android Wear notifications support

Free alarm clock version contains in-app ads and has some limitations.

What's more in PRO version:
- no ads
- annual/Birthday/Anniversary alarm
- cyclic alarm repeat up to 90 days
- cyclic alarm can be repeated every x-th month
- sunrise and sunset alarms (with dawn and dusk support)
- shake to snooze
- snooze count up to 100
- full alarm profiles support

Permissions:
READ_PHONE_STATE - to detect incoming phone call and snooze alarm.
RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - to set up alarms after phone start.
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, INTERNET - ads, checking for new app version, Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics, Google Drive.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - backup/restore settings, play ringtones located on external memory.
WAKE_LOCK - to wake device and show alert window on time.
DISABLE_KEYGUARD - disable keyguard (lock screen) when alarm starts.
VIBRATE - vibrate during alarm.
ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION - optionally used on Andorid 6+ devices to calculate sunrise/sunset time for current location. User has to grant application that permission. Otherwise applciaiton does not have access to GPS data.

title: epocrates
description:
Save time in the prescribing moment.

- Rx and OTC monographs: pharmacology, prescribing and safety information, adult and pediatric dosing, adverse reactions, contraindications, black box warnings, pregnancy and lactation considerations, and more
- Drug interaction checker: prevent harmful interactions between up to 30 brand, generic, OTC, or alternative drugs
- Pill identifier: organized by shape, color, imprint code, etc.
- 600+ dosing calculators, medical equations, and tools
- Formularies: drug coverage for 6,600+ U.S. insurance plans, by state
- Customizable home screen with drag-and-drop simplicity

Additional features in epocrates+, now just $16.99/month!
- Alternative medicine monographs: dosage, interactions, etc.
- Peer-reviewed disease content from the BMJ
- Labs, ICD-10 codes, and more medical content

 
Since 1998, epocrates has helped more than one million clinicians prescribe with confidence, save time, and stay focused on the patient. Rated the #1 medical app 10 years in a row by Decision Resource Group‚Äôs ‚ÄúTaking the Pulse.‚Äù 
 
For more information, see our Terms of Service https://www.epocrates.com/termsOfUse.do and Privacy Policy http://www.epocrates.com/privacy.

Get a detailed description of over 50000+ medications found in the U.S. against its Name, Shape, Color, and Imprint. Also, you can find all the contact details of your nearby doctor.

title: Smart Med Reminder
description:
Taking your medication as prescribed is the best way to get the full benefits of your treatment, which will ultimately lead to better health and lower healthcare costs.  The Smart Med Reminder‚Ñ¢ mobile application works with a connected prescription cap that you receive from your pharmacist or health care provider to help you follow your doctor's instructions.

The Smart Med Reminder cap is customized for your prescription when you pick up your medicine.  After you first open the cap, it beeps and flashes on your schedule when it's time to take your dose.  The companion Smart Med Reminder app allows you to receive alerts when you are on the go, manage your schedule, and customize your cap.

Simply open the bottle as you would normally, take your medicine, and replace the cap.  The Smart Med Reminder System will help you remember when it is time for your next dose.  Login to your App regularly to update your data, check your progress, and manage your schedule and cap features.

The Smart Med Reminder‚Ñ¢ System is intended to serve as a helper to remind you to take your medication. Always follow your prescription label instructions and consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have questions. 

If you would like to know how to acquire the Smart Med Reminder cap, or if you have questions, check out our website at smartmedreminder.com, or contact us at support@concordancehealth.com.

title: KnowYourMeds
description:
KnowYourMeds is your digital health assistant that enables you to manage your health and any health-related conditions effectively. It tracks your vitals, sends you pill reminders, keeps you aware of drug interactions, including possible side-effects, and informs you about the latest information related to your drugs, chronic conditions and overall health. 
KnowYourMeds has several features that make it the perfect app for managing your health, and your family‚Äôs too! 


Medication Management 
Never miss a pill again, or even re-filling the prescription for one! The medication management features of this app make sure that you are taking your meds in a timely fashion without risking any harmful interactions with food or other drugs.  
With KnowYourMeds, get the benefits of: 
‚è∞ Pill reminders 
‚è∞ Refill reminders 
‚ö†Ô∏è Drug interaction warnings 
üíäDrug to drug interaction checker 
üçö Drug to food interaction checker

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Family and caregiving management 
üì¢Provider Communications
 
 
Condition management 
The condition management feature provides guidance to the user to track certain health metrics appropriately for their medical condition, allows them to monitor symptoms, track side effects, medication adherence, and provides the user the ability to share their progress with their doctor. 
Stay on top of your medical condition with: 
üìñCondition information 
ü©∫Vitals tracking 
üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Monitor dependents conditions 
üë• Community support 
 
Health Management 
The KnowYourMeds digital health assistant acts as your buddy helping monitor your health and guiding you in your journey towards a healthier, more engaged life. 
  
Take charge of your health with: 
üìñ Health education 
üíäNutritional supplements learning
üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èHealthy lifestyle management 
 
A wealth of information on your fingertips! 
With an exhaustive database of medicines, latest research on current trends in healthcare, and curated information on the side-effects/drug interactions, KnowYourMeds is an all-in-one tool/app for your health. comments: KnowYourMeds is a very easy to use app to manage your medications. You can set daily reminders to take your meds and can check for adverse reactions between medications.
This is a fantastic app! Extremely helpful...there are notifications reminding me to take my medications. At the end of the day, it also asks if I have taken all the pills. Highly recommended!
Dosage schedule options are: Daily Weekly Monthly As needed However this does NOT account for meds taken BIWEEKLY. Not all meds are as simple as a set schedule folks.
They added a save button in med tracking and now it works!

Very useful! The reminders are great, and the push notifications aren't overdone. Learned a lot about drug interactions. Also offers a lot of unexpected features like vitals tracking and appointment reminders. It does a lot more than what I downloaded it for. Worth a try for sure.

title: MedPlus Mart - Online Pharmacy
description:
Buy genuine medicines, baby, nutrition, healthcare, personal care, diabetic and other specialty products at best prices using the MedPlus Mart App. This app provides you access to all the services provided by MedPlus pharmacies conveniently from the comfort of your home through an easy to use interface.

MedPlus Mart App is a comprehensive medical App where you can not only order medicines but also read important information about the medicines you take, their alternatives or substitutes, precautions and their side effects. Medicine delivery is restricted to states where MedPlus operates, but you can order other OTC & health products, nutrition, baby care, diabetes care and personal care products from across many regions & cities in India. 

Some Key Features of MedPlus Mart App:

- Order medicines for home delivery - Search & select the medicines you require, upload your medicine list, and tell us your delivery address. Our registered pharmacist will verify, authorize and process your order and get it delivered to your home. We deliver your medicines in most cities in 6-24 hrs and about 2-3 days in most other places.

- Order medicines for click & pick - Search & select the medicines you require, select a MedPlus store near you for pick up and confirm the order. We will send you an SMS when the order is ready for pickup. Come to the store at a time convenient for you, show our pharmacist your medicine list and take your medicines home. No queues and no worries about the availability of medicines. 

- Assisted orders - If you are not sure how to read your medicine list or what medicines to select, just upload your  prescription with medicine list.  Our customer care representative will call you and help you with the order.
 In case you need any doctor consulation you can opt for the same.

- Order general products from a comprehensive range of baby, healthcare, nutrition, personal care, diabetes care and OTC products. Home delivery or click and pick. 

- Save up to 35% on medicines with FlexiRewards - our rewards programme let's you choose cash or household products on your purchases giving you flexibility and best value for your hard earned money.

- Search for medicine availability at a MedPlus store near you - Just select the medicine you are looking for and click a button for a list of MedPlus stores near you where the medicine is available for purchase real time.

- Get complete information about medicines you take including indications, adverse effects, precautions and alternatives.

- Locate the nearest MedPlus store ‚Äì The App will automatically detect your current location and help you locate the nearest store or you can locate a store by entering your locality information manually if desired. 

- Keep all your health records in one place - MedPlus Mart App provides you unlimited storage to upload and keep all you health records in one place. Medicine list history and previous orders are automatically recorded and available any time.

- Print your bills anytime - All your MedPlus bills available in one place in the App for you to print anytime, anywhere.

- Redeem FlexiRewards points - You can view available points and redeem your points for delivery or pick up through the MedPlus Mart App.

- Set up a Pill Reminder ‚Äì if you are having trouble remembering when to take your medicines, set up a pill reminder through the App for alerts on your phone reminding you to take the pill at the time it is due.

About MedPlus
MedPlus is one of India's leading and reputed pharmacy network with over 1500+ stores in 7 states offering genuine medicines, superior service and great value for money to its customers.

comments: The app is easy to navigate. It is lite and hence hangs less. But, it has a major shortcoming which needs to be taken care of : 1. The location address need not be the delivery address. But, the app automatically adds the location address along with my delivery address. Thus, creating a confussion of two addresses! It should add nearby some well known (locally) place and not the full address of that well known place.

Great platform but lacking at many places. Most of the tabs stay out of stock & even after requesting for product doesn't get back in stock. App allow us to see the nearest store where we can get the medicine but that is also of no use, if you found 1 medicine at store "A" , you can't get your second medicine at the same store, you will have to go to store "B" to get your second medicine and same keep goes if you've prescribed 3 or more variety of medicines. Truly unprofessional service. üôÅ

The app is very easy to use and the delivery of medicines is very fast. Would give it 5 stars if the tracking of the products would be accurate. I received the parcel earlier and next day I got an SMS that the parcel has been dispatched. Please fix the tracking system, overall a great experience.

It's been absolutely great from the begining,i could find medicines & even its alternatives that aren't available within our locality. Shopping has been made easy with this app, but the issue is for the past few days i'm unable to log in n it always appears a blank page while running the app. I request your team to solve the inconvience caused . Rather than that, I highly recommend everyone to use this app.

title: AlarMeds alarm meds reminder
description:
LANGUAGES: english, espa√±ol, fran√ßais, galego.

"AlarMeds" is an application created to help you to remember to take your medication, an intuitive medical reminder that allows you to schedule custom alarms. Unlike some applications, the alarm information is saved when you switch off your device, and retrieved automatically when you switch it on. 
Among other benefits, you can take a photo of the medicament and the dose or choose them from your picture gallery (pills, sachets, syrup, etc), add notes, save and export a dossier, call your emergency telephone numbers (for example a person, a pharmacy or a hospital), set the sound (on, off, vibration), the melody (any song you prefer), the volume, change the size of your drug picture (the best for tablets), select the time format (am or pm), etc.. All this through a simple design and easy to handle.

Store until 20 different alarms, and you won't need to be alert for an alarm clock or another people...

If you prefer, you can free download "AlarMeds FREE" (only for one alarm and medicine) and test its helpfulness.

Permissions:
"AlarMeds" does not keep any information about you out of the device. In addition, it requires only basic phone permits for proper operation.

The developers of this application encourage you to give feedback about it in order to optimize and correct if necessary.

title: EllieGrid
description:
At EllieGrid, we make beautiful and intuitive products designed to promote wellness, so that our users can live happier and healthier lives. The EllieGrid app works seamlessly with the Ellie pill box to make medication management easier and more empowering than ever!

EllieGrid's app and smart pill box allows users to:
‚Ä¢ Streamline their medication management with a product that doesn't look like a medical device
‚Ä¢ Organize all of their medications in seconds
‚Ä¢ Receive reminders when it is time to take their pills
‚Ä¢ Keep track of their medication adherence
‚Ä¢ Notify caregivers about missed alarms
descriptionHTML:
At EllieGrid, we make beautiful and intuitive products designed to promote wellness, so that our users can live happier and healthier lives. The EllieGrid app works seamlessly with the Ellie pill box to make medication management easier and more empowering than ever!

EllieGrid's app and smart pill box allows users to:
‚Ä¢ Streamline their medication management with a product that doesn't look like a medical device
‚Ä¢ Organize all of their medications in seconds
‚Ä¢ Receive reminders when it is time to take their pills
‚Ä¢ Keep track of their medication adherence
‚Ä¢ Notify caregivers about missed alarms
summary: Make medication management easier and more empowering than ever! üíä
recentChanges: This version contains improvements for the adherence reports, timezone changes, pill box alarm synchronization, deep login auth tokens, permissions handling, user interface, and more.
comments: I would rate the concept a 5. I love that it is made in the USA and was willing to pay more to support their values- production must have cost a lot more. I like the quality of the unit and would recommend it for the above reasons. However, this is a review of the app. The app needs work. I'd like to see a more intuitive layout. I'm frustrated trying to navigate to where I can see the medicine name and indicate I took it. It just needs to be a succinct, 1 screen med list with TAKEN checkboxes
This product is a real hit and miss. For the cost, I expect more. The notifications are a complete mess. I got 8 trivia questions at 308 am. My alarms are 6 am and 6 pm.

I gave EllieGrid a 4 star because I use to forget to take my pills and sometimes I would take them and couldn't remember if I took them later in the day. It has helped because: - Alarms, dosages and days of the week are customizable - Latest update has auto Bluetooth connection when in range - EllieGrid alarms when it's time to take the medication - EllieGrid generates a report of when the pill box is opened for the that day and keeps history for the week. - The pill count feature notifies me when dosage count is low based on initial setup and dosage. Looks to be a week to 10 day alert. - Customer support response has been great. - How to videos are effective in covering features Why not a 5 star: -While it gives push notifications to my cell phone on some things, push notifications to my android for dosage due, dosage missed and low pill count would be beneficial when not with in ear shot of the pill box alarm. - Push notification for low battery level on the pill box would be a beneficial reminder to recharge EllieGrid. - The ability to select half dosages would allow tracking accurate usage so the low dosage warning would be accurate. - A customizable Bluetooth name would allow me to track both mine and my sons pill box as he requires my assistance Me and my son have been using EllieGrid for about 6 months and it has proven to be a valuable aide.

Update 10/5/2020- I was able to get on and get it set up. Pros- It's a very cool concept and I've been using it for 3 days now. As someone who works 60+ hours a week I found it hard to remember to take my supplements throughout the day. I'd get busy and 3 hours would have passed. This helps me not only to take my supplements, but because I'm taking something at 4 intervals throughout the day it's also helping to drink more water and eat healthier which was part of my health journey.

The box definitely helps me keep my husband regular on his medication, but the app doesn't register when the box is opened and has to be manually checked off within the app itself. I hope this issue gets fixed. Edit: I know how it's supposed to work. It does not do that. Lmao. So yes, I have to manually mark that the pill is taken every day, and that's a little bit of a bummer.

title: Any.do: To do list, Reminders, Planner & Calendar
description:
üèÜ Editor's Choice by Google

It's the #1 to-do list, reminders, planner & calendar app.
Over 30M people rely on Any.do to stay organized and get more done.

ü•á "A MUST HAVE APP" (Lifehacker, NYTimes, USA TODAY, WSJ).

Any.do is a  free to-do list, planner & calendar app for managing and organizing your daily tasks, to-do lists, notes, reminders, checklists, calendar events, grocery lists and more.

üìÖ Organize your tasks & to-do list

‚Ä¢ ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Any.do to-do list & planner support daily calendar view, 3-day Calendar view, Weekly calendar view & agenda view, with built-in reminders. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event.

‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done. 

---

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER & CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list. 
For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date. 
For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminder, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments. 
To keep your to do list up to date, we‚Äôve added a daily planner and focus mode.

INTEGRATIONS
Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding do@Any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to- tasks.

DAILY PLANNER & LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have. 

SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS
To plan & organize projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in-sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

GROCERY LIST & SHOPPING LIST
Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones and see them adding their shopping items in real-time.

title: Repeat Reminder
description:
Do you have to repeat something every so often? Then, this app may be for you.

Simply set your interval, press "Start" and put your phone to sleep. You will get a beep every interval ... forever (well, until you "Stop" the app).

There are a number of options to make the app work just right for you.

2 modes
  * In the Alarm mode, you can put your phone to sleep (press the Power button)
  * In the Interval Training, aka Countdown, mode, the phone will countdown each period

Favorites
  * Stores "favorites" -- up to 9 for Alarm, 9 for Interval Training
  * Swipe through your favorites
  * Each favorite has its unique color (also a number at the top-right)

Use it for any of the following :
  * HIIT [other intervals -- work/rest, study/internet]
  * Round-the-dinner-table "debates"
  * Kitchen timer (my favorite! Pancakes, fried bread, rice...)
  * Pill reminder
  * Take a break from staring at your computer screen (or co-worker)
  * Get off your butt periodically (in the office)
descriptionHTML:
Do you have to repeat something every so often? Then, this app may be for you.

Simply set your interval, press "Start" and put your phone to sleep. You will get a beep every interval ... forever (well, until you "Stop" the app).

There are a number of options to make the app work just right for you.

2 modes
* In the Alarm mode, you can put your phone to sleep (press the Power button)
* In the Interval Training, aka Countdown, mode, the phone will countdown each period

Favorites
* Stores "favorites" -- up to 9 for Alarm, 9 for Interval Training
* Swipe through your favorites
* Each favorite has its unique color (also a number at the top-right)

Use it for any of the following :
* HIIT [other intervals -- work/rest, study/internet]
* Round-the-dinner-table "debates"
* Kitchen timer (my favorite! Pancakes, fried bread, rice...)
* Pill reminder
* Take a break from staring at your computer screen (or co-worker)
* Get off your butt periodically (in the office)
summary: Repeat something every so often? Interval train? Check out Repeat Reminder!
developerAddress:
169 Ironwood Rd
Guelph ON
Canada N1G 3P5
recentChanges: Vibrate option. Modified to allow for multiple options.
comments: Very bad app, does not ring in background . Useless
I use the app for pacing when exercising and studying. The developer responded to my request to make the high volume setting an option in settings. Really appreciate it. Definitely recommend.
I like it's easy to use and straightforward does what it's supposed to. Also a number of options.

If I turn off the "Built in beep", "Do not disturb" mutes the App and at every start or restart I have to visit the settings and go back, to make sure that there is any sound at all. It also gets killed in less than 15 min., after turning off the screen unless I turn on "Bring to Front". For longer Intervals I have to make sure, that I don't turn off the screen before the 1st Interval has reached its last 14 min. . After the 1st sound with off screen the App runs all time in foreground mode.

This app is exactly what I wanted. It's simple to use, too. I will set the interval at 10 sec. I will use it to audio sync two action cameras, which start a new file every 10 minutes. I will be fishing in a kayak. Now, if I can catch some fish.

title: Thyroid Tracker (Blood, Medicine, Weight, Remind)
description:
Get the FREE and ad-free "MUST HAVE" Thyroid Tracker. Join the millions of people who take charge of their thyroid health and track their thyroid bloodwork, regular medication and changes in weight. ThyForLife offers a free app for you stay on track and never miss another med.

‚ù§Ô∏è Key Features
‚Ä¢ Thyroid blood results tracker (TSH, T4, T3, Tg, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Medicine tracker
‚Ä¢ Weight tracker
‚Ä¢ Reminders to take thyroid medication
‚Ä¢ Intuitive graphic display
‚Ä¢ Comparative analysis between different labs by normalizing thyroid bloodwork results onto a single scale

ü©∏ BLOOD RESULTS: Record and keep track of your thyroid blood test results
‚Ä¢ Record thyroid bloodwork, incl. TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone), T4 (Total Thyroxine), Free T4 (Free Thyroxine), T3 (Total Triiodothyronine), Free T3 (Free Triiodothyronine), TG (Thyroglobulin), TGAb (Antibody to Thyroglobulin)
‚Ä¢ Include comments alongside your results
‚Ä¢ Normalize the results on a single scale if the blood tests are done by different labs with varying reference ranges and blood test units (e.g. mIU/L, uIU/mL, pmol/L, ng/dL, ng/mL, ng/L, pg/mL, ng%)

üíä MEDICATION: Record and keep track of the thyroid medication you‚Äôre taking, including changes
‚Ä¢ Record your dosage of T4 (e.g. Synthroid, Levothroid, Nature-Throid) and T3 (e.g. Thybon, Cytomel)
‚Ä¢ Indicate the frequency of the dosage (e.g. daily or every other day)
‚Ä¢ Include comments to indicate why the medication dosage changes when it does

‚öñÔ∏è WEIGHT: Record and keep track of the changes in your weight
‚Ä¢ Indicate your weight over time
‚Ä¢ Include comments to act as reminders
‚Ä¢ Draw insights on how your thyroid health and medication impact your weight

üîî NOTIFICATIONS: Set reminders to take your thyroid medication
‚Ä¢ Enable notifications to remind you to take your thyroid medication
‚Ä¢ Never forget another dose

üîí  PRIVACY
Your personal data is stored on your phone and we do not release it to third parties.

ThyForLife is available for FREE. We hope you find our app valuable! We are in the process of building an improved version of the app with new features and functions. Support us with your ideas and feedback ‚Äì either from the app or via info@thyforlife.com.

recentChanges: Thanks for using ThyForLife‚Äôs Thyroid Tracker! Your feedback means a world to us. We are in the process of developing a new version of the app with improved features and functions. Please email us at info@thyforlife.com if you have any suggestions. We‚Äôd love to hear from you!
comments: I just started using this app and I found the graphics very informative. I would suggest adding a menu to track menstrual cycle since thyroiditis can affect it and it would be great to have all info in one app. Also, it is confusing that the app close down whenever I press the "back" button, I think it would make more sense for it to redirect to the main menu. Last thing, top and bottom values of the bloodwork will very unlikely change over time so saving them would be great. Thanks

Just set up the app and it looks like it is going to be very helpful...having everything in one place organized. The biggest change I would make would be the back arrow not bumping you out of the app. Something else that would be great would be a list of foods to eat whether you have hyperthyroidism or hypothyroidism. Also, a place to keep track of what you eat would be great as well. Thank you :)
Great app, simple and intuitive to use. No annoying ads. Seems like the team is about to release a major update - looking forward to seeing what the full version looks like!
Cool graph is a tid confusing with other results in background. Graphs could be better. Otherwise. Good place to store info so I'm not having to go on mychart all the time.
Very good app for tracking all the data, easy to use. I am looking forward to be downloading a new version that I hear is coming soon.

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker
description:
Get reminded to take your medications. Never forget a single dose. With a beautiful design, and easy to use, this app will take care of your health. Did you know that the outcome of a treatment can improve greatly if the prescribed medications are taken on time without ever skipping doses? üíäüîî

It doesn't matter what conditions you have (diabetes, hypertension), what medications you take (painkillers, antibiotics), or what measurements you want to track (weight, mood, insulin, cholesterol, walking steps). This is the app for you.

üíä Features
‚Ä¢ Add all the medications you take.
‚Ä¢ Add how much dose to take each time.
‚Ä¢ Choose when and how to be reminded to take your medications.
‚Ä¢ Choose what to do if you miss a dose.
‚Ä¢ Review what doses you took or skipped in the past days.
‚Ä¢ Send a compliance report to your doctor.
‚Ä¢ Get reminded to refill each medication.
‚Ä¢ Graphically arrange your medications in the box.
‚Ä¢ Check interactions between medications.
‚Ä¢ Record diverse health measurements.
‚Ä¢ Add extra doses when needed.
‚Ä¢ Complex schedules supported, including birth control pills.
‚Ä¢ The charts visually show your progress. 
‚Ä¢ Track your weight, mood or walking steps.

üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Case Study
‚Ä¢ This app is successfully used with patients that have mental health treatments for schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or depression. The app reminds the patients to take their antipsychotic, mood stabilizer, or antidepressant medications. Adherence to treatment has significantly decreased symptoms and relapses.

üîí Privacy
‚Ä¢ Your personal information is never shared with third parties.
‚Ä¢ No special permissions required.
‚Ä¢ No registration required.

üîé More Information
‚Ä¢ To receive all reminders, unmonitor the app's battery usage, and remove the app from battery optimization. The app helps you do this.
‚Ä¢ Translated to English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian.

recentChanges: * Dark mode supported.

title: Medicalog for Families
description:
Do you wish you could keep track with all the health issues in your family?

‚ÄúLove it. Helps with keeping track of kids illness‚Äù
‚ÄúExcellent app. allows me to keep track of my family's medical history without clogging up my general calendar‚Äù

Knowledge is power, and this app puts the power in your hands:

‚Ä¢ Exact description of the disease onset and progress when talking to a doctor
‚Ä¢ Easier identification of reoccurring problems for each family member separately
‚Ä¢ Help you examine the connection between illness and treatment ‚Äì did the treatment given really help over the long run, or should you maybe consider alternatives?
‚Ä¢ A report for each family member showing his or her medical state throughout the year. You can easily see which illnesses are repeated, how many sick days where reported etc'
‚Ä¢ An overview report for all family members 
‚Ä¢ A graphical calendar view for each person showing his daily status
‚Ä¢ A calendar overview for the entire family
‚Ä¢ Create your own "family medical cabinet"
‚Ä¢ Log Doctor visits, appointments and prescribed medication with relation to problem 
* Acts as a real Health Diary (a.k.a. Health Book, Medical Diary or Health Journal). Can also be used as menstruation tracker.
‚Ä¢ Keep track of physical treatment (from medical procedures and surgeries to alternative medicine like acupuncture and shiatsu)
‚Ä¢ Create your family's digital "vaccinations booklet"
‚Ä¢ Keep detailed record of symptoms and other detailed physical state required for special treatments, like homeopathy
‚Ä¢ Keep all your Family's medical history ‚Äì Hospitalizations, allergies, blood type, chronic diseases and conditions and more
‚Ä¢ Includes hundreds of symptoms (what is the issue, where it hurts, general feeling, fever, appetite, skin conditions and many more) and common diseases, all carefully collected with the advice of doctors and pharmacists. Search or pick by body region. In addition, you can manually add any information you care about
‚Ä¢ A personalized treatments list (Report medication type, sickness days, doctors, specialists treatments, vaccinations and more)
‚Ä¢ Great for any person responsible for tracking symptoms of others (as a mom and dad, your elderly parents, chronically sick child etc.)
* As some of our users do - keep track of sick pets too!
* Includes configurable reminders (can be used as simple medication reminder)
‚Ä¢ Complete privacy! Your personal data is stored on your device and is only accessible by you
* Have your EMR - Electronic medical record - handy at all times
* Highest rated android app of its kind
‚Ä¢ Free!

Visit our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/MedicalogApp

For FAQs and more visit our website:
http://www.medicalogapp.com

Permissions: "External USB" is for backup, "Boot" is for allowing notifications, "Network state" is required to offer the right features when network is available and "billing" is to allow purchase of "pro" version.

Important notice: this application is not a replacement for medical advice.  Please read our Terms of Use here: http://www.lemondraft.com/medicalog/EULA.html

Yoni Netanyahu 12, Givat Shmuel, Israel

recentChanges:
2.05 - bug fixes
2.03 - Now you can add notes (after upgrade)
2.01 - We now offer many new much-asked-for features through upgrades: Backup and restore, exact time reports (with possibility of multiple reports per day), more possible colors, new "specialists" report, no ads and much more. All previous options remain as they were, free as always.

Please contact us with any problem you find and we'll fix ASAP.
comments: Makes such an important difference going to the Dr when you can say exactly when something started and you can report symptoms you forgot about. Unfortunately ‚Ä¢ I can't load a photo in the profile ("Unable to load photo" error message). ‚Ä¢ I'd love a search feature so I can tell the Dr when a particular event last happened. ‚Ä¢ It would be nice to also be able to change symptom icons too. Fix these 3 things and I'll rate a well deserved 5/5.

This app is exactly what I needed! I've been using a notebook to record all the symtoms, medication, doctor visit, etc. in the past two years. I no longer need to write them anymore. Love the electronic recording app! Thank you developers for this great app! I highly recommended!!

You can't add notes without upgrading, which is kind of a basic feature. I want to simply mark if they are healthy or sick for the day. If they are sick then second level would be something like "has a sore throat", or fever. I don't want to look through a list of 50 illness to find fever. It just didn't work for me.

I'm using Medicalog to keep track of my kids' conditions and Medications, especially when treating them at home and they are all sick. Con- the entries come under a date, but without a time stamp. I have to add the times of the medication given manually as a note.

Does not work! I upgraded to full version in order to get full benefit of the app. Will not let me add any medications. Have to scroll through a huge list of obscure diseases just to get to something simple like fever.

title: Medical Dictionary-Pill Reminder & Tracker
description:
Medical Dictionary-Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker is used to help to take the pill on time. You can easily schedule pills as prescribed by the doctor. This pill reminder app allows you and your doctor to put your treatment‚Äôs success into medication tracker. The pill reminder app serves as a basic medical dictionary for users to know full details about all the diseases, how they occur and their respective treatment. In short, a medical dictionary is your one-stop to get knowledge about all the clinical diseases.
Add medicine details like the time to take medicines, daily schedule, dosage, with or without food, doctor details, etc. in medication tracker. You can easily edit your medication schedule by adding a new pill or removing the existing prescription. The medical dictionary has all the detailed symptoms about the various diseases which are common and critical for humans. You can search and get knowledge of various medical diseases to prevent yourself and others from serious harm.
Keep track of your health with this pill reminder and medication tracker. Just set up a reminder of your medicine in one go and be stress-free. You will no longer have to worry about your medicine as this app will remind you to take the medicine on time. Pill reminder allows putting multiple executions for the same alarm, thus ensuring a great versatility in the repetition settings. Pill reminder is providing ease to its users to take medication on time. Now you will never forget to take medicines because pill reminder is there to remind you of the time.
Features of Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker
‚Ä¢	Medical dictionary 
‚Ä¢	Pill reminder
‚Ä¢	Medication tracker
‚Ä¢	Simple and easy to use interface
‚Ä¢	Reminders to take medicine on time
‚Ä¢	Set alarm to repeat daily or for certain days
Download now medical dictionary, pill reminder & medication tracker, create your own reminders to take medicine on time so you and family don't have to worry about your health. Do give us your valuable feedback so that we can make improvements in the future if required.

title: CUCO Pill Reminders
description:
Hey! Do you find it difficult to take your medications on time and wish you would never miss a dose again? Than this app was made for you!! We know you have so much to do during your day and sometimes is hard to remember to take your pills. But it is very important that you do :) 

CUCO is your digital health assistant that will remind you to take your pills at the right moment. There are much more people facing problems to manage their medications. Chronic diseases such as diabetes, cholesterol, depression and hypertension are much better controlled when you take your meds on time! 

With CUCO app Pill Reminder you won‚Äôt be alone on your medical treatment anymore! You can easily schedule the medications you are taking and get a CUCO alert when its time to take them! Be in charge of your own health and get empowered by this amazing app! 

KNOW OUR FEATURES, MADE WITH LOVE FOR YOU: 

- Search your medication: List with thousands of medications from FDA medication database
- Alarms: Alarms will remind you when it‚Äôs time to take your pills 
- Medications historical: Check if you took the pill on the right moment and get to know if you had missed a dose during the month
- Caregivers: You can get alerted when the people who you love is not taking their pills correctly by adding caregivers in CUCO 

Is this the right app for me? YES!!! And this is why: our team is truly passionate about helping people to take care of their lives and we work very hard to improve your experience on medical treatments! 

And guess what: CUCO is the MOST REWARDED DIGITAL HEALTH STARTUP IN LATIN AMERICA! The latest news to share is that APPLE has chosen CUCO Pill Reminder as one of 13 apps AROUND THE WORLD to be part of Apple Entrepreneur Camp.  

Not only loved by healthcare system, but - and most important - loved by our users!!!! 

Do you have any question or feedback? Please don‚Äôt hesitate to write us an email contact@cucohealth.com

We‚Äôll be happy to help you out!

recentChanges: Stability improvements
comments: I like the app, especially the cuckoo alarm. I would have liked to not receive reminders when the medication is taken in time. There is no option to opt out of it.

Alarm is annoying & obnoxious. None of my caregivers get notified when I miss a dose even though I receive theirs. No response from author after 2 weeks. FAQ & medication names are in Spanish. Great idea just poorly executed. Just ok for a free app.
Should have medicine inventory with refill alerts when medicine in inventory reaches a certain level. So that medicine will not be skipped.
I wish I could inform another person about my report list too. But this is a great app. Thanks.
every update or phone restart loses most of the medication entered.

title: Medicine Alarm PRO
description:
This application is a medication reminder that is easy-use, stylish design, and have no unnecessary features.

**** Notes ****
* Even on manner mode, notification will play sound which is set unless you set alarm sound to vibration or silent.
* After reboot device or remove recent apps, alarm notification will be closed automatically.Use [reactivate](one-touch operation) to make alarm notification active.


**** Features ****
* Add/Edit medicine
  - set medicine name, dosage and so on.
  - four types of interval/frequecy(evey day, every X days, specific weekdays, Xth of every month) are available.
  - multiple alarms(no max limit) are support to each medicine.
  - is available to custermize alarm sound(even vibration mode or silent mode).
  - delete a medication, or pause(keep it for reference)/reactivate it.

* Reactivate alarm notification
  - after reboot your device or remove recent apps, set alarm notification acitve again.

* Go to help page
  - open how-to page via web browser.

* Share this app
  - share medicine alarm PRO to others via mail or SNS by one-touch operation.

* Evaluate this app
  - evaluate medicine alarm PRO or write comments.

* Exit
  - exit medicine alarm PRO(alarms stay alive).

* After reboot device or remove recent apps, alarm notification will be closed automatically.Use [reactivate](one-touch operation) to make alarm notification active.


**** Features ****
* Add/Edit medicine
- set medicine name, dosage and so on.
- four types of interval/frequecy(evey day, every X days, specific weekdays, Xth of every month) are available.
- multiple alarms(no max limit) are support to each medicine.
- is available to custermize alarm sound(even vibration mode or silent mode).
- delete a medication, or pause(keep it for reference)/reactivate it.

* Reactivate alarm notification
- after reboot your device or remove recent apps, set alarm notification acitve again.

* Go to help page
- open how-to page via web browser.

* Share this app
- share medicine alarm PRO to others via mail or SNS by one-touch operation.

* Evaluate this app
- evaluate medicine alarm PRO or write comments.

* Exit
- exit medicine alarm PRO(alarms stay alive).
summary: Manage your medicine list and set multiple alarms which have flexible interval.

title: Reminder Pills and Medications - Mediplus
description:
Mediplus will help you remember your medication and pills. You will be able to control your record of pills, medicines, health journal so that your treatment is a success.

‚è∞ Characteristic
* Alarms and reminders of pills, pills, for any medication
* Pill Control with log Journal
* Drug alarm for different doses and doses
* Dose monitoring, measurements, activities
* Personalized medicines
* Possibility of multiple users so that the whole family can use it
* Easy and intuitive to use

üíä Medication alarms
We designed an app from the reminder of medication in meeting all your needs of medicine: alarm pills (I.e. birth control pills), complete database of medicine with prescription or without it, support for dieferentes types of doses (tablet, lozenge, inhaler), even alarms to replenish your medication. As the app is not only an alarm for the pill, but also a record of medications, you only have to review their daily pills to make sure that you have taken the correct dose.

üíä Health journal
Mediplus has been designed with people who need medical treatment such as diabetics for the reminder of their Metformin medication. 

üë• Multi-user
Mediplus can add up to 50 users at no cost and free of charge. Set up all your family members and receive personalized alerts and reminders for all your medications.

‚è∞ Control routines
Register your custom routines, not all people are the same and we all do the same daily activities. Once you register your routine, you can set up custom alerts based on it.

‚úä Motivation for taking your medicines
Our pleasant design and work interface will help motivate you to take your daily medication. Thanks to our powerful medication alert system, you can easily see if you have missed any doses.

üîí Privacy
Mediplus is free of charge and does not require registration, All information is stored on your phone and we do not collect any personal data. Privacy is very important to us.

title: AVAX Blood Pressure Diary (ad-free)
description:
Blood pressure diary app including weight tracker, blood sugar tracker, medication calendar and medication reminder.
An external blood pressure monitor is required to record values.

Approximately one quarter of the world's population is suffering from hypertension, 5% suffer from low blood pressure (hypotension). Many people do not even know that they are affected, as it usually come without symptoms. However, it is risk factor number one for cardiovascular diseases. Therefore people should check their values regularly and keep the data in a bp log.

At the end of 2018 we finally wanted to take high blood pressure management more seriously ourselves and started developing a smart blood pressure app: AVAX Blood Pressure Diary.

* CORE FEATURES
Some the reasons that make it the best free blood pressure app for android:
- Comprehensive charts help you to visualize longer periods of data.
- Statistics that follow current hypertension guidelines and that are easy to understand and give a clear picture of what your arterial pressure looks like.
- Our medication calendar let's you track your intake history and allows you to set up custom medication reminder to avoid forgetting to take your medication.
- The app can also remind you whenever it is time for you to take your blood pressure.
- A monthly status chart shows you if you are actively tracking our bp.
- Easily view your history and export it to CSV or XLSX. There is no limitation to get your data.
- New records can be entered in just a few seconds
- Weight tracker: Track weight (to see if there is a link) or manage weight loss.
- Diabetes tracker: We help you to track blood sugar and manage diabetes.
- Various customization options to make our bp app work you and not the other way round.
- No ads. They should not be part of a bp tracker.

* USAGE INFORMATION & DATA PROTECTION
Protecting your personal data is very important to us. The key points here are:
- Login via google account or via email - or use the app completely anonymously (without login)
- We do not track any information that would help someone to identify you. Only your email address is being recorded (unless you do not use a login at all, of course)
- No data is being shared with 3rd parties
- No permissions on your phone or access to personal information is required
- An active internet connection is needed to syncronize across devices

* IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Finally, one last important piece of information: Our app is designed as a companion app for information only. Measuring with your home blood pressure checker, keeping a blood pressure log in a blood pressure tracker app should be part of your therapy, but it can't replace a doctor. We can not be made liable for any issues that occur as a result of using our hypertension app, our medication diary or weight tracker. Please consult your doctor to discuss hypertension management.

We hope you enjoy our app and it helps you to keep your diary and possibly even lower blood pressure levels or achieve weight loss. If you like us, we would be very happy about your feedback and rating.

If you have suggestions for features or encounter any issues, please reach out to us at info@avax.app

Start now with AVAX Blood Pressure Diary free of charge and without ads!

title: Med Tracker ‚Äì Medication Reminder
descriptionHTML:
In this application you can register all your medication in an organized way to always know when to take them. You will receive a notification when it is time to take your medication. In addition to medicines, you can create reminders for measurements like Diabetes or Cholesterol.

At any time you can consult the application to see all the medicines and measurements scheduled for that day organized by the hour, just click on the record to mark it as completed and remove it from that day's list.

Custom Schedules
For each medication you can set different times for the same day as well as the respective dose. You have the option for reminders to be shown:
‚Ä¢ Every day;
‚Ä¢ On specific days of the week;
‚Ä¢ From X to X days;
‚Ä¢ Cycle of X active days and X inactive days;

A start date is set and optionally an end date in case it is temporary, causing notifications to stop automatically.

Stock management
You have the possibility to enter the quantity in stock that will be automatically reduced. An alert will be visible in the application when the quantity reaches the limit you set so that you do not forget to refill.
summary: Always take your medication on time, this app will remind you at the right time
recentChanges: Release
comments: Awesome app, clean and easy to use. I can set reminders for me and my parents since health is the most important thing in our life.

title: Medicine Tracker Helper Pro: Reminder, Appointment
description:
Medicine Tracker is a simple, user friendly and most reliable app that reminds you to take your medical on time.

Medicine Tracker helps you to keep track of prescriptions, reminds you when medications need to be taken and notify you when Doctors appointments are scheduled.

It is the Pro edition of Medicine Tracker. Download Only if you don't want ads and want to have password and google drive backup. 

Main Features include :

1. Medicine to be taken in home screen
2. Supports multiple patients. Can create different reminders for different patients.
3. Prescriptions: Can set reminder at different times in a day.
4. Different Schedule pattern : Repeat reminder by days, months or certain day of week.
5. Different Reminder Times for prescription 
6. Medical Log Record : Details of medicine taken : List view and Calendar view
7. Vitals Track : Keep track of your condition and can write how do you feel in a note.
8. Appointments : Doctor appointment details
9. Doctor List : Doctors contact details
10. Pharmacy List : Pharmacy contact details
11. Exportable Reports : Export details from the application into html form. 
12. Notes : Can note and save any info. Helps to tell the doctor without forgetting any thing. 
13. Widget with next pill reminder, count of todays pills reminder and appointments. 
14. Time Format 
15. Date Format
16. Reminder Profile : Slient Mode, Vibrate Mode, Sound and Vibrate Mode.
17. Password Protection
18. Backup / Restore data

Permission:
- Get Google Account : Asks to select google account with which sync has to be done.
- Internet : Backup/Restore google drive
- SD Card : Save data as html or csv

Note: 
- Before Purchase try lite version. You can upgrade to full version by clicking on provided option in Lite version or You can purchase full version separately and transfer data.
- Please do not move the application to the SD card if you want to use the widgets and reminder. (limitation of the Android operating system).
- In-App purchase or Full Version purchase is one time payment only.

title: Baby Feed Timer, Breastfeeding
description:
Designed by and for breastfeeding mothers who want to track when and for how long their baby feeds, including a useful reminder for when a feed is due. It even tells you which breast to start on! 

Breastfeeding or Bottle feeding and trying to keep track of when baby feeds on bits of scrap paper? 

Wearing a hair band on your wrist to try and remember which side to start breastfeeding baby on? 

Baby Feed Timer does it all for you! 
Tracks breastfeeds, bottle feeds, breast pumps, diapers, sleep, solid food, weight, length, notes and reminders(ideal for recording baby's temperature and medicine given). 
You can even synchronise the data across Android and iOS devices or give non mobile users access to them by logging in to babyfeedtimer.net 

Analysed data ready for you and your paediatrician shows both daily, weekly and monthly averages.

See baby's day at a glance and spot trends easily with easy to read charts.

Simple, quick and easy to use ‚Äì a must for night feeds!

All the answers to your paediatrician's questions in the palm of your hand!

HIGHLIGHTS: 
‚àö Personalise the App to your baby by adding a picture, baby‚Äôs name and date of birth. It even tells you how old your baby is in weeks. 

‚àö Use the App for more than one baby. Whether it‚Äôs a sibling later on or twins or more with full support for multiple timers!

‚àö Easy to use one button start/stop timer, especially useful during the night feeds. 

‚àö Log breastfeeds, bottle feeds, breast pumps, diapers, sleep, solid food, weight, length, notes and reminders. 

‚àö Focus on what's important to you by hiding activities that you're not interested in such as breast pumps etc. Also re-arrange their ordering to make the most important ones quick to access.

‚àö See baby's weight and length plotted against data from the World Health Organization to see what percentile your baby is in.

‚àö Ability to automatically synchronise data between Phones including iOS devices. For non mobile users let them log into your account at babyfeedtimer.net to view your most recent logs.

‚àö Pause button. Ability to pause during a feed. 

‚àö At a glance view of how long since baby last fed, next feed time and which breast to use. 

‚àö Local notification/reminder to alert you when next feed is due. 

‚àö Analysis of the data including average times between feeds and feed times for the day, week and month. 

‚àö Easy to read charts displaying analyzed data, as well as a timeline view so you can see emerging trends, such as baby feeding at the same time every day. This also helps to show days when baby is acting differently such as more dirty diapers than usual. 

‚àö View how long you have fed your baby for that day. Particularly useful for mothers who are monitoring if baby is feeding enough. 

‚àö Manually add feeds if you miss one as well as edit feeds. 

‚àö Add notes to existing logged feeds such as if baby was sick or fussy during a feed. You can also add a note to the log diary itself, for example the baby's temperature and medicine given. You can even set a reminder and alert for the note. 


FURTHER FEATURES: 
+ You can swap breasts during a single feed. 

+ Ability to specify the minimum time you would like to feed on each breast before swapping. 

+ Timer continues to run in the background on all iPhones. So you can make calls, play games, etc and the timer will continue to run. 

+ Unlimited diary of logged data. 

+ Email your data to your computer. 


If you have any feedback please send it to feedback@fehnerssoftware.co.uk

recentChanges: Logging into an old account where the trial had expired would not offer the ability to move onto the free version
comments: Super easy to use This app has fewer features than some of its rivals, but is far easier to use. It is simple and clear, doesn't require copious time spent on a questionnaire and simple clear information.

Edit: Reverted back 4 stars, with issue fixed with reboot, great customer service. Fantastic app & love we can sync multiple devices with the paid option. Would be 5 stars if it also gave the option to track & remind for post-partum medications, ie this pain relief every 4-6 hours, that one every 8 hours and the other ones daily. To be able to manually add the name of the medication & the frequency of doses would be awesome with alerts to tell you when to take them

I'm really happy with this app. It helps my baby brain to keep tracks of feeds and nappies, as well as their contents. I find all the statistics and analysis very helpful. Highly recommend it to the new parents.

Final update: I have raised the stars from 3 to 5 for the great customer support: very responsive and helpful. üôÇ *** I really liked the app, its functionality, how easy it is to use it. But after I paid the fee the adverts didn't disappear plus they pop up in the night and Maggie noise while my little one is sleeping closer to me. Dissapointing. I would be grateful if either the advert will be removed or my money back. Upd: I have sent an email to the developer. Waiting for an answer.

I have only used the free trial so far, but think I will need to purchase. Being on the special care baby unit the days blur even more than at home and I was losing track of expressing and breastfeeding once we got started. I love how easily this app records everything and I can go back and double check.
