title: Medication regimen
description:
In order to create necessary regimen of alarm message, enough to enter the following data:
        - Medicine name
        - Course duration
        - Dosage (need not be)
        - Start date of course duration 
        - Time of alarm message (before 5 times per day)
        - Activate alarm message and tape "Save".
        New regimen with the name of medicine and alarm message indicator will appear
        into the list. After click to necessary regimen into the list you can
        edit data and switch on/off alarm messages.
descriptionHTML:
In order to create necessary regimen of alarm message, enough to enter the following data:
- Medicine name
- Course duration
- Dosage (need not be)
- Start date of course duration
- Time of alarm message (before 5 times per day)
- Activate alarm message and tape "Save".
New regimen with the name of medicine and alarm message indicator will appear
into the list. After click to necessary regimen into the list you can
edit data and switch on/off alarm messages.
summary: This application reminds you that it is time to take medicine.
comments: thank you. super simple and it works!!! im a health care coordinator and after looking for an app and trying a few that are to complicated and hate it. found yours and it works for me! i will push this to my clients!!! thank you!
My supplements & medications schedules were so complicated, i couldnt remember them. This app easily allows me to make detailed adjustments. The alarms took the stress away.
This works very well to keep all my medications on-time. I would recommend this to anyone.
basic but works well, no adds or other catches.
Unfortunately the app stopped working after a few days

title: Galarm - Alarms and Reminders
description:
Galarm is a FREE social alarm clock app with innovative features that will help you stay on top of your task and todo list. Galarm features a comprehensive set of repetitions, a variety of ringtones, and the ability to set alarms and reminders for your friends and family in addition to various other features.

Why you will love Galarm:

‚Ä¢  ANYTIME, ANYWHERE: Create alarms for any date and time and use Galarm as your mobile calendar.
 
‚Ä¢  FLEXIBLE REPETITION: Set alarms to repeat hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly to efficiently manage your to do list. Create reminders for taking your medicine 3 times a day, your  yoga class every day, paying your rent on the 1st of every month and other such repeating activities.
 
‚Ä¢  PERSONAL ALARMS: Set reminders for yourself such as morning wake up alarm and medication reminder. Add participants to alarms that you normally miss. Participants can remind you of your tasks, if you miss them.
 
‚Ä¢  GROUP ALARMS: Use a group alarm as an event planner for outings, parties, or any other social activity. The alarm goes off at the same time for all the participants, and they can confirm or decline, and chat with each other to coordinate.
 
‚Ä¢  BUDDY ALARMS: Create alarms for someone else (‚Äúbuddy‚Äù) to remind them of things they need to do. Buddy is reminded of the task at the time of the alarm. You are notified to remind the buddy in case they miss the alarm. You will also be notified once the buddy marks the alarm done.

‚Ä¢  NOTIFICATIONS: All your notifications and alerts in one tab.

‚Ä¢  ALARM HISTORY: See the previous responses for repeating alarms. This allows you to see how many times you missed that gym class or that important medication.
 
‚Ä¢  ALARM CHAT: Each alarm has its own chat to keep the conversations private to that alarm.

‚Ä¢  CUSTOM RINGTONES: You can use your own music as an alarm ringtone.

‚Ä¢  RING ON VIBRATE: You can configure alarms to ring even if the phone is on vibrate.
 
‚Ä¢  BLOCK A USER: Don't want to be bothered by a not-so-special someone? Galarm allows you to block a user, so you do not receive any alarms from them.
 
‚Ä¢  ADAPTS TO YOUR TIMEZONE: Whether you are on the move or participants are in different time zones, the alarms follow time zone changes.
 
‚Ä¢  INSTANT NOTIFICATIONS: You are notified of any Galarm activity such as chat messages, new participant alarms, or group changes instantly through remote notifications.
 
‚Ä¢  FREE CLOUD STORAGE: All your alarms are stored on the cloud, so when you switch phones, your alarms appear instantly when you reinstall the app.

‚Ä¢  WORKS OFFLINE: Create and edit alarms even if you are offline. Changes are synchronized as soon as you are online!
 
‚Ä¢  SPANISH language support: Galarm soporta espa√±ol tambi√©n!
 
‚Ä¢  NO USERNAMES, NO PASSWORDS: Why burden yourself with having to remember yet another username and password? Galarm works with your phone number, much like SMS, and integrates with your phone‚Äôs address book.

Galarm also offers a premium subscription. Visit https://galarm.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360044349951 to learn more.
 
Download this innovative alarm clock app and start galarming today!
 
We welcome any feedback at: https://www.galarmapp.com/contact-us

Some of the icons are made by moonkik and Freepik from www.flaticon.com
 
Please follow us on the following social media sites:
‚Ä¢  https://www.facebook.com/GalarmApp/
‚Ä¢  https://twitter.com/GalarmApp/
‚Ä¢  https://www.instagram.com/galarmapp/

comments: This is by far the best appointment and alarm app that I have found and I have used a lot . I deleted all my others at saved this one . Try it you will agree . Nothing complicated .

You can set alarm for any date.In 'to do'apps u are able to only enlist your task and if any of them support reminder then it is not good as galarm have.Galarm ensures that u will not forget to do ur task because of loud alarm.

I have been using this app for about 3 years and I love it! I set multiple alarms throughout the day to get things done and this app has helped me a lot. I noticed a few issues with the app along the years so I reached out the developer clearly explaining the scenarios. He/she took my feedback, understood the issue, and fixed it. That to me is the ideal customer care! Things that could be improved: 1) give more options of selecting ring tones for alarms 2) the interface could look better

Very good App. Quick alarm is an innovative idea which is very useful. Have used the App for over a week, works well as planned. One of the few alarms which actually gives a ring (other Apps just message). Very useful. Your initial set up needs to be made more user friendly with correct guidelines. Very happy.

I would like to have option to register with new account and password. I don't want to use my phone number and I really don't need to integrate whole phone's address book. It should be optional, not mandatory. Why would you want me to share such a private data? :( I would love to register my other devices too. If I don't react on my phone, try tablet, and if I still don't react, try second tablet. I simply do not have so many phone numbers.

title: Simplest Reminder
description:
The goal of this application is to create a simple reminder in as few steps as possible. If you need to do something and you're worried that you may forget, simply set a reminder and the phone/tablet will notify you at the appropriate time. Simplest Reminder is the easiest to use reminder app in the whole Google Play!

Features:
- Dark Theme
- Popup Dialog
- Recurring reminders. Choose between daily, weekly, monthly, annually, weekdays(Mon-Fri), weekends(Sat-Sun), or customize the recurrence to suit the needs of your busy schedule
- Easy to use Snooze dialog with predefined time intervals
- Repeating Alarm
- LED Notifications
- Option to remove all inactive reminders at once
- Import and Export. This can be used as a backup or to transfer reminders to the Pro version or to another device
- Custom Snooze duration

To check out the Pro version go to the "More by GadgetJudge" section on this page or search the store for "Simplest Reminder Pro"

IMPORTANT: If you use any Task Manager or Battery Optimizer please add Simplest Reminder Pro to the Ignored/White/Excluded List. Otherwise Simplest Reminder may not work.
On Android 6 and up please disable battery optimization in Settings > Battery > Battery Optimization

RATINGS: If you find any issues with my app please email me instead of rating 1 star. I will do what I can to solve the issue. With your feedback I can make this the best reminder app in the whole store :)

recentChanges: Fixed bug from previous release where reminders were repeated until attended even if the settings wasn't enabled.
comments: My 11am reminder just went off at 1:30pm. When they were like 15 min off I could handle it but this isn't the first one that's been more like 90 minutes. How is it even possible? What is triggering it to go off if not the time? Unfortunate every similar app seems to have the same complaints. You guys are all doing it wrong, figure it out!

For a simple, straightforward, effective reminder app I would like to say you couldn't really get much better than this. But. Why. Oh. Why. when you open the app does it have to open on a set new reminder page? When I open a reminder app I expect to see a list of my current reminders, not this totally unneeded and unnecessary option (there's the "+" button for this!!). So instead of a solid 4+ it gets a 3, and only for the reasons above I will not be buying the Pro version.
I tried to do a recurring reminder, but it only worked the first day, and not reliably. Maybe the pro version works better

I really like this app but I really wish it also had the ability to select common reminder timers at the click of a button (e.g - 5 min, 10 min, 15 min, 30 min, 60 min etc.) instead of having to set the reminder time using clock hours and minutes. It would also be nice to have the ability to save pre-set reminder subjects like "meeting", "phone call", "medicine", etc. and then be able to select one with a button click instead of having to type out the reminder subject.
Very good app, so far. Keep the same functionality and update the UI. When the app launces take them to the list of reminders not create a new one.

title: Medscape
description:
Medscape is the leading online destination for physicians and healthcare professionals worldwide. Designed to provide a personalized experience, the Medscape app offers the latest medical news and expert commentary in your specialty as well as drug and disease information, relevant professional education, and CME/CE activities. Access what you need, when you need it ‚Äî for FREE. 

What‚Äôs New?
* Get fast, reliable clinical answers all in one place with Medscape Decision Point. Medscape Decision Point combines evidence-based treatment options with trusted expert commentary. Now supporting multiple specialties, including Allergy, Cardiology, Dermatology, Hematology/Oncology, and Neurology. 

Additional Feature
* Access 400+ medical calculators, grouped by specialty for quicker and easier use!
* Check out other useful resources including our Drug Interaction Checker, Pill Identifier, step-by-step procedural videos, and more. 
* Look up the most current prescribing and safety information on 8500+ prescription and OTC drugs, herbals, and supplements.
* Explore our tailored newsfeed; read the latest medical news and expert commentary in your specialty. 
* Stay current with the latest FDA approvals, conference news, late-breaking clinical trial data, and more.
* Earn free CME/CE credits and ABIM MOC points on-the-go, and monitor your progress with our built-in Activity Tracker.
* Access the largest network for physicians and medical students with Consult.
* Use your Medscape account to access the Medscape app. Don't have a Medscape account? You can sign up for free when you download the app‚Äîit takes only a few seconds.

Do you have feedback for the Medscape team? Email us at medscapemobile@webmd.net

comments: This app was invaluable during medical school and internship, but recently the amount of ads makes it nearly unusable. There are more ads on the page than script. Fantastic app. Provides valuable information on diseases and medical conditions. Would be very valuable to someone currently in or planning on going into the health field as well as provide useful information and tools for the average person.

Used to be a 5 star. Indispensable tool. After a few updates, especially after ads were added, the app freezes all the time. It's almost impossible to work. Please fix this as this is one the best apps for medical professionals.
This app used to be very good but in the last 2 months now I've downloaded and deleted it about 7 times. It keeps stopping itself, I can't even use it at all.

title: 2 pills: reminders, generic drugs 12+
description:
Why is this app helpful?

Your personal assistant for taking medications and vitamins
The medication schedule allows you to track when and what medicine you need to take next and to do it right on time.
The app will remind you when you need to take medications and vitamins, stick to your water routine, quit smoking, meditate and much more!

Medications and vitamin reminders
You can include a purchase reminder, and be sure, ‚Äú2 pills‚Äù will remind you when to buy a medication, which is nearly gone. You will have the opportunity to plan your purchase at a convenient time.

Search for cheaper generic drugs
Take the whole course of treatment, saving a great deal of money! Enter in the database the medicine prescribed to you and the app will find you a cheap and effective generic brand.

We are constantly working to improve this app and are ready to answer all your questions. Wishes, suggestions and questions are welcome: support@2pills.me

title: Water Drinking Reminder - Drink Water Reminder App
description:
Water drinking reminder alarm is a water drink reminder or daily water intake  Alarm app, which enables us to know the exact water intake based on our age and weight, App for water reminder to drink water as per our needs, and also helps in hydration track- the amount of water consumed and Weight loss.
 
Water Reminder App  
 Water Time Alarm?Water is the main component of the human body, By daily water intake, the real power of water comes, keeps your skin healthy, and helps in weight loss. Download water intake tracker app that reminds you to drink water or give water drink alert.

 Benefits of Drinking Water 
Make Water as your best friend, By drinking water on time one will get the innumerable benefits of drinking water: Relief from fatigue, lose weight, get glowing skin, etc...

Water Drinking reminder App
Want to know your exact water intake for a day? Looking for a water reminder app?.  Then water drinking reminder alarm is the ideal water tracker app to stay hydrated. Based on your body condition water diet tracker will remind to consume water.

In water drinking tracking app you need to select the unit of measurement which is in
	ÔÇ∑	ML and fluid ounces  for water intake,
	ÔÇ∑	kg, and lb for weight  loss

Enter your weight and age in this water tracker app or hydration reminder app to get an adequate quantity of water to intake,

The reminder to drink water can be set in two ways - Manual and Automatic.

Set the water reminder automatically based on your sleep time, wake up time and reminder interval based on this water drink reminder will determine how much water your body needs on a daily basis

You can Set the reminder manually for all the days in a week, Hydration helps to track and remind water intake for weight loss

At present day work-life drinking enough water on time  will be very challenging, this Water drinking app for Android makes easier to stay hydrated	

Key features
1. Find out the exact water intake for a day, based on your age and weight.
2. Set reminders manually and automatically to drink water.
3. Track the total water consumed at a particular time of the day.
4. Helps to become fit by drinking an adequate quantity of water.

This was a good app but I don't understand why there is no  more option to get colored icons. I only have the option on my new phone (galaxy s5) for the black and white ones. My old phone (galaxy s4) had the colored icons and I paid for them. The developer has taken functions away from this app after being purchased.

I've just upgraded to galaxy s9. I've installed this after using it on my 
s7. It does not work. So I've wasted my money.
I'd forget my pill everyday without this app. And every 5 minutes after i was supposed to take it if i didn't have this to remind me. :)
My phone won't shut up until I take my pills. Works great!

title: My KP Meds
description:
For members of Kaiser Permanente (KP) in Northern California, Colorado, Hawaii, Mid-Atlantic States (Maryland, Virginia, and Washington, D.C.), Oregon, and SW Washington. 
   
Make it easy and convenient for you and your family to take medications at the right time. 
   
My KP Meds automatically imports your list of KP medications and helps you stay on track. Create reminders that work with your schedule. And when it‚Äôs time to refill, order from your phone. It‚Äôs that simple.  
‚Ä¢	View your current KP medications 
‚Ä¢	Create medication reminders 
‚Ä¢	Set refill reminders 
‚Ä¢	Get reminders without signing in  
‚Ä¢	Order refills 
‚Ä¢	Track medication history 
‚Ä¢	View photos of your medications to avoid errors 
‚Ä¢	Explore features with the in-app guide 
You can also manage medication lists, schedules, and histories of other KP members you have caregiver access for (proxy). To set up proxy access, visit:  
 
‚Ä¢ Kp.org/actforfamily  
 
Getting started 
   
Download and launch the app using your kp.org user ID and password. Haven‚Äôt set up your account yet? Get started by tapping ‚ÄúSign-In Help‚Äù at the top of the screen and following the prompts.

comments: Half the time this app won't complete the action. Get to pick pharm location then hit submit to complete transaction and bounces back to pick pharmacy.

Cannot schedule any medication more than ONCE DAILY or the app warns will cancel the other scheduled occurrences with that medication. Only on the hour or half hour scheduling times. Very disappointing. KP staff promote use of med app, but do they use it?
This KP app is extremely helpful & I rely on it for staying updated on my meds. Other help too.

Limited. Hit & Miss Reminders work sometimes. Don't rely on this. Reminders are only on half hours. Very limiting. If you have any other "reminders" at the same time the app doesn't work. So my alarms and music cancel it. Often when it does work it's 10-20 minutes late. Great if it's your secondary but not so great if it's a primary. Remember it's set for half hours ... Yep tends to go off close to the quarter hour.

Bugs everywhere! The reminder notification never works (3 different phones now and MANY different app updates). The refill function, is iffy at best, and they keep changing it anyway. There used to be a feature that if you took your medication a little early, you could go into the schedule and mark the next event as "Taken Early". No more- they removed it in an update. The only good thing about the app is that it does reliably sync with doctor's current prescriptions and instructions for you.

title: Pill Medicine Reminder - 99 Pill
description:
Pill Manager is the app will help you to take your medicine at the right time.

If you are a caretaker for a child, parent, or patient suffering from chronic pain or illness, this app will be the friendly assistant that reminds you to take the right medicine at right time. You don't need to concern if you will forget to take the medicine anymore. 

Pill Medicine Reminder App Features:
- Easy to use app that allows easy options to add or update medicines in simple steps.
- Schedule all your medicines in one place.
- Support multiple dosages per day with multiple medications.
- Customize sound for medicine alarm.
- Option to set Medication units such as pills, cc, ml, gr, mg, Drops, pieces, units or spray.
- Customize your medicine by defining a specific color or even select photo and assign to medicine.
- Get notification alert to take your medicine on time.
- Always reminds you when to take the pill on the right time.
- Refill Reminder functionality in the app that reminds you of time to keep the stock for your medicines.

USAGES:
- Medication Reminder
- Medical Toolbox
- Med Alarm Manager 
- Pill Refill Reminder


Feel free to send us feedback for suggestion and improvements, we will reply as soon as possible.

Good luck! Keep doing Workouts! Stay healthy wealthy!

title: Meds Reminder
description:
Remember when to take your medications and those of your family or your pets easily and directly. Forget about filling complex forms, or entering more information than necessary ... Just fill in what is taken, how much, when and for whom.

It is notified with an alarm notification, which the user disables or eliminates when deemed appropriate.

Useful to consult dosage and frequency of each medication once the treatment is finished.

All features are free, although the possibility of making donations to the author is included.

title: AiMed - Medication and Refill Reminder
description:
A simple, no fuss medication reminder application.

‚Ä¢	Simple and friendly user interface to add medicine
‚Ä¢	Able to add medicine photo by taking picture of the medicine
‚Ä¢	A build in OCP function for The Pill reminder
‚Ä¢	User can be assisted by Health Professional via Web access


Simple and friendly user interface to add medicine
‚Ä¢	Quick and simple. Only five required fields to easily add a new medicine alert. You may enter a medicine name that make sense to you. For example, enter pain killer or headache pill instead of the full medicine name that you've never heard of; e.g. paracetamol. You can also add a medicine photo, the medicine form (tablet, capsule, gel tab etc.) and an instruction to remind yourself something that you need to do when taking a certain medicine. For example, take with warm water, do not crush, or do not lie down within 30min after taking a certain medicine.

Able to add medicine photo by taking picture of the medicine
‚Ä¢	You are able to take your own medicine photos using your phone. Take and show your medicine photo the way you like it ‚Äì after, all this is your medication reminder. So make it easy for yourself to help you ensure that you are taking the right medicine.

A build in OCP function for The Pill reminder
‚Ä¢	A build in Oral Contraceptive Pill (OCP) function which allow user to easily set up the pill reminder with various OCP patterns.

User can be assisted by Health Professional via Web access
‚Ä¢	Your doctor and pharmacist can help manage your medicine list and add new medicines for you via Web portal access. An alert will be sent to you on the AiMed app that your medicine list has been updated. With AiMed you know that you are not alone and that someone is always caring for you, keeping an eye out on your well beings.

title: Cardium - medication reminder and counselling
description:
Cardium is a medication management and drug counseling app that help drug consumers to have the best treatment outcome in drug therapy.

It is a medical reference text for non medical professionals designed to integrate care between patient and healthcare providers.

It empowers the users with tailored health information to enable them to make an informed health decision, has a better dialogue with healthcare providers, improves their health literacy and overall well being.



‚úÖ App Permission / Privacy Information

Accessibility - Cardium uses accessibility service to ensure that the app services is always running to ensure prompt popup of medication and activity reminders and to collect your relevant medication data for secure storage. 

Battery optimization: Cardium may ask you to disable battery optimization to ensure that is not affected by your battery level and that your reminders come up even when your running low on battery.

Launcher -  Cardium may ask you to enable it's launcher from the settings when you miss a med. The launcher will help Cardium stay active so you receive your medication alarms at the intended time.

title: WebMD: Check Symptoms, Rx Savings, & Find Doctors
description:
** Coronavirus / COVID-19 Outbreak: Tap the card on our home screen for the latest updates on the 2020 coronavirus outbreak. **

From WebMD, the one healthcare app you need to check symptoms; learn about conditions and drugs; research treatments and diagnoses; find doctors and specialists in your area; get Rx discounts available at your local pharmacy; and set medication reminders. 

Key Features: 

‚Ä¢ Symptom Checker ‚Äì Choose your symptoms, learn about potential conditions or issues, and lookup treatment and care options.
‚Ä¢ Doctor Directory ‚Äì Find the closest doctors and specialists based on your current location or search by city, state or zip. 
‚Ä¢ WebMD Rx ‚Äì We partner with major pharmacy chains to find the lowest prescription drug prices, which often beat insurance co-pays. It‚Äôs 100% free to use. No registration required.
‚Ä¢ Medication Reminders ‚Äì Never miss a dose. You‚Äôll receive reminders when it‚Äôs time to take your medications. View daily prescription schedules and instructions, plus pill images with dosage and timing information for each drug. 
‚Ä¢ Conditions ‚Äì Find medically-reviewed information about conditions relevant to you and learn more about causes, treatments, and related symptoms. 
‚Ä¢ Customization and Saving Functionality ‚Äì Save your conditions, drugs, doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and healthy living articles for secure, easy access and reference. 
‚Ä¢ Drug Interaction Checker ‚Äì Find and identify potentially harmful and unsafe combinations of prescription medications by entering two or more drugs in question.

ABOUT WebMD
WebMD Health Corp. (Nasdaq: WBMD) is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.

If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with certain rights regarding our use of your personal information. For more information relevant to our users who are California residents, please review the "California Residents" section of our Privacy Policy linked on this download page or within our app.

The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.
SOURCE WebMD Health Corp.

WebMD. Better Information. Better Health.
WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the WebMD mobile application.

recentChanges:
Introducing Profile.
All your saved health information is now stored in your profile.
- Save your doctors‚Äô contact information so it‚Äôs always on hand.

comments: I have found that searching for certain terms, such as "dementia", will get no hits inside the app but will get plenty of hits on the WebMD website. I would say that about one-third of the time when I search for a condition or anasic keyword that obviously should get results, I get no results at all. So it would appear that the app does not have access to all of the content found on the Web MD website. To me, this means there is really no point in using the app.

A great resource for all things health and medical-related. I use the symptom checker feature the most, but the app also features articles on health conditions, information on different medications, and COVID articles. Definitely a great resource, and completely free!
This is such an app for info on medical anything. Including identifying pills that you find in your cabinet and can't remember or know what it is.

I've had and trusted the app for years, but about 2 months ago it suddenly started regularly spamming me with notifications with Corona news... Mostly scary and negative stories about people being reinfected, death and about immunization trials being cancelled by johnson and johnson due to safety concerns etc.... WHY ARE YOU SPAMMING ME WITH MORE FEAR MONGERING DON'T WE HAVE ENOUGH FEAR IN OUR LIVES!?!? I'm so furious. Sit on my phone and keep quiet until I need you. Notifications disabled
The drug interaction checker not working properly. Says it found 2 interactions but only describes 1.Shows it found 3 interactions but only describes 2...and so on.

title: GoodRx: Prescription Drugs Discounts & Coupons App
description:
Compare prices on prescription drug prices and save up to 80% on your medications!

Prescription prices vary wildly from pharmacy to pharmacy. Prescription discounts are hard to find as there's never been a larger source to compare drug prices - until now.

Get your prescription from your doctor then use GoodRx to search for a pharmacy, and show your free coupon to the pharmacist when you drop off your prescription to save!

GoodRx, the #1 Rx discount app, makes comparing prescription drug prices easy. Find the lowest price on prescription drugs and prescription refills by finding current cash and sale prices, coupons and valuable savings tips for thousands of prescriptions at pharmacies near you.

The GoodRx price comparison app tells you which pharmacies have drugs for less than $4 per fill, and some where certain prescriptions for free!

Prescription coupons from GoodRx can be used from within the app ‚Äì simply hand your phone to the pharmacist to save up to 80%! View coupons with no need to print out anything and find savings on the go!

GoodRx is 100% free to use - there are no fees or obligations to you. Get health savings for every member of your family, including pets.

GoodRx has been featured by The New York Times, PBS, ABC News, Forbes, CNN, The LA Times and more.

RX discounts from GoodRx are used by hundreds of doctors and clinics to help save patients money on their medications.

GoodRx Features:

Online Pharmacy Finder
- Find pharmacies near you with your prescription medicine.
- Local pharmacies include Kroger Pharmacy, Costco, Walgreens, Rite Aid, CVS and more.
- Found a pharmacy with the lowest prices for your prescriptions? Save it as your best pharmacy.

Health Savings
- Compare prices to get the best deal.
- Free coupons for your prescription.
- Prescription coupons help you save up to 80%.
- Mobile coupons - just show the pharmacist your phone and save!

Prescription Reminder & Alerts
- Create your own prescription list to manage your medications
- Track prescription prices and receive savings alerts
- Set prescription reminders so you‚Äôll never miss a refill

Pill Identifier Feature
- Identify pills or capsules by color, shape or imprint

Start saving on your prescriptions with GoodRx!

By downloading GoodRx, you agree to be bound by our Terms Of Use. Read more at http://www.goodrx.com/terms-of-use

*GoodRx works to make its apps accessible to all, including those with disabilities. If you are having difficulty accessing this application, please call or email us at (855) 268-2822 or ada@goodrx.com so that we can provide you with the services you require through alternative means.*

Advertising Notice:
https://support.goodrx.com/hc/en-us/articles/360026530331-Advertising-on-GoodRx

Notice of Collection:
https://support.goodrx.com/hc/en-us/articles/360037920971-California-Consumer-Privacy-Act-Privacy-Notice

GoodRx has been featured by The New York Times, PBS, ABC News, Forbes, CNN, The LA Times and more.

RX discounts from GoodRx are used by hundreds of doctors and clinics to help save patients money on their medications.

GoodRx Features:

Online Pharmacy Finder
- Find pharmacies near you with your prescription medicine.
- Local pharmacies include Kroger Pharmacy, Costco, Walgreens, Rite Aid, CVS and more.
- Found a pharmacy with the lowest prices for your prescriptions? Save it as your best pharmacy.

Health Savings
- Compare prices to get the best deal.
- Free coupons for your prescription.
- Prescription coupons help you save up to 80%.
- Mobile coupons - just show the pharmacist your phone and save!

Prescription Reminder & Alerts
- Create your own prescription list to manage your medications
- Track prescription prices and receive savings alerts
- Set prescription reminders so you‚Äôll never miss a refill

Pill Identifier Feature
- Identify pills or capsules by color, shape or imprint

Start saving on your prescriptions with GoodRx!

By downloading GoodRx, you agree to be bound by our Terms Of Use. Read more at http://www.goodrx.com/terms-of-use

*GoodRx works to make its apps accessible to all, including those with disabilities. If you are having difficulty accessing this application, please call or email us at (855) 268-2822 or ada@goodrx.com so that we can provide you with the services you require through alternative means.*

comments: sweet and prices are spot on. so may options to assist users. I have saved a lot of $$$ using this app. I paid 35.00 to join a grocery chain store and saved a little. It paid for itself. This FREE site has saved me a whole lot more without any cost to join. Not one issue using this app. I especially like the listing of Pharmacies in the order of cheapest to most expensive. Sweet app, it continues to get better and prices on drugs lower. I just can't figure how they can do this at no cost to us..

Good Rx has saved me so much money this year. I love it. The one difficulty I have is a couple of my mess are different quantity as what is offer. Also can't figure out how to add my membership number that I have got the premium service. Other then that its Great.

This app will truly save money üí∞ if you don't have insurance. And in lots of cases with generic products, it will save you money even with insurance. I see it everyday since I work in a pharmacy that accepts GoodRx. Best advice, don't use the free cards from Dr offices. Download the app and look up each rx. You'll get the best price if you search for them separately. Write down the coupon codes (4 separate numbers) for each one before going to the pharmacy to pick up.

Absolutely essential app for anyone that takes medication. There's nothing inherently amazing about the app itself, it functions just fine. But I'm not exaggerating when I say that I would likely not be alive today without the insane discounts I get from GoodRX. Not much of an app reviewer, but figured I'd drop a 5 star just as a thank you.

I use this for most prescriptions now and for the last couple years. Never had an issue. Most beneficial savings have been from paying $150 for my dog monthy for one of her prescriptions (did that for a year before finding goodrx in 2018), now down to about $65-$70 monthly! Love this app! It has saved me at least several thousand dollars over 2 years. This is lifesaver for most people. Most people aren't rich and this has helped us continue our own medical care along with the precious furbabies!

title: Water Reminder - Daily Tracker
description:
Water is essential to our life, drinking enough and right quantity of water is vital for our health. Water Reminder by VGFIT will help you to calculate, how much water your body needs, will track your hydration and gently remind you to drink water to fulfill your goal.

* Improve your health with personal drink notification.
* Create custom drink volumes easily.
* Schedule notifications according to the time you wake up and sleep.
* Choose the interval between notifications.
* Track your historical consumption during the day, week and month.
* It is Good for weight Loss and it is the base of every healthy diet.
* Supports Imperial ( fl. oz. ) and Metric ( ml. ) units.
* Drinking enough water, will improve your health.

Water Reminder uses HealthKit in order to record drinking data to Nutrition section in Health application.

comments: Well its been a little over 36 hours and I don't enjoy this app. The first 16 hours it was great! Reminded me to drink every 2 hours. I've been awake since 07:00, and not once have I been reminded to drink. So I'm deleting this and will find a hopefully better app to remind me. I lead a super busy life and the reminders are so welcomed and I was beyond excited at first that this app delivered said reminders. Sad it didn't work out.

Really good app it reminds me to drink as I tend not to drink a lot during the day ,its made me realised that yes I do need to ,dry skin headaches and also you can get water infection by not drinking enough , so I use the alarm on here ,which you can set yourself as to when you need to drink fluid. So yes good app

So downloaded the app to track what I drink and different sorts. However after 1 day I've noticed that the main page doesn't tally the quantity properly. Ive been drinking in rounded amounts 250 or 500ml but its telling me I have drank 2253ml out of 2500ml, however I've actually drank 3000ml (4x250ml and 4x500ml). Yet the graph is correct. Think this needs to be addressed. However i do like that i can log different drinks
Brilliant app, I always put this one on my phone, it's surprising how much better you feel when taking in the correct amount of water.üòÅ

This app is just what I needed. Due to medical issues, sometimes I don't feel thirsty even when I'm having other symptoms of dehydration, but this app will help me to drink enough fluids throughout the day.

title: Health Log
description:
Health Log makes it quick and easy to track your health related information. Health Log provides an extremely flexible logging system making it easy to keep track of any health related information such as headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks, seizures, specific mental states and any other custom records. With each record you can record the severity of the event as well as the kind of pains, locations of the pain, potential triggers, any medications taken and if they provided relief.

‚Ä¢ Fast, simple and straightforward way to log and track and health event
‚Ä¢ Keeping logs of your health can help find the causes, most effective treatment and give a better general understanding of your health
‚Ä¢ Extremely customize-able with the ability to track any information you want such as any type of pain/symptom any location where the pain is, any potential triggers, and medication and the quantity taken
‚Ä¢ Health records can be shown to doctors to give them solid information to help diagnose any potential issues
‚Ä¢ Track the severity of headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks, seizures and any other custom information
‚Ä¢ Track when headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks and any other custom event happens and for how long
‚Ä¢ Track the type of pain associated with a health event such as migraine, throbbing, dull, sharp nausea and many more. Custom pains can be added as well
‚Ä¢ Track the locations of a health event such as temples, sinus, forehead and many more. Custom locations can be added as well
‚Ä¢ Track the potential triggers of health events such as stress, lack of sleep, loud noises, sunlight and many more. Custom triggers can be added as well
‚Ä¢ Track the medications and the quantities taken for such as ibuprofen (Advil), acetaminophen (Tylenol), antihistamines and any other custom medication
‚Ä¢ Track the relief experienced by medications or treatments
‚Ä¢ Update records quickly and easily to adjust for changes in your health event
‚Ä¢ View a variety of statistics about your records such as how many headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks or seizures have been recorded, how many days since your last health event, average severity, average duration, most common pains, locations and medications
‚Ä¢ View statistics related to any specific recorded association, such as how many headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, allergies, panic attacks or seizures are associated with a pressing pain, or stress as a trigger
‚Ä¢ View your events in a calendar view. Quickly and easily update, delete or add new events from the calendar view. The calendar view can be useful in finding patterns in health events
‚Ä¢ View your events on a graph by year, month week or all health events at once. The graph view can be useful in finding patterns in health events

Upgrade
‚Ä¢ Upgrade Health Log to enable exporting your records as a spreadsheet that can be viewed with any spreadsheet reading program such as Google Sheets and Microsoft Excel
‚Ä¢ Upgrading enables the option to export your logs as a database backup that can be used to restore your records on a new device when switching phones or on the same phone. Includes Dropbox automatic syncing to easily switch between devices as well as make manual backups to Dropbox
‚Ä¢ Upgrading removes ads

Customization
‚Ä¢ Choose to have times displayed in AM/PM or 24 hour format
‚Ä¢ Select which day of the week to be the first day of the week
‚Ä¢ Select which statistics you wish to view on the home screen

Health Log can be an effective health log, health tracker, fitness trackers, health diary, headache tracker, headache diary, useful for headache tracking, head ache prevention and stopping head aches

comments: So far this is excellent. I was recently diagnosed with depression and need to keep track of my symptoms as well as effects of medications. Most of the other apps have a pre-set list of symptoms, and user is limited to those symptoms. This app allows you to create your own labels for symptoms, so you can be very specific with tracking your health issues. Also, the app creates a nice graph for visual representation of your symptoms. This app is exactly what i needed.
I was searching for a log which seemed to be quite difficult until I found health log. You can add symptoms to the list, and pain levels. Just what I wanted.

HELP option needed. It does everything I need so far. Had to read 100+ reviews to find developer comments to learn how to use, how to edit, etc. A "how to/help" in the dropdown menu is missing. Also, haven't yet figured out tracking >1 person. I got this to track my kid but would like to add myself. Overall it works well so far. Also, I haven't upgraded. Access to the full version (3day trial) would probably yield more upgrades. If full is just ad removal I'm ok with ads
Good pain track and has a calendar view. Handy for a cancer patient like me. I haven't upgraded so far but i'll see in a few days when i need to backup.
Really useful to track so I can keep my doctors up to date. However this morning when I went to sort categories it crashes everytime! EDIT: All fixed! Rating edited to 5 stars.

title: FluffyRx - Pet Medications
description:
Save on your pet prescription drug costs!

Did you know that about 60% of the medications prescribed by veterinarians are the same drugs used in human medicine and can be filled right at your local pharmacy?

FluffyRx lets you search for the lowest prices for your pets medication in your area with our Rx Drug Price Search tool. It‚Äôs very easy to compare drug prices for the best discounts. Our search tool shows you which pharmacies have your pets medications for the lowest prices and is accepted at pharmacies nationwide including your local mom and pop pharmacy and regional chains.
 
**How does the Free Fluffy Rx Card work?**

Simply load the Digital Rx card on your mobile device and present it to the pharmacist when purchasing your pets medications. The card is pre-activated and can be used right away. There are no fees, forms or obligations. Save on your prescriptions today.

To get the discount, all you need to do is ask the Veterinarian for a written prescription and take it to the pharmacy along with the FluffyRx app. It is important to ask the Veterinarian for the written prescription (before you check out) while you are in the consultation room with your pet. This will let them know that you prefer a written prescription so you can fill at your local pharmacy.

Save today on your Vet‚Äôs medications with the Free FluffyRx app and don‚Äôt forget to share these huge savings with all your friends and family.

title: My medication. Remind about taking medication.
description:
My drugs, an application created to remind you of taking drugs. Now you will not forget about taking pills.
Just set a prescription reminder and you will know when it is time to take pills and medicines.
Remember, the prescription is prescribed by the doctor, and you must follow the advice of the doctor. The application will only remind you of taking medication.
Also, if you are going on a trip, the application will remind you how much medicine you need for the specified trip time.

If your medication is running low, the app will remind you about the purchase of the ending medication.

We have created an application for convenience and your reminder about taking medications. If you have any recommendations or suggestions, please contact us.

title: iMEDTracker for Pills & Meds
description:
The iMEDtracker pill reminder mobile application is more than just a pill organizer or medication reminder. It is a meticulously designed prescription tracking system that will help you manage your medicine schedule throughout the day. If you have a chronic illness or suffer from conditions like high blood pressure and diabetes, which require multiple medicines, this is a MUST HAVE pill tracker! The best part is, it‚Äôs FREE!

It is equipped with useful features that you can use to enhance quality of life. It is the best pill reminder app to have on your phone to benefit you and other family members as well! 
Features:

‚Ä¢	Trustworthy pill reminder alarm system 
‚Ä¢	Extremely handy scroll system that can easily be managed single handedly
‚Ä¢	Attractive visual aids 
‚Ä¢	Friendly reminders
‚Ä¢	User friendly
‚Ä¢	Quick and easy to use
‚Ä¢	Integrated pharmacy system
‚Ä¢	In-app calendar to record important dates and reminders for re-fills and follow-ups 
‚Ä¢	Simple to create customized medication list
‚Ä¢	Language preferences
‚Ä¢	Provides engaging health tips and information for a healthier and happier lifestyle 
‚Ä¢	Multiple profiles can be made and maintained 
‚Ä¢	Doctor-patient correspondence becomes easier when doctor downloads the app
‚Ä¢	Blood pressure monitor 
‚Ä¢	Blood pressure chart
‚Ä¢	Heart rate tracker 

Why is it important to have a prescription tracker or medicine reminder app?

Studies suggest that the growing number of pill reminder apps indicates their potential use as effective tools to fight the global problem of non-compliance to medicines. 20% to 80% of patients make mistakes in taking medication, while up to 60% of patients stop taking medications before the instructed time.

A quarter of hospital and nursing home admissions are due to lack of adherence and result in a staggering 125,000 deaths per year!

Chronic illnesses often require consumption of life-long medicines that need to be taken on time and managed efficiently so even a single dose isn‚Äôt missed. A pill timer and daily pill organizer is just as important as keeping your vital signs in check. Your blood pressure and heart rate/pulse should be checked regularly as well, as they can easily go off the charts due to stress. That‚Äôs why this prescription tracking app has thought of everything!
Now instead of investing in a separate pulse rate monitor or flooding you phone with different apps, iMEDtracker provides you with a heart rate tracker and blood pressure tracker in a single app! 

The in-built heart rate monitor and blood pressure monitor are handy tools to quickly check your pulse and BP whenever you feel out of sorts. That‚Äôs not all, the results can be recorded right there and then in a blood pressure tracking chart! How convenient is that! You can show your blood pressure log the next time you visit your doctor. iMEDtracker is a medication list, pill reminder, a free blood pressure app and pulse monitor-all in one!  

iMEDTRACKER can be used by caregivers and patients alike. It is a comprehensive mobile application that functions beyond your average pill reminder system. It connects you with an integrated pharmacy system while keeping your doctor in the loop as well! If you are unable to pick up your medicines yourself, have them delivered to you! 

It is a one of a kind product and service launched by iMEDHEALTH that makes the best use of technology to bring about a revolution in healthcare. iMEDHEALTH believes that healthcare is a basic right that should be easily accessible by all-anytime, anywhere! For more details about our products and services, please visit www.imedhealth.us

title: Epsy - seizure, aura, medication epilepsy tracking
description:
Seizure tracking has never been easier. Think of Epsy as your daily companion to help you track the things that matter. This includes staying on top of your medication routine, as well as logging other factors that can affect your condition.

Over time, Epsy gives you a much clearer view of your epilepsy and what triggers it, making it easier to spot patterns and trends. This helps you understand your condition, leading to better conversations with your doctor to develop more informed treatment decisions, and live better with epilepsy.

Features included in the app:

TRACK SEIZURES, SIDE EFFECTS, AURAS AND MORE

Every time you have a seizure or other relevant experience, just open up Epsy and log the event to see it on your timeline. Doing this regularly helps you track your personal experience with epilepsy.

FOLLOW MEDICATIONS AND GET REMINDERS

Get a medication reminder when your next dose is due. Use the app to set-up your medication plan, get useful nudges to help you remember and keep track of your medications as well as how they make you feel.

Use Epsy to manage your medications and track your seizures. Get to know your triggers, learn more about how your mood, sleep, diet, and other factors, can affect your condition. Show up for every appointment with all the useful information you need right inside the app.

Live better with Epilepsy by using Epsy.

Epsy is currently available only in the USA.

I'm going to visit a doctor soon for this condition, but I wanted to have a log ready using this app. Apparently, it's not easy.

This app is really. It has great prompts and layout for a seizure log. I like the insights page to give you an idea as to why you are having seizures. I highly recommend for anyone having seizures. My only wish for the app would a list view of your seizures to make it easier to show your doctor.
The only thing that dont like about the profile set up is the DOB. Cant it be set to just simply type the date of birth instead of having to scroll the way.

It's nice to have something to track when the seizures happened, as most calendars are only concerned with future events.

title: Event Reminder
description:
"Event Reminder" is a simple generic todo reminder app with a calendar where you can easily create reminder / alarm / todo of events planned by touching few buttons. It supports voice so you don't need to write event title. You can create "one time event" or "repeating events". While choosing repeating events, you can set frequency to repeat, for example, "every 2 days until 6 weeks" or "every weekends until 2 months" etc.

At home page you see a list of next set of due events with its priorities on the left to identify importance clearly. You swipe back to see expired and finished events. You swipe ahead to see next set of upcoming events. You can open calendar to see all your events for that month, depicted as status/priority color codes boxes. You can see events statistics with bar and pie graphs to monitor your progress effectively. You add event just by touching that day on calendar view or see list of events scheduled for that day.

You can control notification popups for reminder / alarm / todo based on event's priority. You can also enable / disable vibration and sound notifications as per your preference. You can finish or delete events individually or all at once in case of repeating events. You have even option to delete or finish single event in a series of repeating events.

Features : 
‚Ä¢ You can Add, View, Edit and Delete event / reminder / todo
‚Ä¢ You can set event / alarm priority - High, Medium or Low on a easy slider
‚Ä¢ You can set alarm tone and duration in settings / preferences
‚Ä¢ You can set notification - Popups, Alarm or Vibrate
‚Ä¢ You can add notes to your event / reminder / todo
‚Ä¢ You can set event category from the default list of categories or create your own category
‚Ä¢ You can set repeating events by hourly, daily, weekly, monthly or yearly with frequency to repeat
‚Ä¢ You can set days to repeat, for example - weekdays, weekends or selective days in a week
‚Ä¢ You can even export your events as a file in your SD card to import later or share with anyone else
‚Ä¢ A number of date formats to choose, as per your preference
‚Ä¢ You can select time format AM/PM (12hr) or 24hr
‚Ä¢ You can see your events and events summary, in a interactive calendar view, and add event directly from there
‚Ä¢ All your Events in 5 type of event lists - 
        - Finished
        - Expired 
        - Today
        - Tomorrow 
        - Upcoming 
‚Ä¢ You can sort event lists for easy navigation
        - Subject 
        - Date 
        - Priority
        - Category
descriptionHTML:
"Event Reminder" is a simple generic todo reminder app with a calendar where you can easily create reminder / alarm / todo of events planned by touching few buttons. It supports voice so you don't need to write event title. You can create "one time event" or "repeating events". While choosing repeating events, you can set frequency to repeat, for example, "every 2 days until 6 weeks" or "every weekends until 2 months" etc.

At home page you see a list of next set of due events with its priorities on the left to identify importance clearly. You swipe back to see expired and finished events. You swipe ahead to see next set of upcoming events. You can open calendar to see all your events for that month, depicted as status/priority color codes boxes. You can see events statistics with bar and pie graphs to monitor your progress effectively. You add event just by touching that day on calendar view or see list of events scheduled for that day.

You can control notification popups for reminder / alarm / todo based on event's priority. You can also enable / disable vibration and sound notifications as per your preference. You can finish or delete events individually or all at once in case of repeating events. You have even option to delete or finish single event in a series of repeating events.

Features :
‚Ä¢ You can Add, View, Edit and Delete event / reminder / todo
‚Ä¢ You can set event / alarm priority - High, Medium or Low on a easy slider
‚Ä¢ You can set alarm tone and duration in settings / preferences
‚Ä¢ You can set notification - Popups, Alarm or Vibrate
‚Ä¢ You can add notes to your event / reminder / todo
‚Ä¢ You can set event category from the default list of categories or create your own category
‚Ä¢ You can set repeating events by hourly, daily, weekly, monthly or yearly with frequency to repeat
‚Ä¢ You can set days to repeat, for example - weekdays, weekends or selective days in a week
‚Ä¢ You can even export your events as a file in your SD card to import later or share with anyone else
‚Ä¢ A number of date formats to choose, as per your preference
‚Ä¢ You can select time format AM/PM (12hr) or 24hr
‚Ä¢ You can see your events and events summary, in a interactive calendar view, and add event directly from there
‚Ä¢ All your Events in 5 type of event lists -
- Finished
- Expired
- Today
- Tomorrow
- Upcoming
‚Ä¢ You can sort event lists for easy navigation
- Subject
- Date
- Priority
- Category
summary: Manage your Event full life with ease and fun !!!

title: Meal Reminder - Weight Loss
description:
Eat healthy, eat regularly, eat 5 meals a day. Run metabolism and lose weight.

Meal Reminder is a simple application helping you to keep eating regularly.

Remember that eating 5 meals a day (with around 3 hours intervals) has many advantages:
‚Ä¢ Accelerates your body fat burning, which causes weight loss or helps to maintain your weight
‚Ä¢ Helps you to control the quantity of every meal and prevents overeating
‚Ä¢ Regular breaks between meals protect from sudden decrease of the glucose level in your blood and ensure satiety

Meal Reminder - Weight Loss application helps you to follow this easy diet plan by following features:
‚Ä¢ Custom meal times to suit your needs
‚Ä¢ Alarms to notify you about meal time
‚Ä¢ Status of current day to see either meals were eaten or skipped
‚Ä¢ Possibility of adding 6th, optional meal, if you get up early and finish your day late at night
‚Ä¢ Editing past meals - just swipe the meal item on the list and use edit buttons (if you want to change the past meal status, click on the meal item)

Any comments are welcome. Please notify me if there are any functions that you want to be included in future versions of Meal Reminder - Weight Loss.

Thank you for download!

comments: Cool concept but it doesn't let you schedule times. The programing not allowing for times to be set properly. Freezes and crashes. everytime I opened the scheduler it would choose random time of the day on its own around 1 am.

The 'skip meal button' is right underneath the 'ok' button with no way to change the meals marked as skipped. The app comes up over EVERYTHING so on a work call it will pop up over it and blare the alarm. It has absolute priority which is awful. I liked the concept but there's a few things they need to change with this app.

This is app is great if all you want is a reminder to eat and at what time. Only thing that would be good to change is that if you accidently hit skip meal instead of eat meal. That you could change it back. Otherwise it's good.

It gets the job done, I just feel like there's too many notifications outside of that you can make your own sound if you like but if it was just a quick let's eat or skip the meal option 5 but it's like two more notifications after the meal reminder I kind of think it's unnecessary each time

I love this app for the theoritical explanation of meal importance, for cute design and for notifications! But that's really inconvenient, when I accidentally tap meal or set the other time of meal after I set it eaten, so it became missed. But in general app is nice!

title: Pills on the Go
description:
A pill reminder for people on the go. Take your pills on time, on the go.
This medication reminder focuses on reminding you to take your pills on time.
Get an alarm each time it is medication time. Alarms repeat if you miss it.

This is the paid version of the free app that won Best App Award by bestappsmarket.com!

Very easy setup, no profiles, doctors/contact information or any other unneeded information.‚Ä®Just enter plans (it will prompt your for medication details) and you are ready to go.

Main benefits:‚Ä®‚ú™ You get alarms when it's time for your medication.
‚ú™ Reminder history shows your last actions.‚Ä®‚ú™ Snooze and auto repeat in case you miss a notification.
‚ú™ Take your planned medication now or choose to skip.
‚ú™ You get a visual cue when you need to get more medication. Never run out again.
‚ú™ Medication amounts don't have to be whole pills, 0.5 works as well.
‚ú™ Adjust your dose when you take your medication.‚Ä®‚ú™ Home screen widgets to keep you up to date. 
‚ú™ Tap less setting automatically opens your notification when possible.
‚ú™ Tap less setting automatically opens your next notification.‚Ä®‚ú™ Suspend and enable plans easily for temporary schedules.
‚ú™ This app also support the Dutch language. (Select Dutch as language in your phone settings.)

Your privacy:‚Ä®We respect your privacy and will not ask for your personal information. This also means that this app is ad free!‚Ä®No information about you or your medicine use is recorded or distributed.‚Ä®This app only stores your medication plans on *your* phone.

Questions?‚Ä®Read the FAQ on the site or ask me question directly (also on my site).
‚Ä®This app asks for the following permission:
‚ú™ VIBRATE; Allow the phone to vibrate
‚ú™ RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED; Schedule alerts when booting the phone
‚ú™ GET_TASKS; Auto open notification dialogs if no other app is visible
‚ú™ READ_CONTACTS; For easy refill of your medication

comments: Update August 2017: Doesn't work on Google Pixel. I'm very disappointed. And I couldn't move my data from a Samsung to the pixel.  (On Samsung Galaxy S5) This app does what it says and gives you reliable reminders. It would be much better if I could email/export a history or sync with a website version.

I can't edit the Rx, nor use any button on that page.

It took me a sec to figure out that it does log the time the med was actually taken and it also took me a sec to figure out you can go back and put in the time for missed doses on the app. Weren't around the phone when the alarm went off but you know you took your meds. Very nice app well worth getting the pro version. The widget is a big plus. Really, really nice. This is the best I've seen so far. This app will definitely make sure you take your meds.

title: Medication Log Free (Medicine)
description:
You can control your medication you are taking with Medicine Log!
Make a list of your medication, take log and it reminds you the time you take the medication by setting alarm.
It is so convenient that you can manage the log with the calendar. 
Add marks ‚óØ, ‚òì or ‚ñ≥ on the name of medicine. By doing so, you can see at one view if you did take your
medication or not. 
You can also take a note (memo) missed dose or something that you are worried about and save it as a journal.

ÔºäÔºäUser GuideÔºäÔºä

Initial Screen is the calendar.


1. Setting: You can customize the calendar.
2. Mark: You can add marks on the date of the calendar.
ÔºäYou can delete marks by selecting the same mark and then tap twice. 
3. Alarm: Set vibration duration, volume and alarm sound.
4. Password: Set password.


ÔºäFrom the left buttonÔºä
1. "Today" button: Go back to the today's date.
2. "Left" and "Right" button: Move the date right and left.
3. "Registration" button: Make a list of your medication. Press "New" then move to the registration screen.
4. "List" button: You can see the list of your medication log.


1. Press "Registration" button on the calendar screen ‚Üí Press "New" ‚Üí Move to the registration screen.
2. Enter the name of the medicine, duration of your medication, when you take it and set the alarm. ‚Üí Press "Save".
3. When you save it, you can confirm that your medicined is added on the list.


1. After you saved the medication on the registration screen, go back to the calendar.
2. You can confirm the name of the medicine and when you take them on the lower part of the calendar.
3. After you take the medication, tap the name of the medicine.
4. Move to the "Did you take your medication?" screen.
5. Select "morning", "noon" or "night" from the drop-down list and then tap one of the buttons ‚óØ, ‚òì, and ‚ñ≥. ‚Üí
Press "Save".
6. ‚óØ = you took the medication, ‚òì = you forgot to take and ‚ñ≥ = you took it late.
7. You can take a note (memo).

Support Android Wear Vibration

‚ÄªPay ver No ads

title: Medicine Tracker and Reminder: Log, Prescriptions
description:
Medicine Tracker is a simple, user friendly and most reliable app that reminds you to take your medical on time.

Medicine Tracker helps you to keep track of prescriptions, reminds you when medications need to be taken and notify you when Doctors appointments are scheduled.

It has Pro edition also. Download Pro Only if you don't want ads and want to have password and google drive backup. 

Main Features include :

1. Medicine to be taken in home screen
2. Supports multiple patients. Can create different reminders for different patients.
3. Prescriptions: Can set reminder at different times in a day.
4. Different Schedule pattern : Repeat reminder by days, months or certain day of week.
5. Different Reminder Times for prescription 
6. Medical Log Record : Details of medicine taken : List view and Calendar view
7. Vitals Track : Keep track of your condition and can write how do you feel in a note.
8. Appointments : Doctor appointment details
9. Doctor List : Doctors contact details
10. Pharmacy List : Pharmacy contact details
11. Exportable Reports : Export details from the application into html form. 
12. Notes : Can note and save any info. Helps to tell the doctor without forgetting any thing. 
13. Widget with next pill reminder, count of todays pills reminder and appointments. 
14. Time Format 
15. Date Format
16. Reminder Profile : Slient Mode, Vibrate Mode, Sound and Vibrate Mode.
17. Password Protection
18. Backup / Restore data


Permission:
- Get Google Account : Asks to select google account with which sync has to be done.
- Internet : Backup/Restore google drive
- SD Card : Save data as html or csv

Note: 
- Before Purchase try lite version. You can upgrade to full version by clicking on provided option in Lite version or You can purchase full version separately and transfer data.
- Please do not move the application to the SD card if you want to use the widgets and reminder. (limitation of the Android operating system).
- In-App purchase or Full Version purchase is one time payment only.

title: Medication Dose Log
description:
Manage your medications cost effectively in a hassle free manner with the Medical Dose Schedule.
This simple app allows you to track and record your medications over the course of your medication. Simply enter the date and the medication alongside the food timing such as before breakfast, at breakfast, at lunch, dinner, etc. Provision has also been given for you to add reminders alongside.
Further, the app provides you with a range of professional styles to choose from. Simply tab on the style and choose the one you like. 
We have added simple sharing capabilities like email and print for all the sheets to help you make the efforts a collaborative endeavour. We hope you find our simple app productive and would like to hear your comments.

title: Dr.Appt and Medicine Reminder
description:
ABOUT APP

Doctor Appointment And Medication Reminder is an android application which provides you to organize your Appointment with Doctor and Medication. It helps you to know about appointment plan and medicine inhale. You can store total number of pills you are going to take. Once you take a pill, Pills Count will decrease and you can know how many pills are remaining to have. After visiting doctor, you can store report which will be given by doctor. You can know status of your health by viewing report. 


FEATURES

‚Ä¢You can organize your appointment with doctor.

‚Ä¢You can organize your medication schedule.

‚Ä¢You can organize your diagnosis report.

‚Ä¢You can set six alarm to remind your one medicine.

‚Ä¢You can make a call to your doctor.

‚Ä¢You can organize your pills and its count.

title: Remind Me - Task Reminder App, Alarm, 2 MB, 2020
description:
Remind Me is the perfect companion for notifiying your events and other important tasks. With plenty of customizable options, Remind Me is made as simple as possible for the best user experience. You can write down the one time tasks or events that repeat in a certain interval like birthdays, meetings etc. 

With close to 100,000 downloads Remind Me is one of the top reminder apps on the Play Store.

Top Features of Remind Me

‚è∞ Alarm Clock:
Triggers at exactly at the time set and displays on the full screen the reminder message.

‚ûï Customization Options:
For each reminder, you can set a custom ringtone, ring duration, vibration, repeat type etc. It's very convenient if you are trying to set a specific ringtone for an event.

üîµ Categories:
You can create as many categories as you want and assign a reminder to the desired category.

üîÅ Repeat Type:
Reminders can be set for hourly, daily, weekly, monthly and yearly repeat types. Also you can exclude the days, months for a reminder. e.g. In a daily reminder you can exclude Sunday.

üò¥ Snooze:
You can quickly snooze the alarm for the custom duration like 5 min, 10 min or so. And it will be triggered again in that duration.

üé§ Voice Recognition:
Instead of typing a reminder message text, you can speak and it will be automatically converted to text.

üñå Other useful features:
- Automatically store the completed reminders.
- Search the reminders.
- Auto stop vibration and alarm tone with custom duration.
- Turn vibration on and off.
- 24 hour and AM-PM format
- Do not disturb in silent mode.
- Disable / enable reminders.
- Lightweight, eats less battery.
- Simple and easy user interface.

Remind Me is carefully crafted to simplify the process of setting reminders.

Your feedback is important to us. Write us on feedback@lucidify.in

Keep In Touch:
- Website: http://lucidifylabs.com
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lucidify.labs/
- Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/LucidifyLabs

Share the app with your friends and family.

Have a great time using the Remind Me :)

title: Drink Water Aquarium - Water Tracker & Reminder
description:
Do you drink enough water? Do you forget drinking water regularly?

This beautiful water reminder app will change that. Follow your daily water consumption with a filled virtual aquarium. It has never been that much fun to reach your target. Get reminders to drink water and with every sip a fish dances for you! Over time, new fish will be added to motivate you further.

This water tracker app can be easily adapted to your needs and shows you all the past consumption in the water diary. So there‚Äôs no excuse for not keeping your water budget under control. Let's go and drink water! Please consult a doctor to define your personal water drink target.

comments: Not only is it a pretty app to have on your phone. It's the best app I've found so far. I like the widget because it's right there in front of me. It keeps you on track with your water and hydration. Which is so so important for your health and your weight loss.
It's a great little app. Does everything I need it to and it's felt simple to understand. My only wish I'd that there were more customization options for your water intake, but that's really minor.
I've used other water trackers and I like this one the best. It is customizable and very easy to use.
Perfect for what I needed. I love that you can make custom fluid choices and size with this app. Perfect for bariatric surgery.
It's an amazing app, really help me to drink more water, and is very simple to understand

title: Medical records
description:
Medical record is the modern application for managing and keeping data about your health.

This will allow you: 
- to save history of your visits to the doctors, their recommendations, referrals to laboratory tests, tests results and other information.
- to remember diagnoses of your illnesses, dates of performed operations, titles of the prescribed drugs and other important medical information.
- keep a history of measurements of health rates (sugar level, blood pressure, etc.)
- to collect the personal information about your health in one place; in case of Internet availability to see the information on any device. 

Advantages of our application:
- User-friendly and intuitive interface.
- Simplified registration/authorization at the start of the work with the application (by e-mail, social networks or Google account).
- Record-keeping of all visits to doctors, appointments, recommendations, referrals to lab tests. 
- Registering health rates measurements (blood pressure, sugar level etc)
- Enclosing of separate medical documents (files of all formats) in the form of attachment to a medical visit/analysis.
- Existence of medical databases for provisional medical information input (hospitals, doctors' contact details, names of drugs, diagnoses, analyses types, medical recommendations) for putting already existing medical history. This allows entring already exisitng medical information much faster.
- Reminder about time of drug taking, keeping the history of taken drugs.
- Calendar of events (taking of pills, visits to doctors, lab tests)
- Synchronization of data, safe data storage on the Google servers. 
- Keeping several profiles, for example yours and your family members.
- Technical support in case of any questions/problems with application.

In short, Medical record is a dynamically developing application which is aimed to improve the service, to get active users comments, to implement interesting solutions into life. 
We‚Äôll be glad to receive your feedback, advices and constructive criticism by e-mail cardexcapps@gmail.com

Data import mechanism from Microsoft HealthVault system is being developed at the moment

title: Voice Reminder - Recordable Notification and Alarm
description:
Voice Reminder - Recordable Notification and Alarm allows you to create customizable reminders and todo lists fast and easy! Never forget again! Let us remember everything for you! 

‚úîÔ∏èWake Up ‚Äì Set a personalized wake up alarm! Motivate yourself to get out of bed and start the day!

‚úîÔ∏èMeetings ‚Äì Never miss a meeting again! Create a reminder for each meeting to make sure you are always on time and well prepared! Keep your work organized!

‚úîÔ∏èHomework ‚Äì Stay organized and on track with reminders for any homework assignment! Know when your next assignment is due so that you will always be ready to turn it in!

‚úîÔ∏èBirthdays ‚Äì Never forget a loved ones birthday again! Set a birthday reminder to repeat yearly!

‚úîÔ∏èAnniversaries ‚Äì Keep track of all anniversaries! Set the reminder and put your brain on autopilot mode!

‚úîÔ∏èMedication ‚Äì Taking your pills on time is extremely important! Use voice reminders to never miss a day!

‚úîÔ∏èRent and Bills ‚Äì Always get your payments in on time! No more late fees or missed payments!

‚úîÔ∏èWater - Stay hydrated and make sure you get your proper daily water intake!
      
Make use of the many different customizations for a to do reminder including:

üéôÔ∏è Record your own notification or alarm! This truly innovative feature allows you to take full control of your reminders! Say something and hear it back as a notification or alarm!

üó£Ô∏èText to Speech notifications or alarms! Have your phone speak your reminder's title as a notification or alarm! Simple talking alarm or notification!

üìç Location based reminders! Get reminded when you arrive or leave an area using GPS! Remind yourself to grab peanut butter when arriving at a grocery store!

üîÅ Repeating reminders! Schedule a reminder to repeat daily, weekly, weekdays, biweekly, monthly, or annually! Set and forget, we will remind you!

‚è∞ Reminders can alert you using a notification or alarm! Your choice! A simple notification to grab milk at the store after work, or a loud alarm to wake you up in the morning!

üóÉÔ∏è Reminders are organized by date and time! Easily see reminders for today, or coming up this week! Easily check off finished reminders from the home screen!

‚öôÔ∏è Customizable snooze length, alarm vibrate, date format, and time format! View your clock and calendar your way!

üåô Dark Mode! Choose between a light or dark theme!

comments: I have used this app for at least a year and it has always ran just perfectly. Now with my update to Android 10, it no longer works. So I've had to uninstall it and go back to another Voice Reminder app that I used previous to this one. Update: Whatever the issue causing the problem has been fixed and now the app works again without failing. I primarily use it to remind me to take my medications at specific times each day so it is of utmost necessity to have this program perform on time.
